<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */

	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";

</head>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;
text-align:center'><b><span style='font-size:22.0pt;line-height:115%;
font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>Problem E</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;
text-align:center'><b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;line-height:115%;
font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>Elegant Strings</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-top:3.0pt;margin-right:0in;
margin-bottom:0in;margin-left:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:center'><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>Time Limit: 4 Second</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:6.0pt;text-align:justify'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>A
subsequence of a string T = t<sub>0</sub>t<sub>1</sub>t<sub>2</sub>
t<sub>n-1 </sub>is
T ' = t<sub>i0</sub>t<sub>i1</sub>
<span class=SpellE><span class=GramE>t<sub>im</sub></span></span>
where i<sub>0</sub> &lt; i<sub>1</sub> &lt;
.<span class=SpellE>i<sub>m</sub></span>
and m &lt; n.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:
justify'><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:6.0pt;text-align:justify'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>A
substring of a string is a subsequence of the string where every element is
consecutive.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:
justify'><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:6.0pt;text-align:justify'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>You
will be given a string S. P is the set of all the distinct <b>substrings</b> of
S of length 2. Now the elegancy of each element of P is the square of the index
(1-based) in S of the first letter of that substring. If a substring occurs
multiple times only the first occurrence should be considered for the elegancy.
Suppose, S = <span class=SpellE>abcabd</span>. This means P is consisted of the
substrings <span class=SpellE>ab</span>, <span class=SpellE><span class=GramE>bc</span></span>,
ca and bd. And the elegancies of those substrings are 1, 4, 9 and 25
respectively.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:
justify'><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:6.0pt;text-align:justify'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>Now
you will be given another string T. You have to split T to minimum amount of
strings such that every string is a <b>subsequence </b>of T,<b> </b>any of the
strings should not contain any<b> substrings</b> of length 2 which dont belong
to P. Every character of T should belong to <b>exactly</b> one string. If
multiple ways to divide T to minimum amount of strings, you have to consider
that which minimizes the total elegancy of all the strings. Elegancy of a
string is the sum of elegancy of all the length 2 substrings of that string.
For a one letter string the elegancy is 0. Total elegancy is the sum of
elegancy of all the strings.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:
justify'><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:6.0pt;text-align:justify'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>Lets
say, S = <span class=SpellE>abcabd</span> and T = <span class=SpellE>bcadzb</span>.
One of the valid ways to split T is: {<span class=SpellE><span class=GramE>bc</span></span>,
<span class=SpellE>ab</span>, d, z}. Note that {<span class=SpellE>acb</span>,
d, z, b} is not a valid way because <span class=SpellE>acb</span> is not a
subsequence in T. Also {cab, <span class=SpellE>bdz</span>} is not a valid way
either because the string <span class=SpellE>bdz</span> contains <span
class=SpellE>dz</span> which dont belong to P although all the elements are
subsequences.&nbsp; Now the optimal subsequences for this are {<span
class=SpellE>bcab</span>, z, d} which has total elegancy of (14 + 0 + 0) = 14.
For this case you cant split T to less than 3 subsequences and with 3
subsequences it is the minimal total elegancy. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:
justify'><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:6.0pt;text-align:justify'><b><u><span
style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>Input:</span></u></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:6.0pt;text-align:justify'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>First
line of the input contains a number X, the number of test cases which is at
most 20. Each case starts with S. The next line contains T. Both S, T contains
only lowercase letters. S consists of at most 1000 characters and T consists of
at most 100 characters. There wont be any blank lines between two lines.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:
justify'><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:6.0pt;text-align:justify'><b><u><span
style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>Output:</span></u></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:6.0pt;text-align:justify'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>You
have to output two numbers K and C separated by a space where K is the minimum
amount of strings possible by splitting T according to the above rules and C is
the minimum total elegancy.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:6.0pt;text-align:justify'><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>&nbsp;</span></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;mso-yfti-tbllook:1184;mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:
  normal'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>SAMPLE
  INPUT</span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:
  normal'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>OUTPUT
  FOR SAMPLE INPUT</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;background:#BFBFBF;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:
  justify;line-height:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:
  justify;line-height:normal'><span class=SpellE><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>abcabd</span></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:
  justify;line-height:normal'><span class=SpellE><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>bcadzb</span></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:
  justify;line-height:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>&nbsp;</span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;border-right:solid black 1.0pt;
  background:#BFBFBF;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:
  justify;line-height:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3
  14</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:
  justify;line-height:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>&nbsp;</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:
  justify;line-height:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>&nbsp;</span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt'><b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>&nbsp;</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt'><b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>&nbsp;</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt'><span
class=SpellE><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:
"Times New Roman","serif"'>Problemsetter</span></b></span><b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>:</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>
<span class=SpellE>Tasnim</span> <span class=SpellE>Imran</span> Sunny</span></p>

style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>Special
Thanks To:</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:
"Times New Roman","serif"'> Simon Lo</span></p>

</div>

<html>

<head>
<meta http-equiv=Content-Type content="text/html; charset=windows-1252">
<meta name=Generator content="Microsoft Word 12 (filtered)">
<style>
<!--

 @font-face
	{font-family:"Cambria Math";
	panose-1:2 4 5 3 5 4 6 3 2 4;}

	{font-family:Calibri;
	panose-1:2 15 5 2 2 2 4 3 2 4;}

	{font-family:Tahoma;
	panose-1:2 11 6 4 3 5 4 4 2 4;}
 /* Style Definitions */
 p.MsoNormal, li.MsoNormal, div.MsoNormal
	{margin-top:0in;
	margin-right:0in;
	margin-bottom:10.0pt;
	margin-left:0in;
	line-height:115%;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:"Calibri","sans-serif";}
p.MsoAcetate, li.MsoAcetate, div.MsoAcetate
	{mso-style-link:"Balloon Text Char";
	margin:0in;

	font-family:"Tahoma","sans-serif";}

	{color:gray;}

	{mso-style-name:"Balloon Text Char";
	mso-style-link:"Balloon Text";
	font-family:"Tahoma","sans-serif";}
.MsoPapDefault
	{margin-bottom:10.0pt;
	line-height:115%;}

	{size:8.5in 11.0in;
	margin:1.0in 1.0in 1.0in 1.0in;}
div.Section1
	{page:Section1;}
-->
</style>

</head>

<body lang=EN-US>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;
text-align:center'><b><span style='font-size:22.0pt;line-height:115%;
font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>Problem F</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;
text-align:center'><b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;line-height:115%;
font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>Fear of The Dark</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-top:3.0pt;text-align:center'><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>Time Limit: 3 Second</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=right style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;
text-align:right'><i><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>At
night or strolling through the park, fear of the dark.</span></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:6.0pt;text-align:justify'><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:6.0pt;text-align:justify'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>When
Dickenson was walking in a dark road, he noticed that he has been surrounded by
N ghosts. So he stopped at the point (x, y) and realized that each ghost is
shaped like a line segment. The ghosts are fixed at their positions and they
are not moving.  Dickenson was lucky that he was carrying a gun which can shoot
anti-ghost ray to kill ghosts. But the gun can shoot the ray at a particular
angle &#952; and can shoot at most K shots. The angle &#952; cant be less than
1 degree or greater than 180 degree. Whenever he shoots a ray, the ray spreads
at the angle &#952; and goes towards infinity and destroying any body parts
of the ghosts in its path. A ghost is said to be killed if anti-ghost rays
destroy its whole body. If there is just a single point on the ghosts body
that is not being destroyed, the ghost is alive. He can shoot to any direction.
Note that sometimes he may need several shots at several directions to
completely kill a ghost. Given Dickensons position (x, y), the maximum shots K
and the endpoints of the body of all the ghosts you have to determine the
minimum angle which can be used to kill all the ghosts.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><img width=990 height=218 src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/113/p11382.gif" ></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:6.0pt;text-align:justify'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>The
above picture shows how the gun works. A shot has been made at the angle
&#952; and the ray destroyed some parts of the ghost G1 and then it destroyed
the whole body of the ghost G2. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt'><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><u><span style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;
font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>Input:</span></u></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:6.0pt;text-align:justify'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>The
first line of the input contains X, the number of test cases. Each case starts
with four numbers N (</span><span style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;
font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'> 1 &#8804; N &#8804; 50 </span><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>),
K ( 1 </span><span style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>&#8804;
K &#8804; 10 </span><span style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:
"Times New Roman","serif"'>), x and y. Where N is the number of ghosts, K is
the maximum number of shots that can be made using the gun, (x, y) is the
Cartesian co-ordinate of Dickensons position.  Then there will be N lines
containing four numbers x1, y1, x2 and y2 describing each ghosts body. Here
(x1, y1) and (x2, y2) are the end points of a ghosts body. All the
co-ordinates in the input file have an absolute magnitude at most 10,000. For
no ghost (x1, y1), (x2, y2) and (x, y) will be collinear.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:
justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:6.0pt;text-align:justify'><b><u><span
style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>Output:</span></u></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>For every test case you
have to output one line which contains the minimum angle &#952; to shoot all
the ghosts. You have to output &#952; to 4 decimal places. Errors less than or
equal to ±0.0001 are considered to be correct. If it is impossible to kill all
the ghosts then output -1.0000.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:6.0pt'><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>&nbsp;</span></p>

<table class=MsoTableGrid border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none'>
 <tr>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:
  normal'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>SAMPLE
  INPUT</span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:
  normal'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>OUTPUT
  FOR SAMPLE INPUT</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;background:#BFBFBF;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:
  normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:
  normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>4 3 0 0</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:
  normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2 2 2 -2</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:
  normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3 3 3 1</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:
  normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>4 2 8 2</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:
  normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>-6 1 -6 0</span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;border-right:solid black 1.0pt;
  background:#BFBFBF;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:
  normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>45.0000</span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt'><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt'><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt'><b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>Problemsetter:</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>
Tasnim Imran Sunny</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt'><b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>Special
Thanks to:</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:
"Times New Roman","serif"'> Md. Mahbubul Hasan</span></p>

</div>

</body>

</html>

11383||||||false||||||
<html>

<head>
<meta http-equiv=Content-Type content="text/html; charset=windows-1252">
<meta name=Generator content="Microsoft Word 12 (filtered)">
<style>
<!--
 /* Font Definitions */
 @font-face
	{font-family:"Cambria Math";
	panose-1:2 4 5 3 5 4 6 3 2 4;}
@font-face
	{font-family:Calibri;
	panose-1:2 15 5 2 2 2 4 3 2 4;}
@font-face
	{font-family:Tahoma;
	panose-1:2 11 6 4 3 5 4 4 2 4;}
 /* Style Definitions */
 p.MsoNormal, li.MsoNormal, div.MsoNormal
	{margin-top:0in;
	margin-right:0in;
	margin-bottom:10.0pt;
	margin-left:0in;
	line-height:115%;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:"Calibri","sans-serif";}
p.MsoAcetate, li.MsoAcetate, div.MsoAcetate
	{mso-style-link:"Balloon Text Char";
	margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	font-size:8.0pt;
	font-family:"Tahoma","sans-serif";}
span.BalloonTextChar
	{mso-style-name:"Balloon Text Char";
	mso-style-link:"Balloon Text";
	font-family:"Tahoma","sans-serif";}
.MsoPapDefault
	{margin-bottom:10.0pt;
	line-height:115%;}
@page Section1
	{size:8.5in 11.0in;
	margin:.5in 1.0in .5in 1.0in;}
div.Section1
	{page:Section1;}
-->
</style>

</head>

<body lang=EN-US>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;
text-align:center'><b><span style='font-size:22.0pt;line-height:115%;
font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>Problem G</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;
text-align:center'><b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;line-height:115%;
font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>Golden Tiger Claw</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-top:3.0pt;margin-right:0in;
margin-bottom:0in;margin-left:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:center'><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>Time Limit: 8 Second</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;
text-align:center'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:
"Times New Roman","serif"'>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:6.0pt;text-align:justify'><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:6.0pt;text-align:justify'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>Omi,
Raymondo, Clay and Kimiko are on new adventure- in search of new Shen Gong Wu.
But Evil Boy Genius Jack Spicer is also there. Omi and Jack found the Shen Gong
Wu at the same time so they rushed for it but alas they touched it at the same
time. Then what? It is time for Xiaolin Showdown.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:6.0pt;text-align:justify'><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:6.0pt;text-align:justify'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>Jack
challenged Omi to play a game. The game is simple! There will be an N*N board
where each cell in the board contains some number. They have to assign numbers
to each row and column separately so that </span><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Calibri","sans-serif";
position:relative;top:5.5pt'><img width=171 height=22
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/113/p11383a.png" ></span><span style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:
115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'> where </span><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Calibri","sans-serif";
position:relative;top:5.5pt'><img width=43 height=22 src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/113/p11383a.png" ></span><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'> is
the number assigned to the cell located at ith row and jth column, </span><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Calibri","sans-serif";
position:relative;top:5.5pt'><img width=47 height=22 src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/113/p11383a.png" ></span><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'> is
the number assigned to ith row and </span><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Calibri","sans-serif";
position:relative;top:5.5pt'><img width=41 height=22 src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/113/p11383a.png" ></span><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'> is
the number assigned to jth column. That is simple isnt it? Well
 the main
part is that you have to minimize </span><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Calibri","sans-serif";
position:relative;top:5.5pt'><img width=164 height=22
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/113/p11383a.png" ></span><span style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:
115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:6.0pt;text-align:justify'><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:6.0pt;text-align:justify'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>Jack
has taken his favorite Monkey Stuff and Omi has taken Golden Tiger Claw.
With the help of this Golden Tiger Claw, he can go anywhere in the world. He
has come to you and seeking your help. Jack is using his computer to solve this
problem. So do it quick! Find the most optimal solution for Omi so that you can
also be part of history in saving the world from the darkness of evil.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:6.0pt;text-align:justify'><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:6.0pt;text-align:justify'><b><u><span
style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>Input:</span></u></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:6.0pt;text-align:justify'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>Input
contains 15 test cases. Each case starts with N. Then there are N lines
containing N numbers each. All the numbers in input is positive integer within
the limit 100 except N which can be at most 500.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:6.0pt;text-align:justify'><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:6.0pt;text-align:justify'><b><u><span
style='font-size:14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>Output:</span></u></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:6.0pt;text-align:justify'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>For
each case in the first line there will be N numbers, the row assignments. In
the next line there will N column assignment. And at the last line the minimum
sum should be given. If there are several possible solutions give any.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:6.0pt'><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>&nbsp;</span></p>

<table class=MsoTableGrid border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none'>
 <tr>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:
  normal'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>SAMPLE
  INPUT</span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:
  normal'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>OUTPUT
  FOR SAMPLE INPUT</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;background:#BFBFBF;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:
  justify;line-height:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:
  justify;line-height:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1
  1</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:
  justify;line-height:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1
  1</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:
  justify;line-height:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>&nbsp;</span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border-top:none;border-left:

  background:#BFBFBF;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:

  <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:

  0</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:

<body lang=EN-US>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;
text-align:center'><b><span style='font-size:22.0pt;line-height:115%;
font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>Problem H</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;
text-align:center'><b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;line-height:115%;
font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>Help is needed for Dexter</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-top:3.0pt;margin-right:0in;
margin-bottom:0in;margin-left:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:center'><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>Time Limit: 3 Second</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;
text-align:center'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:
"Times New Roman","serif"'>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:6.0pt;text-align:justify'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>Dexter
is tired of Dee Dee. So he decided to keep Dee Dee busy in a game. The game he
planned for her is quite easy to play but not easy to win at least not for Dee
Dee. But Dexter does not have time to spend on this silly task, so he wants
your help.</span><span style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%'> </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:
justify'><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:6.0pt;text-align:justify'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>There
will be a button, when it will be pushed a random number N will be chosen by
computer. Then on screen there will be numbers from 1 to N. Dee Dee can choose
any number of numbers from the numbers on the screen, and then she will command
computer to subtract a positive number chosen by her (not necessarily on
screen) from the selected numbers. Her objective will be to make all the
numbers 0.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:
justify'><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:6.0pt;text-align:justify'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>For
example if N = 3, then on screen there will be 3 numbers on screen: 1, 2, 3.
Say she now selects 1 and 2. Commands to subtract 1, then the numbers on the
screen will be: 0, 1, 3. Then she selects 1 and 3 and commands to subtract 1.
Now the numbers are 0, 0, 2. Now she subtracts 2 from 2 and all the numbers
become 0.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:
justify'><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:6.0pt;text-align:justify'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>Dexter
is not so dumb to understand that this can be done very easily, so to make a
twist he will give a limit L for each N and surely L will be as minimum as
possible so that it is still possible to win within L moves. But Dexter does
not have time to think how to determine L for each N, so he asks you to write a
code which will take N as input and give L as output.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:6.0pt'><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:6.0pt'><b><u><span style='font-size:
14.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>Input and Output:</span></u></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:6.0pt'><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>Input
consists of several lines each with N such that </span><span style='font-family:
"Times New Roman","serif"'>1 </span><span style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:
115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>&#8804; N &#8804; 1,000,000,000</span><span
style='font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>. Input will be terminated by end
of file. For each N output L in separate lines.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:6.0pt'><span style='font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>&nbsp;</span></p>

<table class=MsoTableGrid border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none'>
 <tr>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:
  normal'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>SAMPLE
  INPUT</span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:
  normal'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>OUTPUT
  FOR SAMPLE INPUT</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;background:#BFBFBF;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:
  normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>1</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:
  normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>2</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:
  normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>3</span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid black 1.0pt;border-right:solid black 1.0pt;
  background:#BFBFBF;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:
  normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>1</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:
  normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>2</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;line-height:
  normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>2</span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:8.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:
"Times New Roman","serif"'>&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt'><b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>Problemsetter:</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman","serif"'>
Md. Mahbubul Hasan</span></p>

 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem A: Da Vinci Code</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'>Input: standard input<br>
  Output: standard output</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><span
  style='font-family:Arial'>&nbsp;</span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><i>13-3-2-21-1-1-8-5</i></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><i>O, DRACONIAN
  DEVIL!</i></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><i>OH, LAME SAINT!</i></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>&nbsp;</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>The
  Da Vinci Code is one of the most widely read but controversial books of all
  time. In this book the writer Dan Brown used a very interesting encryption
  technique to keep a secret message. It required a great deal of intelligence
  to decipher the code since there was not enough information available. Here,
  a similar kind of problem is given with sufficient clues to solve.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>&nbsp;</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>In
  this problem, you will be given a series of numbers, taken from Fibonacci
  series and a cipher text. Your task is to decipher the text using the
  decryption technique described below. </p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>&nbsp;</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>Lets
  follow an example. Any cipher text will consist of two lines. First line is
  the key which contains some numbers drawn from Fibonacci series. The second
  line is the actual cipher text.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>&nbsp;</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>So,
  given the following cipher text</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>     13 2 89 377 8 3 233 34 144 21 1 </span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>     OH, LAME SAINT!</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>the
  output will be:</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>     THE MONA LISA</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>&nbsp;</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>For
  this problem, assume that the first number in Fibonacci series is 1, second
  one is 2 and each subsequent number is found by adding previous two numbers
  of the series. So, the Fibonacci series is 1, 2, 3, 5, 8, 13... ...</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>&nbsp;</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>So,
  how do we get the string THE MONA LISA from the string OH, LAME SAINT!?
  Here some numbers are drawn from Fibonacci series, given in the first line.
  The first one is <b>13</b> which is the <b>sixth (6<sup>th</sup>) </b>Fibonacci
  number in Fibonacci series. So the first uppercase letter in the cipher text <b>O</b>
  goes to the <b>sixth (6<sup>th</sup>)</b> position in the output string.
  Second number in the input string is <b>2</b> which is the second Fibonacci
  number and thus <b>H</b> goes to second position in the output string; then
  comes <b>89</b> which is the <b>10<sup>th</sup></b> Fibonacci number, so <b>L</b>
  which is the <b>third uppercase letter</b> in the cipher goes to the <b>10<sup>th</sup></b>
  position in the output string. And this process continues until the cipher
  text ends and hence we find the string THE MONA LISA. Note that only
  uppercase letters conveys the message; other characters are simply garbage.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>&nbsp;</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>If
  a Fibonacci number is missing in the input sequence then a blank space is put
  at its position in the output string. As in the above example <b>fourth</b>
  and <b>ninth</b> Fibonacci numbers <b>5</b> and <b>55</b> are missing. So,
  two blank spaces are inserted in fourth and ninth positions of the output
  string. But there must not be any trailing spaces.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>&nbsp;</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>Input
  starts with a line consisting of a single number <b>T</b>. <b>T</b> test
  cases follow. Each test case consists of three lines. The first line contains
  a single positive integer <b>N</b>. In the second line there are <b>N</b>
  numbers drawn from the Fibonacci series. The numbers will be separated from
  each other using spaces. Finally, the third line contains the cipher text to
  be decrypted.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>For
  each test case, output contains a single line containing the decrypted text.
  Remember that the decrypted text will contain only uppercase letters.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Constraints</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;border:none;
  border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b>-           </b>Value
  of any input Fibonacci number is less than <b>2<sup>31</sup>.</b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b>-           </b>The
  length of the cipher text will be at most <b>100</b>.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="69%" valign=top style='width:69.6%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Sample Input</span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="30%" valign=top style='width:30.4%;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output for Sample Input</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="69%" valign=top style='width:69.6%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;
  line-height:11.0pt'><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;
  line-height:11.0pt'><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>11</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;
  line-height:11.0pt'><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>13
  2 89 377 8 3 233 34 144 21 1</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>OH, LAME SAINT!</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>15</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>34 21 13 144 1597 3 987
  610 8 5 89 2 377 2584 1</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>O, DRACONIAN DEVIL!</span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="30%" valign=top style='width:30.4%;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>THE MONA LISA</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>LEONARDO DA VINCI</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;border:none;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'>Problem setter: Mohammed Shamsul Alam</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'>Special thanks: Mohammed Saifur Rahim, Tanveer
  Ahsan</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<body lang=EN-US>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>&nbsp;</p>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%"
 style='width:100.0%;border-collapse:collapse'>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#FF9900'>I</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:purple'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:blue'>I </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:teal'>U </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:red'>C  </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:teal'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#FF9900'>O</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:purple'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:blue'>N</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:purple'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:red'>L</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:purple'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#993300'>I</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:purple'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#FF9900'>N</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:purple'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:olive'>E</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:purple'>   C </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:red'>O</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:purple'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:olive'>N </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:red'>T</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:olive'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:maroon'>E</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:olive'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:fuchsia'>S</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:olive'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:green'>T</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:maroon'>  </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:olive'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#FF6600'>2 </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:olive'>0</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#CC99FF'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#993300'>0</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:maroon'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#99CC00'>8</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem B: Triples</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'>Input: standard input<br>
  Output: standard output</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><span
  style='font-family:Arial'>&nbsp;</span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>Given
  a sequence of positive integers. You need to find the number of triples in
  that sequence. For this problem, (x, y, z) constructs a triple if and only if
  x + y = z. So, (1, 2, 3) is a triple, where (3, 4, 5) is not.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;
  text-autospace:none'>Each input set starts with a positive integer N. Next
  few lines contain N positive integers. Input is terminated by EOF.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>For
  each case, print the number of triples in a line.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Constraints</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;border:none;
  border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b>-           3
  &#8804; N &#8804; 5000</b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b>&nbsp;</b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="51%" valign=top style='width:51.1%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Sample Input</span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="48%" valign=top style='width:48.9%;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output for Sample Input</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="51%" valign=top style='width:51.1%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoBodyText><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>6</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoBodyText><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>1 2 3 4 5 6</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoBodyText><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>6 </span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoBodyText><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>1 2 4 8 16 32</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoBodyText><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>3</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoBodyText><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>100000000
  200000000 100000000</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoBodyText><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>5</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoBodyText><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>1 1 1 2 2</span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="48%" valign=top style='width:48.9%;border-top:none;border-left:

  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoBodyText><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>6</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoBodyText><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>0</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoBodyText><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>1</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;
  text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>6</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;border:none;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>&nbsp;</p>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%"
 style='width:100.0%;border-collapse:collapse'>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#FF9900'>I</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:purple'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:blue'>I </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:teal'>U </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:red'>C  </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:teal'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#FF9900'>O</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:purple'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:blue'>N</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:purple'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:red'>L</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:purple'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#993300'>I</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:purple'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#FF9900'>N</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:purple'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:olive'>E</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:purple'>   C </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:red'>O</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:purple'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:olive'>N </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:red'>T</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:olive'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:maroon'>E</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:olive'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:fuchsia'>S</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:olive'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:green'>T</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:maroon'>  </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:olive'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#FF6600'>2 </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:olive'>0</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#CC99FF'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#993300'>0</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:maroon'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#99CC00'>8</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem C: The 3-Regular Graph</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'>Input: standard input</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'>Output: standard output</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><span
  style='font-family:Arial'>&nbsp;</span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>The
  degree of a vertex in a graph is the number of edges adjacent to the vertex.
  A graph is 3-regular if all of its vertices have degree 3. Given an integer <b>n</b>,
  you are to build a simple undirected 3-regular graph with <b>n</b> vertices.
  If there are multiple solutions, any one will do.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>For
  each test case, the input will be a single integer <b>n </b>as described
  above. End of input will be denoted by a case where <b>n = </b>0. This case
  should not be processed.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>If
  it is possible to build a simple undirected 3-regular graph with <b>n </b>vertices,
  print a line with an integer <b>e</b> which is the number of edges in your
  graph. Each of the following <b>e</b> lines describes an edge of the graph.
  An edge description contains two integers <b>a </b>&amp; <b>b</b>, the two
  endpoints of the edge. Note that the vertices are indexed from <b>1 </b>to <b>n.
  </b>If it is not possible to build a simple undirected 3-regular graph with <b>n
  </b>vertices, print <b>Impossible</b> in a single line.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Constraints</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;border:none;
  border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b>-           1
  &#8804; n &#8804; 100</b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b>&nbsp;</b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Sample Input</span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output for Sample Input</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>4</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>3</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>0</span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>6</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>1 2</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>1 3</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>1 4</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>2 3</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>2 4</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>3 4</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>Impossible</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;border:none;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'>Problem setter: Manzurur Rahman Khan</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span

  </td>

<body lang=EN-US>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>&nbsp;</p>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%"
 style='width:100.0%;border-collapse:collapse'>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#FF9900'>I</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:purple'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:blue'>I </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:teal'>U </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:red'>C  </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:teal'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#FF9900'>O</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:purple'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:blue'>N</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:purple'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:red'>L</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:purple'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#993300'>I</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:purple'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#FF9900'>N</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:purple'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:olive'>E</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:purple'>   C </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:red'>O</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:purple'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:olive'>N </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:red'>T</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:olive'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:maroon'>E</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:olive'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:fuchsia'>S</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:olive'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:green'>T</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:maroon'>  </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:olive'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#FF6600'>2 </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:olive'>0</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#CC99FF'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#993300'>0</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:maroon'> </span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:#99CC00'>8</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem D: GCD LCM</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'>Input: standard input<br>
  Output: standard output</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><span
  style='font-family:Arial'>&nbsp;</span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>The
  GCD of two positive integers is the largest integer that divides both the
  integers without any remainder. The LCM of two positive integers is the
  smallest positive integer that is divisible by both the integers. A positive
  integer can be the GCD of many pairs of numbers. Similarly, it can be the LCM
  of many pairs of numbers. In this problem, you will be given two positive
  integers. You have to output a pair of numbers whose GCD is the first number
  and LCM is the second number.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>The
  first line of input will consist of a positive integer <b>T</b>. <b>T</b>
  denotes the number of cases. Each of the next <b>T</b> lines will contain two
  positive integer, <b>G</b> and <b>L.</b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>For
  each case of input, there will be one line of output. It will contain two
  positive integers <b>a</b> and <b>b</b>, <b>a &#8804; b</b>, which has a GCD
  of <b>G</b> and LCM of <b>L. </b>In case there is more than one pair
  satisfying the condition, output the pair for which <b>a</b> is minimized. In
  case there is no such pair, output -1.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Constraints</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;border:none;
  border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>-           <b>T
  </b><b>&#8804; 100</b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>-           Both
  <b>G </b>and <b>L </b>will be less than <b>2<sup>31</sup></b>.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Sample Input</span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output for Sample Input</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>2</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>1 2</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>3 4</span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.0%;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>1 2</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>-1</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;border:none;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width="100%" colspan=2 valign=top style='width:100.0%;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph'><b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'>Problem setter: Shamim Hafiz</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>
