<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem B</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Clever Naming Patterns</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input</span></span><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial;color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output </span><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=SpellE>Piotr</span>
is organizing a programming competition consisting of <b>n</b> problems,
numbered A, B, C, etc. He wants to name the first problem starting with the
letter A, the second problem starting with the letter B, and so on. However, he
cannot simply come up with random words for problem titles - that wouldn't make
sense. For each problem, he has come up with a list of acceptable names. Help <span
class=SpellE>Piotr</span> pick an ordering of the problems and an acceptable
name for each one so that each problem's name starts with the correct letter of
the alphabet. </p>

<h5 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></span></h5>

<h5 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<h5 style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>The
first line of input gives the number of cases, <b>N</b>. <b>N</b> test cases
follow. Each one starts with <b>n</b> on a line by itself. The next <b>n</b>
lines list the possible names for each of the <b>n</b> problems. Each line
starts with <span class=SpellE><b>k<sub>i</sub></b></span> - the number of
acceptable names for problem <span class=SpellE><b>i</b></span> and lists the
names, separated by spaces. Each name is a non-empty string of letters. No two
names will be the same, and no two names for the same problem will start with
the same letter. </h5>

<p>1 &#8804; <b>N</b> &#8804; 30<span class=GramE>,</span><br>
1 &#8804; <b>n</b> &#8804; 26,<br>
1 &#8804; <span class=SpellE><b>k<sub>i</sub></b></span> &#8804; 26. </p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Output
<o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<h4 style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";
font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>For each test case, first output
the line &quot;Case #x:<span class=GramE>&quot;,</span> where x is the test
case number. After that, print n lines listing the n problem names, each with
only the first letter capitalized. There is guaranteed to be exactly one
solution. <o:p></o:p></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                                        
</span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%"
 style='width:100.0%;background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;
 mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width="65%" valign=top style='width:65.04%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre>4</pre><pre>3</pre><pre>2 Apples <st1:City
  w:st="on"><st1:place w:st="on">Oranges</st1:place></st1:City></pre><pre>1 Bananas</pre><pre>5 Apricots Blueberries Cranberries <span
  class=SpellE>Zuccini</span> Yams</pre><pre>1</pre><pre>1 <span class=SpellE>ApPlEs</span></pre><pre>2</pre><pre>2 a b</pre><pre>1 axe</pre><pre>4</pre><pre>4 <span
  class=SpellE>Aa</span> <span class=SpellE>Ba</span> Ca <span class=SpellE>Da</span></pre><pre>3 <span
  class=SpellE>Ab</span> Bb <span class=SpellE>Cb</span></pre><pre>2 Ac <span
  class=SpellE>Bc</span></pre>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1 Ad</span><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";color:black'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="34%" valign=top style='width:34.96%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre>Case #1:</pre><pre>Apples</pre><pre>Bananas</pre><pre>Cranberries</pre><pre>Case #2:</pre><pre>Apples</pre><pre>Case #3:</pre><pre>Axe</pre><pre>B</pre><pre>Case #4:</pre><pre>Ad</pre><pre><span
  class=SpellE>Bc</span></pre><pre><span class=SpellE>Cb</span></pre>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  class=SpellE><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Da</span></span><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";color:black'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

<p class=MsoCaption><span style='font-size:12.0pt'>Problem setter: Igor <span
class=SpellE>Naverniouk</span><o:p></o:p></span></p>

	mso-header-margin:.5in;
	mso-footer-margin:.5in;
	mso-paper-source:0;}
div.Section1
	{page:Section1;}
-->
</style>
<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;

	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;

<meta content="  name=Author>
<meta content="  name=Keywords>
<meta content="  name=Description>
<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="15362"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link="#772222" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem C</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:18.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>SAM I AM</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input</span></span><span style='font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output </span><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The world is in great danger!! <span
class=SpellE><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Mental's</b></span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'> forces</b> have returned to Earth to
eradicate humankind. Our last hope to stop this great evil is <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Sam Serious Stone</b>. Equipped with
various powerful weapons, Serious Sam starts his mission to destroy the forces
of evil. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>After fighting two days and three
nights, Sam is now in front of the <st1:place w:st="on"><st1:PlaceType w:st="on">temple</st1:PlaceType>
 <st1:PlaceName w:st="on">KOPTOS</st1:PlaceName></st1:place> where <span
class=SpellE>Mental's</span> general Ugh <span class=SpellE>Zan</span> III is
waiting for him. But this time, he has a serious problem. He is in shortage of
ammo and a lot of enemies crawling inside the temple waiting for him. After
rounding the <st1:place w:st="on"><st1:PlaceType w:st="on">temple</st1:PlaceType>
 <st1:PlaceName w:st="on">Sam</st1:PlaceName></st1:place> finds that the temple
is in rectangle shape and he has the locations of all enemies in the temple.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="Picture_x0020_1" o:spid="_x0000_s1026" type="#_x0000_t75"
 alt="C:\Documents and Settings\Angel of Death\Desktop\sam grid.gif" style='position:absolute;
 left:0;text-align:left;margin-left:297pt;margin-top:7.55pt;width:165.75pt;
 height:165.75pt;z-index:1;visibility:visible'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/c_files/image001.png"  o:title="sam grid"/>
 <w:wrap type="square"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=221 height=221
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/c_files/image001.png"  align=left hspace=12
alt="C:\Documents and Settings\Angel of Death\Desktop\sam grid.gif" v:shapes="Picture_x0020_1"><![endif]>All
of a sudden he realizes that he can kill the enemies without entering the
temple using the great cannon ball which spits out a gigantic ball bigger than
him killing anything it runs into and keeps on rolling until it finally
explodes. But the cannonball can only shoot horizontally or vertically and all
the enemies along the path of that cannon ball will be killed. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Now he wants to save as many
cannon balls as possible for fighting with Mental. So, he wants to know the
minimum number of cannon balls and the positions from which he can shoot the
cannonballs to eliminate all enemies from outside that temple. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><i><span style='color:black;
mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></i></b></p>

<h4 style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input</span></b><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></b></h4>

<p class=MsoPlainText style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Here, the temple is defined as a RXC grid. The
first line of each test case contains 3 integers:<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span><span class=GramE>R(</span>0&lt;R&lt;1001),
C(0&lt;C&lt;1001) representing the grid of temple (R means number of row and C
means number of column of the grid) and the number of enemies
N(0&lt;N&lt;1000001) inside the temple. After that there are N lines each of
which contains 2 integers representing the position of the enemies in that
temple. Each test case is followed by a new line (except the last one). Input
is terminated when R=C=N=0. The size of the input file is around 1.3 MB.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-fareast-language:
ZH-CN'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<h4><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each test case there will be
one line output. First print the minimum number (<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>m</i></b>) of cannonballs needed
to wipe out the enemies followed by a single space and then <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>m</i></b>
positions from which he can shoot those cannonballs. For shooting horizontally
print <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>r</b> followed by the row number
and for vertical shooting print <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>c</b>
followed by the column number. If there is more than one solution any one will
do.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-layout-grid-align:none'><b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left;tab-stops:.5in'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:
normal'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                               </span>Output for
Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%"
 style='width:100.0%;background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;
 mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width="48%" valign=top style='width:48.76%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>4
  <span class=SpellE>4</span> 3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>1
  <span class=SpellE>1</span><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>1
  4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>3
  2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>4
  <span class=SpellE>4</span> 2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>1
  <span class=SpellE>1</span><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>2
  <span class=SpellE>2</span><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>0
  <span class=SpellE>0</span> <span class=SpellE>0</span><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-fareast-font-family:
  SimSun;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width="51%" valign=top style='width:51.24%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>2
  r1 r3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>2
  r1 r2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-fareast-font-family:
  SimSun;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:.5in'><span
lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633CC" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem D</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Chest of Drawers </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<table class=MsoTableGrid border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 align=left
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-table-overlap:never;mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-table-lspace:9.0pt;

 .05pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:.5pt solid windowtext;
 mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>
  <td width=241 style='width:180.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;mso-element:frame;
  mso-element-frame-hspace:9.0pt;mso-element-wrap:around;mso-element-anchor-vertical:
  paragraph;mso-element-anchor-horizontal:column;mso-element-left:5.4pt;
  mso-element-top:.05pt;mso-height-rule:exactly'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
   id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
   path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
   <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
   <v:formulas>
    <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
   </v:formulas>
   <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
   <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
  </v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:149.25pt;
   height:224.25pt'>
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/d_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=199 height=299
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/d_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=241 valign=top style='width:180.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-element:frame;mso-element-frame-hspace:
  9.0pt;mso-element-wrap:around;mso-element-anchor-vertical:paragraph;
  mso-element-anchor-horizontal:column;mso-element-left:5.4pt;mso-element-top:
  .05pt;mso-height-rule:exactly'>Figure 1: A chest of drawers</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>A chest of drawers means a
wardrobe which has many drawers aligned vertically as shown in the figure on
the left. Although this is useful furniture, some problems arise when all the
drawers need have provisions of locking - that is sometimes a drawer is not
secured even if it is locked. For example assume that the third drawer from the
top is locked but the drawer immediately above it is not locked. Then the
drawer that is locked is also not secured because one can access it by pulling
out the drawer immediately above it.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>In a chest of n drawers, there
are a number of ways to ensure that exactly s drawers are secure. For example
for the chest of drawers shown on the left, exactly four drawers can be secured
in six ways. These six ways are shown in Figure 2.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Given the value of n and s, your
job is to find out in how many ways they can be secured.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>

      <tr>
       <td><![endif]>
       <div>
       <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
       style='font-size:10.0pt'>L<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
       </div>
       <![if !mso]></td>
      </tr>
     </table>
     <![endif]></v:textbox>
   </v:shape><w:wrap type="none"/>
   <w:anchorlock/>
  </v:group><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=84 height=157
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/d_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_s1033 _x0000_s1034 _x0000_s1035 _x0000_s1036 _x0000_s1037 _x0000_s1038 _x0000_s1039 _x0000_s1040 _x0000_s1041 _x0000_s1042 _x0000_s1043 _x0000_s1044 _x0000_s1045 _x0000_s1046"><![endif]><!--[if mso & !supportInlineShapes & supportFields]><v:shape
   id="_x0000_i1031" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:63pt;height:117pt'>
   <v:imagedata croptop="-65520f" cropbottom="65520f"/>
  </v:shape><span style='mso-element:field-end'></span><![endif]--></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=655 colspan=6 valign=top style='width:491.05pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Figure 2: In this figure L
  means that the drawer is locked and U means that the corresponding drawer is
  unlocked. And here all six locking combinations are shown which ensures that
  exactly four drawers are secured. Letters <span class=GramE>corresponding</span>
  the secured drawers are boldfaced.</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input file contains at most
5000 lines of inputs.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Each line contains two <span
class=GramE>integers</span> n and s (1 &#8804; n &#8804; 65 and 0 &#8804; s &#8804;
65). Here n is the total number of drawers and s is the number of drawers that
needs to be secured.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Input is terminated by a line
containing two negative numbers. This input should not be processed.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
font-weight:normal'>Output </span></span><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each line of input produce
one line of output. This line contains an integer which denotes in how many, s
drawers out of the n drawers can be secured. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                            </span>Output for Sample
Input<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=301 valign=top style='width:225.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>6 2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>6 3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>6 4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>-1 -1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=315 valign=top style='width:236.35pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>16<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>9<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633CC" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem E</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Arranging Cards</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><i><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt;color:windowtext;mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>Given n (n &lt;= 50) different
cards, you're going to arrange them in a sequence so that adjacent cards always
have different ranks.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt;color:windowtext;mso-bidi-font-style:italic'><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt;color:windowtext;mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>Each card is represented by
two characters: its rank (2~9,T for <span class=SpellE>ten,J</span> for <span
class=SpellE>Jack,Q</span> for <span class=SpellE>Queen,K</span> for <span
class=SpellE>King,A</span> for Ace) and suite (S for <span class=SpellE>Spade,C</span>
for <span class=SpellE>Club,H</span> for <span class=SpellE>Heart,D</span> for
Diamond). The whole sequence is represented by the concatenation of all the
cards. For example, 6H7DJDKC is a valid sequence, but 6H7D7SKC is not, because
there are two adjacent cards 7D and 7S with the same rank.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt;color:windowtext;mso-bidi-font-style:italic'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt;color:windowtext;mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>Given a positive integer k
(1 &#8804; k &#8804; 10<sup>18</sup>), find the lexicographically k-<span
class=SpellE>th</span> smallest sequence.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><i><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input contains at most 1000
test cases. Each case begins with two <span class=GramE>integers</span> n and k
in the first line. The second line contains n cards separated by a single space.
The case with n = 0 indicates the end of the input and should not be processed.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output</span></b><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:16.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>For each case, print the case number and the answer. If
there is no such sequence, print &quot;Not found&quot; (without quotes). Insert
a single space between each two adjacent cards to make it look better.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=643 valign=top style='width:6.7in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>6
  1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2S
  3S 3C 4S 4C 4D<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>6
  120<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2S
  3S 3C 4S 4C 4D<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>6
  121<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2S
  3S 3C 4S 4C 4D<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>16
  654321234567<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2S
  3S 4S 5S 2C 3C 4C 5C 2D 3D 4D 5D 2H 3H 4H 5H<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0
  <span class=SpellE>0</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><span style='font-style:normal'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></h1>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Output for
Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=643 valign=top style='width:6.7in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  1: 2S 4C 3C 4D 3S 4S<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  2: 4S 3S 4D 3C 4C 2S<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  3: Not found<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  4: 5D 4S 2D 5H 3S 4H 5S 2H 3D 2C 5C 4D 2S 3C 4C 3H<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

</div>

 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633CC" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem F</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Escaping from Fractal Bacterium </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>A fractal bacterium is growing
very fast and you have to calculate whether you are safe from its attack or
not.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The growth of our bacteria is
like a very well known fractal Koch Snowflake or <st1:place w:st="on"><st1:PlaceName
 w:st="on">Koch</st1:PlaceName> <st1:PlaceType w:st="on">Island</st1:PlaceType></st1:place>.
The growth of it is shown below:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoTableGrid border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>
  <td width=378 valign=top style='width:283.5pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype id="_x0000_t75"
   coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t" path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe"
   filled="f" stroked="f">
   <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
   <v:formulas>
    <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
   </v:formulas>
   <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
   <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
  </v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:273pt;
   height:236.25pt'>
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/f_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=364 height=315
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/f_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=378 valign=top style='width:283.5pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>Figure: Growth of fractal bacteria</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>As you can see that at day one
the bacteria has the shape of an equilateral triangle. In day two the all sides
are extended outwards with the shape of another equilateral triangle whose sides
are 1/3 rd of the triangle of day 1. This process is repeated again in day 3
and onwards.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The scientists have started
working on a medicine and they are confident about finding means of killing the
bacteria within 2 weeks. So if this bacterium cannot reach you within 2 weeks
(Day 14) then you are safe. Given your location and the initial position of the
bacterium, you will have to find whether you are safe or not. </p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></span></h5>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>First line of the input file
contains an integer <span class=GramE>N(</span>0&lt;N&lt;6001) which denotes the
number of input sets. Each of the next N lines makes the input for one set.
Each line contains eight floating-point numbers x<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt'>1</span></sub>, y<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>1</span></sub>,
x<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>2</span></sub>, y<sub><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>2</span></sub>, x<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt'>3</span></sub>, y<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>3</span></sub>,
x and y (|x<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>1</span></sub>|, |y<sub><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>1</span></sub>|, |x<sub><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>2</span></sub>|, |y<sub><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>2</span></sub>|, |x<sub><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>3</span></sub>|, |y<sub><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>3</span></sub>|, |x|, |y|&lt;=400000). Here
(x<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>1</span></sub>, y<sub><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>1</span></sub>), (x<sub><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>2</span></sub>, y<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt'>2</span></sub>), (x<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>3</span></sub>,
y<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>3</span></sub>) are the
coordinates of three vertexes of an equilateral triangle. This equilateral
triangle denotes the position of the virus on the very first day and (x, y) is
your location in Cartesian coordinate system. From the very next day (Day 2)
this bacteria will start to grow following the rule mentioned in the problem
statement. All the floating point number in the input file has 10 digits after
the decimal point. The inputs will be such that precision error will not be a
problem if you use double-precision floating point numbers.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output </span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each line of input produce
one line of output. If the bacteria can reach you within Day 14 then you should
produce a line The bacterium destroys you within day d. ESCAPE!!, where d is
the number of days the bacteria takes to reach you. If the bacteria cannot
reach you within day 14 (inclusive) then produce the line You are safe :)
instead (If you are still confused  your program should never print a number
greater than 14 but can print 14 sometimes :).<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> 
</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>       </span><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                     </span><o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem G</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Cache Simulator</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input</span></span><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial;color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output </span><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify'>Cache is a special type of memory
providing very small latency for accessing. The basic idea of using cache is to
keep recently used data close to processors. So, modern processors use small
cache along with large main memory. Program performance depends on the cache
performance. If data is found in cache (Hit), execution can proceed normally.
On the other hand if data is not found in cache, execution stalls until that
data is fetched from main memory. <span class=GramE>Computer architects always
looks</span> for miss rate of cache (#of misses per 100 accesses). </p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify'>When a miss occurs, the new
data is kept in the cache and some existing data is removed from cache. There
are several policies to select which one to evict. A common technique used in
any computer systems is LRU (Least Recently Used). According to this scheme,
the data that has not been used for longest time is evicted. Let us explain how
this scheme works  </p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify'>Assume a cache with 4 entries.
So, if the processor accesses data 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 2, 3, 99, 2, 5, 4 the
following things will occur - </p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:.5pt solid windowtext;
 mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>
  <td width=197 valign=top style='width:2.05in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoBodyText><b>Cache<o:p></o:p></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=197 valign=top style='width:2.05in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoBodyText><b>Hit/Miss<o:p></o:p></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=197 valign=top style='width:2.05in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoBodyText><b>Data evicted<o:p></o:p></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1'>
  <td width=197 valign=top style='width:2.05in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;

  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoBodyText><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  </td>

  </td>
  <td width=197 valign=top style='width:2.05in;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoBodyText>Miss (4)</p>
  </td>
  <td width=197 valign=top style='width:2.05in;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoBodyText>3</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:12;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=197 valign=top style='width:2.05in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoBodyText>2 4 5 99</p>
  </td>
  <td width=197 valign=top style='width:2.05in;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoBodyText><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  </td>
  <td width=197 valign=top style='width:2.05in;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoBodyText><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoBodyText><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify'>Here for 11 data references, we
have 7 misses. In this problem you have to find the number of misses for
different cache sizes. You will be given data references in several ways  </p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:0in;
margin-left:1.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;
mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;tab-stops:list 1.5in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='mso-list:Ignore'>a)<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span><![endif]>ADDR<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>      </span>x<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>    </span><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>    </span>:<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> 
</span>Processor will access data x</p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:0in;
margin-left:1.5in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;
mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;tab-stops:list 1.5in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='mso-list:Ignore'>b)<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span><![endif]>RANGE<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>b y n:
Processor will access all data references in the form <span class=SpellE>b+y</span>*k,
where k is 0<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>to n-1<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>   </span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify'>Your will also be given
commands STAT to print the number of misses for each cache (excluding the
misses occurred before last STAT command). The above example can be abstracted
in the following way  </p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-left:1.75in;text-indent:-1.25in'><span
style='font-family:"Courier New"'>RANGE 1 <span class=SpellE>1</span> 5<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>     </span>RANGE 2 1 2<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>     </span>ADDR<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  
</span>99<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>     </span>STAT<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>               
</span>---------------------------------- 6<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>     </span>ADDR<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  
</span>2<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>     </span>RANGE 5 1 2<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>     </span>STAT<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                </span>----------------------------------
1<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h5 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify'>Your program starts with a
positive integer N (1&lt;=N&lt;=30), which is the number of caches. The next
line contains size of each cache (in increasing order). Cache size will be at
least 2 but not exceeding 2<sup>20</sup>. The next few lines will contain any
of RANGE, ADDR, or STAT. The last line will contain STAT. Total number of data
references (all data accessed by processor) will not exceed 10<sup>7</sup>. For
the sample input, total number of data references is 30 (5+2+1+1+2+10+5+4). Also,
the processor uses 24-bit address, no data reference will exceed 2<sup>24</sup>-1
and will be non-negative. The value of b, y, n (in RANGE), and x (in ADDR) will
be consistent with all restrictions. Input is terminated by a line containing
END. The input file has around 20000 lines of inputs.</p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></span></h4>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Output
</span></span><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoBodyText>For each STAT <span class=GramE>command just print</span> the
number of misses (as described above) in a line.</p>

<h1 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:normal;
mso-bidi-font-style:italic'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></h1>

<h1 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal;mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                             </span>Output for Sample
Input</span><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>2<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>4 8<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>RANGE 1 <span class=SpellE>1</span> 5<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>RANGE 2 1 2<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>ADDR<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>   </span>99<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>STAT<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                </span><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>ADDR<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>   </span>2<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>RANGE 5 -1 2<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>STAT<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                </span><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>RANGE 0 10000 10<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>RANGE 0 20000 5<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>RANGE 0 30000 4<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>STAT<o:p></o:p></span></b></pre><pre><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>END</span></b><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
  12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=309 valign=top style='width:231.85pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'>6 <span class=SpellE>6</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'>1 0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New"'>18 13<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  color:black'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>

<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;

	{mso-style-name:"Table Grid";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;

	mso-border-insideh:.5pt solid windowtext;
	mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid windowtext;
	mso-para-margin:0in;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-ansi-language:#0400;
	mso-fareast-language:#0400;
	mso-bidi-language:#0400;}
</style>
<![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="6146"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633CC" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem H</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>GCD Extreme</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Given the value of N, you will
have to find the value of G. The definition of G is given below:</p>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=327 valign=top style='width:245.5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><i
  style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='position:relative;top:15.0pt;
  mso-text-raise:-15.0pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype id="_x0000_t75"
   coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t" path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe"
   filled="f" stroked="f">
   <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
   <v:formulas>
    <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
   </v:formulas>
   <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
   <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
  </v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:135.75pt;
   height:45pt' o:ole=" >
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/h_files/image003.wmz"  o:title=" />
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=181 height=60
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/h_files/image003.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></span><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
   <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1025"
    DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1266820652">
   </o:OLEObject>
  </xml><![endif]--><o:p></o:p></i></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Here <span class=GramE>GCD(</span><span
class=SpellE>i,j</span>) means the greatest common divisor of integer <span
class=SpellE>i</span> and integer j.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For those who have trouble understanding
summation notation, the meaning of G is given in the following code:</p>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoTableGrid border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=390 valign=top style='width:292.5pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>G=0;<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>for(<span
  class=SpellE>i</span>=1;i&lt;<span class=SpellE>N;i</span>++)<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>for(j=i+1;j&lt;=<span
  class=SpellE>N;j</span>++)<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>{<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'><span
  style='mso-spacerun:yes'>    </span>G+=<span class=SpellE>gcd</span>(<span
  class=SpellE>i,j</span>);<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>}<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>/*Here
  <span class=SpellE>gcd</span>() is a function that finds the greatest common
  divisor of the two input numbers*/<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt0><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt0><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input file contains at most 20000
lines of inputs. Each line contains an integer N (1&lt;N&lt;200001). The
meaning of N is given in the problem statement. Input is terminated by a line
containing a single zero.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt0><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output </span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt0><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>For each line of
input produce one line of output. This line contains the value of G for the
corresponding N. The value of G will fit in a 64-bit signed integer.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                              </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=313 valign=top style='width:234.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>10<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:center 112.05pt;mso-layout-grid-align:
  none;text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>100<span style='mso-tab-count:1'>              </span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>20000<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=330 valign=top style='width:247.5pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>67<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>13015<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1153104356<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

class=SpellE><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:

	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
p.text, li.text, div.text
	{mso-style-name:text;
	mso-margin-top-alt:auto;
