	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:8.0pt;
	font-family:Verdana;
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
p.PreformattedText, li.PreformattedText, div.PreformattedText
	{mso-style-name:"Preformatted Text";
	margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:none;
	mso-hyphenate:none;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Courier New";}
p.NormalArial, li.NormalArial, div.NormalArial
	{mso-style-name:"Normal + Arial\,Bold";
	margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:Arial;
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	color:black;
	font-weight:bold;}
span.StyleArial16pt
	{mso-style-name:"Style Arial 16 pt";
	mso-ansi-font-size:16.0pt;
	font-family:Arial;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;
	mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
	font-weight:bold;}
span.SpellE
	{mso-style-name:" ;
	mso-spl-e:yes;}
span.GramE
	{mso-style-name:" ;
	mso-gram-e:yes;}
@page Section1
	{size:595.45pt 841.7pt;
	margin:.8in .8in 67.7pt .8in;
	mso-header-margin:.5in;
	mso-footer-margin:.5in;
	mso-paper-source:0;}
div.Section1
	{page:Section1;}
-->
</style>
<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-parent:" ;
	mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin:0in;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-ansi-language:#0400;
	mso-fareast-language:#0400;
	mso-bidi-language:#0400;}
</style>
<![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="14338"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link="#009999" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem I</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Collecting Luggage EXTREME </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b>S<span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>tandard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span lang=EN-GB>Collecting your luggage after a flight
can be far from trivial. Suitcases and bags appear on a conveyor <span
class=GramE>belt,</span> and hundreds of passengers fight for a good vantage
point from which to find and retrieve their belongings. Recently, the Narita
Airport Authority has decided to make this process more efficient. Before
redesigning their baggage claim areas, they need a simulation program to
determine how average passengers behave when collecting their luggage. This
simulation assumes that passengers will always take a path of straight line
segments to reach their luggage in the least amount of time. </span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span lang=EN-GB>For this problem, a conveyor belt is <span
class=SpellE>modeled</span> as a simple polygon. A luggage piece appears on
some point of the conveyor belt, and then moves along the conveyor belt at a
constant speed. A passenger is initially positioned at some point outside the
conveyor belt polygon. As soon as the piece of luggage appears, the passenger
moves at a constant speed in order to pick up the luggage. The passenger's
path, which may not cross over the conveyer belt but may touch it, puts the
passenger in the same position as the moving piece of luggage in the least
amount of time. </span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span lang=EN-GB>In the following figure, the conveyor
belt is depicted as a polygon ABCDEF. The luggage starts at the top-left corner
(Point A) and moves in <span class=SpellE>counterclockwise</span> direction
around the polygon as shown with the small arrows. The passenger begins at
point P and moves on the path that puts him and the luggage into the same place
(point M in the figure) in the shortest amount of time. The passenger's path is
shown by a red arrow. This figure corresponds to the first sample input.</span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span lang=EN-GB><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype id="_x0000_t75"
 coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t" path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe"
 filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:480.75pt;
 height:184.5pt'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/i_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=641 height=246
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/i_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span lang=EN-GB style='mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span></span></p>

<h5><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span lang=EN-GB>The input consists of at most 100 test
cases describing luggage pickup scenarios. A scenario description begins with a
line containing a single integer <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>N
(3&lt;=N&lt;=</i>100), the number of vertices of the conveyor belt polygon.
This is followed by <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>N</i> lines, each
containing a pair of integers <span class=GramE><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>x</i><span class=SpellE><span style='font-size:9.5pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt;position:relative;top:3.5pt;mso-text-raise:-3.5pt'>i</span></span><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>,</span> <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>y</i></span><span
class=SpellE><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:9.5pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
position:relative;top:3.5pt;mso-text-raise:-3.5pt'>i</span></span><span
lang=EN-GB><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>(|<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>x</i></span><span class=SpellE><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:9.5pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;position:relative;top:3.5pt;mso-text-raise:-3.5pt'>i</span></span><span
lang=EN-GB>|,|<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>y</i></span><span
class=SpellE><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:9.5pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
position:relative;top:3.5pt;mso-text-raise:-3.5pt'>i</span></span><span
lang=EN-GB>|&lt;=10000) giving the coordinates of the vertices of the polygon
in <span class=SpellE>counterclockwise</span> order. The polygon is simple,
that is, it will not intersect itself and it will not touch itself. The polygon
description is followed by a line containing two integers <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>p</i></span><span lang=EN-GB style='font-size:9.5pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt;position:relative;top:3.5pt;mso-text-raise:-3.5pt'>x</span><span
lang=EN-GB>, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>p</i></span><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:9.5pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;position:relative;
top:3.5pt;mso-text-raise:-3.5pt'>y</span><span lang=EN-GB><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>(|<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>p</i></span><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:9.5pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;position:relative;
top:3.5pt;mso-text-raise:-3.5pt'>x</span><span lang=EN-GB>|<span class=GramE>,|</span><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>p</i></span><span lang=EN-GB
style='font-size:9.5pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;position:relative;top:3.5pt;
mso-text-raise:-3.5pt'>y</span><span lang=EN-GB>|&lt;=10000), the coordinates
of the starting position of the passenger. The last line of the description
contains two positive integers <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>V</i></span><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:9.5pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;position:relative;
top:3.5pt;mso-text-raise:-3.5pt'>L</span><span lang=EN-GB><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>and <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>V</i></span><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:9.5pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;position:relative;
top:3.5pt;mso-text-raise:-3.5pt'>P</span><span lang=EN-GB><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>(0&lt;<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>V</i></span><span
lang=EN-GB style='font-size:9.5pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;position:relative;
top:3.5pt;mso-text-raise:-3.5pt'>L</span><span class=GramE><span lang=EN-GB>,<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>V</i></span><span lang=EN-GB
style='font-size:9.5pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;position:relative;top:3.5pt;
mso-text-raise:-3.5pt'>P</span></span><span lang=EN-GB>&lt;=10000), which are
the speed of the luggage and the passenger respectively. All the coordinates
are given in meters, and the speeds are given in meters per minute.</span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span lang=EN-GB>You can assume that the passenger is
positioned outside the conveyor belt polygon. The luggage will move in <span
class=SpellE>counterclockwise</span> direction around the conveyor belt,
starting at the first vertex of the polygon. </span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span lang=EN-GB>The input is terminated by a line
containing a single integer zero. </span></p>

<h4 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></span></h4>

<h4 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Output
<o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span lang=EN-GB>For each test case, print a line
containing the test case number (beginning with 1) followed by the minimum time
that it takes the passenger to reach the luggage. Use the formatting shown in
the sample output (with minutes and seconds separated by a colon), rounded to
the nearest second. The value for seconds should be printed in a field of width
two (padded with leading zeroes if required).</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal;mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                 </span><span style='mso-tab-count:
2'>            </span><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>     </span>Output for
Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=PreformattedText><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>6 <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=PreformattedText><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>0 40 <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=PreformattedText><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>0 <span class=SpellE>0</span> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=PreformattedText><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>20 0 <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=PreformattedText><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>20 <span class=SpellE>20</span> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=PreformattedText><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>40 20 <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=PreformattedText><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>40 <span class=SpellE>40</span> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=PreformattedText><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>120 40 <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=PreformattedText><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>70 100 <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=PreformattedText><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>4<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=PreformattedText><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>0 <span class=SpellE>0</span> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=PreformattedText><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>10 0 <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=PreformattedText><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>10 <span class=SpellE>10</span> <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=PreformattedText><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>0 10 <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=PreformattedText><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>100 <span class=SpellE>100</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=PreformattedText><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>10 11<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=PreformattedText><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <pre><span style='font-size:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></pre></td>
  <td width=324 valign=top style='width:243.0pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=PreformattedText style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>Case 1:
  Time = 1:02<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=PreformattedText style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<title>Problem J - GCD Extreme (II)</title>

<style>
<!--
 /* Font Definitions */
 @font-face
	{font-family:"MS Mincho";
	panose-1:2 2 6 9 4 2 5 8 3 4;
	mso-font-alt:"\FF2D\FF33 \660E\671D";
	mso-font-charset:128;
	mso-generic-font-family:modern;
	mso-font-pitch:fixed;
	mso-font-signature:-1610612033 1757936891 16 0 131231 0;}
@font-face
	{font-family:"Arial Unicode MS";
	panose-1:2 11 6 4 2 2 2 2 2 4;
	mso-font-charset:128;
	mso-generic-font-family:swiss;
	mso-font-pitch:variable;
	mso-font-signature:-1 -369098753 63 0 4129279 0;}

<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */

 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="13314"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link="#009999" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem J</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>GCD Extreme (II)</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Given the value of N, you will
have to find the value of G. The definition of G is given below:</p>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=327 valign=top style='width:245.5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><i
  style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='position:relative;top:15.0pt;
  mso-text-raise:-15.0pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype id="_x0000_t75"
   coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t" path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe"
   filled="f" stroked="f">
   <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
   <v:formulas>
    <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
   </v:formulas>
   <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
   <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
  </v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:135.75pt;
   height:45pt' o:ole=" >
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/j_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=181 height=60
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/j_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></span><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
   <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1025"
    DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1266845558">
   </o:OLEObject>
  </xml><![endif]--><o:p></o:p></i></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Here <span class=GramE>GCD(</span><span
class=SpellE>i,j</span>) means the greatest common divisor of integer <span
class=SpellE>i</span> and integer j.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For those who have trouble
understanding summation notation, the meaning of G is given in the following
code:</p>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoTableGrid border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=390 valign=top style='width:292.5pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>G=0;<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>for(<span
  class=SpellE>i</span>=1;i&lt;<span class=SpellE>N;i</span>++)<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>for(j=i+1;j&lt;=<span
  class=SpellE>N;j</span>++)<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>{<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'><span
  style='mso-spacerun:yes'>    </span>G+=<span class=SpellE>gcd</span>(<span
  class=SpellE>i,j</span>);<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>}<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>/*Here
  <span class=SpellE>gcd</span>() is a function that finds the greatest common
  divisor of the two input numbers*/<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input file contains at most 100
lines of inputs. Each line contains an integer N (1&lt;N&lt;4000001). The
meaning of N is given in the problem statement. Input is terminated by a line
containing a single zero.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>For each line
of input produce one line of output. This line contains the value of G for the
corresponding N. The value of G will fit in a 64-bit signed integer.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                              </span>Output for Sample
Input<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=313 valign=top style='width:234.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>10<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>100<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>200000<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=330 valign=top style='width:247.5pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>67<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>13015<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>143295493160<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=SpellE><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:
Arial'>Problemsetter</span></b></span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-family:Arial'>: <span class=SpellE>Shahriar</span> Manzoor<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Special
Thanks: <span class=SpellE>Syed</span> <span class=SpellE>Monowar</span> <span
class=SpellE>Hossain</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<title>Problem A - Expect the Expected</title>
<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem A</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Expect the Expected </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=GramE><b>Some mathematical
background.</b></span> This problem asks you to compute the expected value of a
random variable. If you haven't seen those before, the simple definitions are
as follows. A <i>random variable</i> is a variable that can have one of several
values, each with a certain probability. The probabilities of each possible
value are positive and add up to one. The <i>expected value</i> of a random
variable is simply the sum of all its possible values, each multiplied by the
corresponding probability. (There are some more complicated, more general
definitions, but you won't need them now.) For example, the value of a fair,
6-sided die is a random variable that has 6 possible values (from 1 to 6), each
with a probability of <nobr>1/6</nobr>. Its expected value is <nobr>1/6</nobr>
+ <nobr>2/6</nobr> + ... + <nobr>6/6</nobr> = <nobr>3.5</nobr>. <span
class=GramE>Now the problem.</span> </p>

<p class=paragraph style='text-align:justify'>I like to play solitaire. Each
time I play a game, I have probability <b>p</b> of solving it and probability <nobr>(1-<b>p</b>)</nobr>
of failing. The game keeps statistics of all my games - what percentage of
games I have won. If I simply keep playing for a long time, this percentage
will always hover somewhere around <nobr><b>p</b>*100%</nobr>. But I want more.
</p>

<p class=paragraph style='text-align:justify'>Here is my plan. Every day, I
will play a game of solitaire. If I win, I'll go to sleep happy until the next day.
If I lose, I'll keep playing until the fraction of games I have won today
becomes larger than <b>p</b>. At this point, I'll declare victory and go to
sleep. As you can see, at the end of each day, I'm guaranteed to always keep my
statistics above the expected <nobr><b>p</b>*100%</nobr>. I will have beaten
mathematics! </p>

<p class=paragraph style='text-align:justify'>If your intuition is telling you
that something here must break, then you are right. I can't keep doing this
forever because there is a limit on the number of games I can play in one day.
Let's say that I can play at most <b>n</b> games in one day. How many days can
I <i>expect</i> to be able to continue with my clever plan before it fails?
Note that the answer is always at least 1 because it takes me a whole day of
playing to reach a failure. </p>

<h2><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></h2>

<p class=paragraph style='text-align:justify'>The first line of input gives the
number of cases, <b>N</b>. <b>N</b> test cases follow. Each one is a line
containing <b>p</b> (as a fraction) and <b>n</b>. </p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>1 &#8804; <b>N</b> &#8804; 3000, 0 &#8804; <b>p</b>
&lt; 1,</p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>The denominator of <b>p</b> will be at most 1000,</p>

<p style='text-align:justify'><span class=GramE>1 &#8804; <b>n</b> &#8804; 100.</span>
</p>

<h2><span style='font-family:Arial'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></h2>

<h2><span style='font-family:Arial'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></h2>

<h2><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></h2>

<p class=paragraph style='text-align:justify'>For each test case, print a line
of the form &quot;Case #<b>x</b>: <b>y</b>&quot;, where <b>y</b> is the
expected number of days, rounded down to the nearest integer. The answer will
always be at most 1000 and will never be within 0.001 of a round-off error
case.</p>

<p class=paragraph><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span>Output for Sample Input</span></b><span style='font-size:16.0pt'> <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%"
 style='width:100.0%;mso-cellspacing:0in;border:outset black 1.0pt;mso-border-alt:
 outset black .75pt;mso-padding-alt:3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width="50%" valign=top style='width:50.58%;border:inset black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:inset black .75pt;background:#D0D0D0;padding:3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt'><pre>4</pre><pre>1/2 1</pre><pre>1/2 2</pre><pre>0/1 10</pre><pre>1/2 3<o:p></o:p></pre></td>
  <td width="49%" valign=top style='width:49.42%;border:inset black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:inset black .75pt;background:#D0D0D0;padding:3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt 3.75pt'><!-- Sample output goes below the next line --><pre>Case #1: 2</pre><pre>Case #2: 2</pre><pre>Case #3: 1</pre><pre>Case #4: 2</pre></td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=SpellE><b><span style='font-family:Arial'>Problemsetter</span></b></span><b><span
style='font-family:Arial'>: Igor <span class=SpellE>Naverniouk</span></span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'> <o:p></o:p></span></p>

class=SpellE>Chu</span></span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'> <o:p></o:p></span></p>

</div>

</body>

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633CC" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem B</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Cubes </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b>Input: </b>Standard Input</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'>Standard
Output </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Given a positive integer N you
will have to find two positive integers x and y such that:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='position:relative;top:5.0pt;mso-text-raise:-5.0pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1027" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:77.25pt;
 height:24pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/b_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=103 height=32
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/b_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1027"><![endif]></span><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1027"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1267556202">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>&nbsp;</p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=stylearial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt'>Input</span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input file contains at most 10o
lines of inputs. Each line contains a positive integer N (0&lt;N&#8804;10000).
Input is terminated by a line containing a single zero. This line should not be
processed.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<h4><span class=stylearial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt'>Output </span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each line of input produce
one or more lines of output. Each of these lines contains two positive integers
x, y separated by a single space, such that<sub><img width=94 height=28
id="_x0000_i1025" src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/b_files/image001.wmz" ></sub>. If there is no such
integer values of x and y then produce the line No solution instead. If there
is more than one solution then output the one with smallest value of y.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Output for Sample Input</span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>7</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>37</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>12</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:none'><b><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>&nbsp;</span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=309 valign=top style='width:231.85pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2
  1</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>4
  3</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>No
  solution</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>&nbsp;</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

style='font-family:Arial'>Problemsetter</span></b></span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

Manzoor<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<meta content="  name=Author>
<meta content="  name=Keywords>
<meta content="  name=Description>
<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="17410"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->

<body lang=EN-US link="#772222" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem C</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:18.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>Randomness </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input</span></span><span style='font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output </span><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
text-autospace:none'>Efficient generation of &quot;true&quot; random numbers is
an interesting problem in Computer Science.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> 
</span>The reasonably fast random number generators (<span class=SpellE>RNGs</span>)
that are provided in code libraries are usually merely
&quot;pseudorandom&quot;.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>They have a
finite cycle length and their low-order bits can be predictable to some extent.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
text-autospace:none'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
text-autospace:none'>Even if the <span class=SpellE>RNGs</span> themselves
could be perfect, their common usage is not.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> 
</span>For instance, if you have a function that returns a true random integer
between 1 and 100 inclusive, and you want to choose between three events, each
with probability 1/3, you cannot do it with just one RNG call.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
text-autospace:none'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
text-autospace:none'>However, if we allow for making more RNG calls if necessary,
it is possible to achieve a perfectly uniform distribution over the three
events.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>In fact, any perfect RNG can be
used to choose among ANY set of events and associated probabilities with
perfect accuracy.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
text-autospace:none'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
text-autospace:none'>Assume that you have access to a perfect RNG that returns
numbers between 1 and R inclusive, and the desired probabilities of N disjoint
events.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>You must determine an algorithm
that uses the RNG to choose among the events with exactly the correct
probability, while minimizing the expected (average) number of RNG calls.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><i><span style='color:black;
mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></i></b></p>

<h4 style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input</span></b><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></b></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
text-autospace:none'>Input will consist of at most 32 cases, each consisting of
two lines.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>The first line will contain
two integers, R and N, satisfying 2 &#8804; R &#8804; 1000 and 2 &#8804; N &#8804;
1000.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>The second line will contain N
pairs of integers <span class=SpellE>a<sub>i</sub></span> and b<sub>i</sub>,
with 1 &lt;= <span class=SpellE>a<sub>i</sub></span> &lt; b<sub>i</sub> &lt;=
1000.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>The desired probability of event <span
class=SpellE>i</span> is <span class=SpellE>a<sub>i</sub></span> /b<sub>i</sub>.<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>The sum of the N probabilities will be 1.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
text-autospace:none'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
text-autospace:none'>Input will be terminated by a line containing two zeros.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-fareast-language:
ZH-CN'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<h4><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-layout-grid-align:none;
text-autospace:none'>For each case, output, rounded to six fractional digits,
the minimum expected number of random number generator calls required to decide
among the events.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-layout-grid-align:none'><b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left;tab-stops:.5in'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:
normal'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                               </span>Output for
Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%"
 style='width:100.0%;background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;
 mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width="48%" valign=top style='width:48.76%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>100 3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>1 3 1 3 1 3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>2 4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>1 4 1 4 1 4 1 4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-fareast-font-family:SimSun;mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'>0 <span
  class=SpellE>0</span><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-fareast-font-family:
  SimSun;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width="51%" valign=top style='width:51.24%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1.010101<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2.000000<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-fareast-font-family:
  SimSun;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-fareast-language:ZH-CN'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>

</table>

lang=EN style='mso-ansi-language:EN'>

 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633CC" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem D</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>ETS Problem Setting </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>ETS is <span class=GramE>an</span>
QSA based organization that conducts ETS (Extra Terrestrial Scholastic) Exams
to allow Extra Terrestrial beings (Aliens) to study in QSA. Many aliens being
afraid of ETS exams, study in Euphoria instead. Each year billions of ETS exams
are conducted as more than a trillion Aliens appear in it from all planets of
the universe to get the coveted opportunity of studying in QSA. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>As billions of exams are
conducted so it is simply impossible for ETS to set new questions for ETS
exams. That is why they use the same math problem in many exams by changing the
figures/numbers only. For each math problem they write an intelligent program
that can change the figures or numbers intelligently. Lets consider a typical
ETS math problem now:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>A dice with n faces are thrown. All the faces are equally likely to
appear on top. The numbers 1, 2, 3<span class=GramE>, 
,</span> n are written
on the n faces. So the sample space of the event that denotes the number
appearing on the top of the dice is S<span class=GramE>={</span>1, 2, 3, 4, 
,
n}. Event A is defined as {a</i><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><sub><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>1</span></sub>, a</i><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>2</span></sub>, <span
class=GramE>a<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>3</span></sub>, 
}</span>
and Event B is defined as {b</i><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><sub><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>1</span></sub>, b</i><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>2</span></sub>, b</i><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>3</span></sub><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>
}. Now please verify whether or not event A
and B are independent with each other. <o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Now it is obvious that for
different values of n and different definition of event A and B, these two events
can be dependent or independent. But if values of n, A, B are randomly chosen
then the in most cases A and B will be dependent. So an intelligent program is
needed to assign the values of n, A and B. Your task in this problem is
something similar. Given the values of n you will have to find the number of
event pairs which are independent. An event is a subset of the sample space.
For example the event {1, 2, <span class=GramE>4</span>} denotes that the dice
shows 1, 2 or 4. No event can be empty in a valid independent event pair. For
n=3 the sample space of the dice (A dice with three faces!!!)<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span><span class=GramE>is</span> {1, 2, 3} and
there are 13 possible independent event pairs. These are:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>(1) {1<span class=GramE>}<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>{</span>1,2,3}</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>(2) {2<span class=GramE>}<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>{</span>1,2,3}</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>(3) {1<span class=GramE>,2</span>}<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>{1,2,3}</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>(4) {3<span class=GramE>}<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>{</span>1,2,3}</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>(5) {1<span class=GramE>,3</span>}<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>{1,2,3}</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>(6) {2<span class=GramE>,3</span>}<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>{1,2,3}</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>(7) {1<span class=GramE>,2,3</span>}<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>{1}</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>(8) {1<span class=GramE>,2,3</span>}<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>{2}</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>(9) {1<span class=GramE>,2,3</span>}<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>{1,2}</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>(10) {1<span class=GramE>,2,3</span>}<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>{3}</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>(11) {1<span class=GramE>,2,3</span>}<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>{1,3}</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>(12) {1<span class=GramE>,2,3</span>}<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>{2,3}</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>(13) {1<span class=GramE>,2,3</span>}<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>{1,2,3}<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> 
</span><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>     </span><o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Two events A and B are
independent if and only if <span class=GramE>P(</span>AB)=P(A)*P(B).</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input file contains at most
200 lines of inputs. Each line contains an integer n(0&lt;n&lt;1001). Input is
terminated by a line containing a single zero. This line should not be
processed.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output </span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>For each line
of input produce one line of output. This line contains an integer which
denotes the value P modulo 100000000. Here P is the number of independent event
pairs that can be created from the sample space {1, 2, 3<span class=GramE>, 
,</span>
n}. P can be a very large number for larger values of n. So you are asked to
print the modulo 100000000 value.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                            </span>Output for Sample
Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=301 valign=top style='width:225.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>6<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>50<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=315 valign=top style='width:236.35pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>5<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>13<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>845<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>18954245<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>

</table>

<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>

 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633CC" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem E</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Partitioning <span class=GramE>a</span>
Number</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><i><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=GramE><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
color:windowtext;mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>let</span></span><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext;mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>
f(n) be the number of ways to write n as a sum of powers of 2. Each power can
be used at most twice For <span class=GramE>example,</span> there are five ways
to partition 10:<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext;
mso-bidi-font-style:italic'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext;
mso-bidi-font-style:italic'><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>8+<span
class=GramE>2<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>8</span>+1+1<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>4+4+2<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> 
</span>4+4+1+1<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>4+2+2+1+1<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext;
mso-bidi-font-style:italic'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext;
mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>So we have <span class=GramE>f(</span>10)=5. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext;
mso-bidi-font-style:italic'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext;
mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>Given n, find the maximal value among <span
class=GramE>f(</span>0),f(1),...,f(n).<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><i><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input contains at most 1000
test cases. Each test case contains a single line containing an integer n (1 &#8804;
n &#8804; 10<sup><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>18</span></sup>). The
last test case is followed by a single zero, which should not be processed.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output</span></b><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:16.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each test case, print the
case number and the maximal value from <span class=GramE>f(</span>0) to f(n).
Look at the output for sample input for details.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample Input <span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                              </span>Output for Sample
Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=322 valign=top style='width:3.35in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>10<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>87<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>3456<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>1000000000<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=322 valign=top style='width:3.35in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 1: 3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 2: 5<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 3: 21<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 4: 233<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 5: 1346269<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><o:p></o:p></b></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633CC" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem F</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Busy Programmer </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'>Our
famous programmer <span class=SpellE>Gordov</span> Mia (Mr. Donkey) is having a
very busy time in his office. His erratic boss has assigned him to two projects
(project MICRO &amp; project GOO) at the same time. Consequently, problems have
occurred while making a feasible work schedule for him. The boss needs to
submit a report to the CEO specifying the schedule of work for all the
resources working under him for a period of 2D days. <span class=SpellE>Gordov</span>
must work D days on each project. He doesnt work more than a single project on
a particular day. <span class=SpellE>Gordov</span> must finish the work of the
project he started earlier (i.e. on the first day of the schedule) first. As
the progress of both the projects depends on him, he can not be away from any
project for more than G consecutive days. (<span class=GramE>of</span> course
unless a project is already complete.) For example, if D = 3 &amp; G = 2, there
can be ten valid schedules,</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<table class=MsoTableGrid border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>
  <td width=81 valign=top style='width:60.85pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  </td>
  <td width=81 valign=top style='width:60.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'>Day
  1</p>
  </td>
  <td width=81 valign=top style='width:60.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'>Day
  2</p>
  </td>
  <td width=81 valign=top style='width:60.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'>Day
  3</p>
  </td>
  <td width=81 valign=top style='width:60.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'>Day
  4</p>
  </td>
  <td width=81 valign=top style='width:60.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;

  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'>MICRO</p>

  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'>GOO</p>

  border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'>MICRO</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'>Now,
Given D &amp; G, you are to determine the number of possible schedules with the
given constraints.</p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></span></h5>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'>There
are around 2400 test cases in the input file. Every test case has two
non-negative integers, D &amp; G (D,G&lt;=33) on a line by itself. A case with
D = G = -1 terminates the input. This case must not be processed.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output </span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'>For
each test case, print a line in the format <b>Case x: y </b>where <b>x </b>is
the case number &amp; <b>y </b>is the number of possible schedules.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                               </span>Output
for Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                                     </span><o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width=649
 style='width:486.9pt;background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;
 mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=325 valign=top style='width:243.45pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>3 2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>3 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>-1 -1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=325 valign=top style='width:243.45pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 1: 10<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 2: 2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="4098"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
