<body lang=EN-US link="#6633CC" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem G</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>A Dicey Dice </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_s1040" type="#_x0000_t75" style='position:absolute;
 left:0;text-align:left;margin-left:0;margin-top:71pt;width:153.45pt;height:149.05pt;
 z-index:1;mso-position-horizontal:left'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/g_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
 <w:wrap type="square"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=205 height=199
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/g_files/image001.png"  align=left hspace=12 v:shapes="_x0000_s1040"><![endif]>A
dice can become dicey when all its sides dont have equal probability of
appearing on the top. A conventional dice has the shape of a perfect cube and
has six faces. This six faces have 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 and 6 written on them (Exactly
one of these values of course). So for a conventional dice the probability of
each side appearing on the top <span class=GramE>is </span><sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:12pt;height:30.75pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/g_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=16 height=41
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/g_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1025"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1267558122">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->. Now the dicey dice we will be considering in this problem
has different probabilities for the appearance on top for each side. To be specific
the probability of appearance of the sides 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 on the top of a
dice with six faced <span class=GramE>is </span><sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1026" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:17.25pt;height:30.75pt'
 o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/g_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=23 height=41
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/g_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1026"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1267558124">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->, <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1027" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:17.25pt;height:30.75pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/g_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=23 height=41
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/g_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1027"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1027"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1267558125">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->, <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1028" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:17.25pt;height:30.75pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/g_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=23 height=41
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/g_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1028"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1028"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1267558126">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->, <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1029" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:17.25pt;height:30.75pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/g_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=23 height=41
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/g_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1029"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1029"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1267558127">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->, <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1030" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:17.25pt;height:30.75pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/g_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=23 height=41
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/g_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1030"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1030"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1267558128">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->and <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1031"
 type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:17.25pt;height:30.75pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/g_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=23 height=41
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/g_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1031"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1031"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1267558129">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>respectively
(Probability proportional to their values). When N such a dice with K faces are
thrown, the probability that the summation of the numbers on the top is S can
be expressed as a fraction<sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1032"
 type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:69.75pt;height:51.75pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/g_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=93 height=69
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/g_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1032"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1032"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1267558130">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->. Your job is to find <span class=GramE>the modulo</span>
100000007 value of v for a given value of N, K and S.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input</span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input file contains at most
70 sets of inputs. The description of each set is given below:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Each set is contained in a single
line. This line contains three non-negative integers N (0&lt;N&lt;1001), <span
class=GramE>K(</span>0&lt;K&lt;1001) and S(S&lt;15001). The meaning of N, K and
S are given in the problem statement.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>Input is terminated by a line containing two zeroes. This
line should not be processed.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output </span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each line of input produce
one line of output. This line contains an integer which is the modulo 100000007
value of v. The meaning of v is given in the problem statement.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                            </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=301 valign=top style='width:225.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>

  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>1 6 3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>2 100 10<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span

  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>2 9 8<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>500 6 1000<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";

  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span

  font-family:"Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span

style='font-family:Arial'>: <span class=SpellE>Shahriar</span> Manzoor<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>The
dice picture is collected from <a
href="http://www.joe-ks.com/archives_may2007/EscherDice.htm">http://www.joe-ks.com/archives_may2007/EscherDice.htm</a>

<title>Problem H - The Careless Postman Problem</title>

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633CC" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem H</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><span class=GramE><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:20.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>The</span></b></span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
24.0pt;font-family:Arial'> Careless Postman Problem</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Once upon a time, there was a
postman in china, who walked all through the city to deliver letters. He wanted
to cover this path in shortest time, and thus created the famous Chinese
Postman Problem.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Now, after quite a long time, a
similar problem arose to a postman. Like the Chinese postman, he also delivers
letters walking through the roads. But due to his careless nature, he often
delivers them really late, and if you are too unlucky, he might lose the
letters as well. So, people are really angry at him. Since, our postman knows
about that, he has no intention of facing them. So, he started delivering them,
in disguise. But that also has problems too. People may be deceived by his
disguise for 1 or 2 times, but they will recognize him, if they meet him over
and over. For each road <span class=SpellE><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>e<sub>i</sub></i></span>,
he may traverse the road at most <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>p<sub>i</sub></i>
times. On the other hand, he doesnt like to stay on the same road for long
time. So, each time he traverses, he only delivers one letter. So, if he need
to deliver <span class=SpellE><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>q<sub>i</sub></i></span>
letters along a path, he has to traverse it at least <span class=SpellE><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>q<sub>i</sub></i></span> times.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Now, given the road network,
number of letters to deliver along each road and maximum number of time, a road
can be traversed, find the shortest time the postman needs to deliver all the letters.
All roads are unidirectional. </p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt0><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></span></h5>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt0><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt0><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal>First line of input contains an integer T, the number of
test cases. Each test case starts with two integers, n and m, the number of
vertices and number of edges. The following m lines each contain 5 integers, <span
class=SpellE>u<sub>i</sub></span>, <span class=GramE>v<sub>i</sub></span>, <span
class=SpellE>t<sub>i</sub></span>, <span class=SpellE>q<sub>i</sub></span> and
p<sub>i</sub>, which denotes an edge from <span class=SpellE>u<sub>i</sub></span>
to v<sub>i</sub>, which required <span class=SpellE>t<sub>i</sub></span> time
for the postman to travel. <span class=SpellE><span class=GramE>q<sub>i</sub></span></span>
is the number of letters to deliver along the path, and p<sub>i</sub> is the
maximum number of times the road can be traversed. The postman can start from
any vertex, but has to return to that vertex, after delivering all the letters.
You can assume that (a) The graph is connected and (b) Every vertex has at
least one road leading out of it with a required delivery.<span
style='mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Constraints:<o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>·<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>T</i> &#8804;
100</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>·<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]>1 &#8804;<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>
N</i><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>&#8804; 100, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>M</i> &#8804; <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>N * (N  1) / 2</i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>·<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]>1 &#8804; <span class=SpellE><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>u<sub>i</sub></i></span><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>, v<sub>i</sub></i><sub> </sub>&#8804;<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>N</i>, no edge is given twice</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>·<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]>0 &#8804; <span class=SpellE><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>t<sub>i</sub></i></span><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>, p<sub>i</sub>, <span class=SpellE>q<sub>i</sub></span></i> &#8804;
100</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt0><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output </span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt0><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each test case, print the
case number followed by the minimum time the postman requires to deliver all
the letters. If it is not possible to deliver all the letters, print
Impossible (without quotes).</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                              </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=313 valign=top style='width:234.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3<br>
  4 <span class=SpellE>4</span><br>
  1 2 1 <span class=SpellE>1</span> <span class=SpellE>1</span><br>
  2 3 1 <span class=SpellE>1</span> <span class=SpellE>1</span><br>
  3 4 1 <span class=SpellE>1</span> <span class=SpellE>1</span><br>
  4 1 <span class=SpellE>1</span> <span class=SpellE>1</span> <span
  class=SpellE>1</span><br>

  2 3 1 0 1<br>
  3 4 1 0 1<br>
  4 1 <span class=SpellE>1</span> 0 1<br>
  2 4 2 1 <span class=SpellE>1</span><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:#333333'>2 <span
  class=SpellE>2</span><br>
  1 2 1 <span class=SpellE>1</span> 0<br>
  2 1 <span class=SpellE>1</span> <span class=SpellE>1</span> 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

  #1: 4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  #2: 4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  #3: 2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=SpellE><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:
Arial'>Problemsetter</span></b></span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-family:Arial'>: <span class=SpellE>Manzurur</span> <span
class=SpellE>Rahman</span> Khan<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Special
Thanks: Derek <span class=SpellE>Kisman</span></span></b></p>

<style id="dynCom" type="text/css"><!-- --></style>
<script language="JavaScript"><!--
function msoCommentShow(anchor_id, com_id)
{
	if(msoBrowserCheck()) 
		{
		c = document.all(com_id);
		a = document.all(anchor_id);
		if (null != c && null == c.length && null != a && null == a.length)
			{
			var cw = c.offsetWidth;
			var ch = c.offsetHeight;
			var aw = a.offsetWidth;
			var ah = a.offsetHeight;
			var x  = a.offsetLeft;
			var y  = a.offsetTop;
			var el = a;
			while (el.tagName != "BODY") 
				{
				el = el.offsetParent;
				x = x + el.offsetLeft;
				y = y + el.offsetTop;
				}
			var bw = document.body.clientWidth;
			var bh = document.body.clientHeight;
			var bsl = document.body.scrollLeft;
			var bst = document.body.scrollTop;
			if (x + cw + ah / 2 > bw + bsl && x + aw - ah / 2 - cw >= bsl ) 
				{ c.style.left = x + aw - ah / 2 - cw; }
			else 
				{ c.style.left = x + ah / 2; }
			if (y + ch + ah / 2 > bh + bst && y + ah / 2 - ch >= bst ) 
				{ c.style.top = y + ah / 2 - ch; }
			else 
				{ c.style.top = y + ah / 2; }
			c.style.visibility = "visible";
}	}	}
function msoCommentHide(com_id) 
{
	if(msoBrowserCheck())
		{
		c = document.all(com_id);
		if (null != c && null == c.length)
		{
		c.style.visibility = "hidden";
		c.style.left = -1000;
		c.style.top = -1000;
		} } 
}
function msoBrowserCheck()
{
	ms = navigator.appVersion.indexOf("MSIE");
	vers = navigator.appVersion.substring(ms + 5, ms + 6);
	ie4 = (ms > 0) && (parseInt(vers) >= 4);
	return ie4;
}
if (msoBrowserCheck())
{
	document.styleSheets.dynCom.addRule(".msocomanchor","background: infobackground");
	document.styleSheets.dynCom.addRule(".msocomoff","display: none");
	document.styleSheets.dynCom.addRule(".msocomtxt","visibility: hidden");
	document.styleSheets.dynCom.addRule(".msocomtxt","position: absolute");
	document.styleSheets.dynCom.addRule(".msocomtxt","top: -1000");
	document.styleSheets.dynCom.addRule(".msocomtxt","left: -1000");
	document.styleSheets.dynCom.addRule(".msocomtxt","width: 33%");
	document.styleSheets.dynCom.addRule(".msocomtxt","background: infobackground");
	document.styleSheets.dynCom.addRule(".msocomtxt","color: infotext");
	document.styleSheets.dynCom.addRule(".msocomtxt","border-top: 1pt solid threedlightshadow");
	document.styleSheets.dynCom.addRule(".msocomtxt","border-right: 2pt solid threedshadow");
	document.styleSheets.dynCom.addRule(".msocomtxt","border-bottom: 2pt solid threedshadow");
	document.styleSheets.dynCom.addRule(".msocomtxt","border-left: 1pt solid threedlightshadow");
	document.styleSheets.dynCom.addRule(".msocomtxt","padding: 3pt 3pt 3pt 3pt");
	document.styleSheets.dynCom.addRule(".msocomtxt","z-index: 100");
}
// --></script>

<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>

 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="17410"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link="#009999" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem I</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Network EXTREME!!!</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b>S<span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>tandard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span lang=EN-GB>A packet-switching network handles
information in small units, breaking long messages into multiple packets before
routing. Although each packet may travel along a different path, and the
packets comprising a message may arrive at different times or out of order, the
receiving computer reassembles the original message correctly. </span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span lang=EN-GB>The receiving computer uses a buffer
memory to hold packets that arrive out of order. You must write a program that
calculates the minimum buffer size in bytes needed to reassemble the incoming
messages when the number of messages (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>N</i>),
the number of packets (<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>M</i>), the part
of the messages in each packet, the size of each message, and the order of the
incoming packets are given.</span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span lang=EN-GB>When each packet arrives, it may be
placed into the buffer or moved directly to the output area. All packets that
are held in the buffer are available to be moved to the output area at any
time. A packet is said to ``pass the buffer&quot; when it is moved to the
output area. A message is said to ``pass the buffer&quot; when all of its packets
have passed the buffer. </span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span lang=EN-GB>The packets of any message must be
ordered so the data in the sequence of packets that pass the buffer is in
order. For example, the packet containing bytes 3 through 5 of a message must
pass the buffer before the packet containing bytes 6 through 10 of the same
message. Messages can pass the buffer in any order, but all packets from a
single message must pass the buffer consecutively and in order (but not
necessarily at the same time). Note that unlike actual buffering systems, the
process for this problem can look ahead at all incoming packets to make its
decisions. </span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span lang=EN-GB>The packets consist of data and header.
The header contains three numbers: the message number, the starting byte number
of data in the packet, and the ending byte number of data in the packet
respectively. The first byte number in any message is 1. </span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span lang=EN-GB>For example, the figure below shows three
messages (with sizes of 10, 20, and 5 bytes) and five packets. The minimum
buffer size for this example is 10 bytes. As they arrive, packet #1 and packet
#2 are stored in the buffer. They occupy 10 bytes. Then packet #3 passes the
buffer directly. Packet #4 passes the buffer directly and then packet #2 exits
the buffer. Finally, packet #5 passes the buffer directly and packet #1 exits
the buffer. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span class=MsoCommentReference><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:
12.0pt'><a style='mso-comment-reference:_1;mso-comment-date:20080318T2231'></a><![if !supportAnnotations]><a
class=msocomanchor id="_anchor_1"
onmouseover="msoCommentShow('_anchor_1','_com_1')"
onmouseout="msoCommentHide('_com_1')" href="#_msocom_1" language=JavaScript
name="_msoanchor_1">[1]</a><![endif]><span style='mso-special-character:comment'>&nbsp;</span></span></span><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:467.25pt;
 height:101.25pt'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/i_files/image002.jpg"  o:title="p3808"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=623 height=135
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/i_files/image002.jpg"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]><span
style='mso-ansi-language:EN-GB'> </span></p>

<h5><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span lang=EN-GB>The input file contains 30 test cases.
The first line of each test case contains two integers <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>N </i>(1&#8804;<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>N</i>&#8804;1000)
and <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>M</i> (1&#8804;<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>M&#8804;</i>1000). The second line contains <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>N</i> integers that are the sizes of messages in bytes; the first number
denotes the size of message #1, the second number denotes the size of message
#2, and so on. Each of the following <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>M</i>
lines describes a packet with three integers: the message number and the
starting and ending byte numbers of data in the packet. No packet contains more
64 bytes of data.</span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span lang=EN-GB><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span lang=EN-GB>The last test case is followed by a line
containing two zeroes. </span></p>

<h4 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></span></h4>

<h4 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Output
<o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span lang=EN-GB>For each test case, print a line
containing the test case number (beginning with 1) followed by the minimum
buffer size in bytes required to reassemble the original messages. Put a blank
line after the output for each test case. Use the format of the sample output. </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal;mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                 </span><span style='mso-tab-count:
2'>            </span><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>Output for Sample
Input<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=PreformattedText><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>3 <span
  class=SpellE>3</span> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=PreformattedText><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>5 <span
  class=SpellE>5</span> <span class=SpellE>5</span> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=PreformattedText><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>1 <span
  class=SpellE>1</span> 5 <o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=PreformattedText><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>2 1 5 <o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=PreformattedText><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>3 1 5 <o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=PreformattedText><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>3 5 <o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=PreformattedText><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>10 20 5 <o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=PreformattedText><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>2 16 20 <o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=PreformattedText><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>1 6 10 <o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=PreformattedText><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>3 1 5 <o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=PreformattedText><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>1 <span
  class=SpellE>1</span> 5 <o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=PreformattedText><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>2 1 15 <o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=PreformattedText style='margin-bottom:14.15pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>0 <span class=SpellE>0</span><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=324 valign=top style='width:243.0pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=PreformattedText>Case 1: 0 </p>
  <p class=PreformattedText><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  <p class=PreformattedText style='margin-bottom:14.15pt'>Case 2: 10</p>
  <pre><span style='font-size:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></pre></td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633CC" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem J</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Cubes - EXTREME!!!</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Given a positive integer N you will
have to find two positive integers x and y such that:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:69.75pt;
 height:21pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/j_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=93 height=28
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/j_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1025"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1267556693">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input file contains at most
2500 lines of inputs. Each line contains a positive integer N (0&lt;N&#8804;25*10<sup><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>12</span></sup>). Input is terminated by a
line containing a single zero. This line should not be processed.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output </span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>For each line
of input produce one or more lines of output. Each of these lines contains two
positive integers x, y separated by a single space, such that<sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1026" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:70.5pt;height:21pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/j_files/image001.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=94 height=28
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/j_files/image001.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1026"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1267556694">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->. If there is no such integer values of x and y then produce
the line No solution instead. If there is more than one solution then output
the one with smallest value of y.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                                    
</span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>7<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>37<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>12<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2299304209293<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=309 valign=top style='width:231.85pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2
  1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>4
  3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>No
  solution<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span

  47379<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span

  </td>

	{mso-level-tab-stop:4.5in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	text-indent:-.25in;}
@list l4
	{mso-list-id:1489176822;
	mso-list-type:hybrid;
	mso-list-template-ids:1208762910 67698711 67698713 67698715 67698703 67698713 67698715 67698703 67698713 67698715;}
@list l4:level1
	{mso-level-number-format:alpha-lower;
	mso-level-text:"%1\)";
	mso-level-tab-stop:.5in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	text-indent:-.25in;}

	{mso-list-id:1838568984;
	mso-list-type:hybrid;
	mso-list-template-ids:1237373152 67698711 67698713 67698715 67698703 67698713 67698715 67698703 67698713 67698715;}

	{mso-level-number-format:alpha-lower;
	mso-level-text:"%1\)";

	{margin-bottom:0in;}

	{margin-bottom:0in;}

</style>
<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-parent:" ;

</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633CC" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem A</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Triangle Fun </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>In the picture below you can see
a triangle ABC. Point D, E and F divides the sides BC, CA and AB into ratio 1:2
respectively. That is CD=2BD, AE=2CE and BF=2AF. A, D; B, E and C, F are
connected. AD and BE intersects at P, BE and CF intersects at Q and CF and AD
intersects at R.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1026" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:342.75pt;
 height:225.75pt'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/a_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=457 height=301
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/a_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"><![endif]></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>So now a new triangle PQR is
formed. Given triangle ABC your job is to find the area of triangle PQR.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>First line of the input file
contains an integer N (0&lt;N&lt;1001) which denotes how many sets of inputs
are there. Input for each set contains six floating-point <span class=GramE>number</span>
A<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>x</span></sub>, A<sub><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>y</span></sub>, <span class=SpellE>B<sub><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>x</span></sub></span>, B<sub><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>y</span></sub>, <span class=SpellE>C<sub><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>x</span></sub></span>, C<sub><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>y</span></sub>. (0&#8804;A<sub><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>x</span></sub>, A<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt'>y</span></sub>, <span class=SpellE>B<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt'>x</span></sub></span>, B<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>y</span></sub>,
<span class=SpellE>C<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>x</span></sub><span
class=GramE>,C<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>y</span></sub></span></span>
&#8804;10000) in one line <span class=SpellE>line</span>. These six numbers
denote that the coordinate of points A, B and C are (A<sub><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>x</span></sub>, A<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt'>y</span></sub>), (<span class=SpellE>B<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt'>x</span></sub></span>, <span class=GramE>B<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt'>y</span></sub></span>) and (<span class=SpellE>C<sub><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>x</span></sub></span>, C<sub><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>y</span></sub>) respectively. A, B and C will
never be collinear. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output </span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>For each set
of input produce one line of output. This one line contains an integer AREA.
Here AREA is the area of triangle PQR, rounded to the nearest integer.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=616 valign=top style='width:462.25pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3994.707
  9251.677 4152.916 7157.810 5156.835 2551.972<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>6903.233
  3540.932 5171.382 3708.015 213.959 2519.852<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><span style='font-style:normal'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></h1>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Output for
Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

  <td width=616 valign=top style='width:462.25pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>

  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>98099<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span

  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span

<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-parent:" ;
	mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin:0in;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-ansi-language:#0400;
	mso-fareast-language:#0400;
	mso-bidi-language:#0400;}
</style>
<![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="12290"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem B</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Integer Transmission EXTREME</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input</span></span><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial;color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output </span><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:black;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>You're transmitting an
n-bits unsigned integer k through a simulated network. <span class=GramE>The <span
class=SpellE>i</span></span><span class=SpellE>-th</span> bit counting from
left is transmitted at time <span class=SpellE>i</span> (e.g. 4-bit unsigned
integer 5 is transmitted in this order: 0-1-0-1). The network delay is modeled
as follows: if a bit is transmitted at time <span class=SpellE>i</span>, it may
arrive at as early as i+1 and as late is i+d+1, where d represents the maximal
network delay. If more than one bit arrived at the same time, they could be
received in any order.<o:p></o:p></span></h5>

<h5 style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></h5>

<h5 style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>For example, if you're
transmitting a 3-bit unsigned integer 2 (010) for d=1, you may receive 010, 100
(first bit is delayed) or 001 (second bit is delayed).<o:p></o:p></span></h5>

<h5 style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></h5>

<h5 style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>Write a program to find the
number of different integers that could be received, and the smallest/largest
ones among them.<o:p></o:p></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<h5 style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>The
input contains at most 10 test cases. Each case consists of three integers n,
d, k (1 &lt;= n &lt;= 1000, 0 &lt;= d &lt;= n, 0 &lt;= k &lt; 2<sup><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>n</span></sup>), the number of bits
transmitted, the maximal network delay, and the integer transmitted. The last
test case is followed by a single zero, which should not be processed.</h5>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Output
<o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>For each test case, print the case number and the number of different
integers that could be received, followed by the minimal and maximal one among
them.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<h1 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                             </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%"
 style='width:100.0%;background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;
 mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width="48%" valign=top style='width:48.12%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";color:black'>3 0 2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";color:black'>3 1 2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";color:black'>10 2 888<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";color:black'>7 3 107<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";color:black'>0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="51%" valign=top style='width:51.88%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";color:black'>Case 1: 1 2 <span class=SpellE>2</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";color:black'>Case 2: 3 1 4<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";color:black'>Case 3: 25 490 984<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";color:black'>Case 4: 19 47 122<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem C</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Maximizing the ICPC</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'>Standard Output</span><b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:black'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p style='text-align:justify'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype id="_x0000_t75"
 coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t" path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe"
 filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_s1026" type="#_x0000_t75" alt="  style='position:absolute;
 left:0;text-align:left;margin-left:896.25pt;margin-top:0;width:236.15pt;
 height:332.1pt;z-index:1;mso-wrap-distance-left:0;mso-wrap-distance-right:0;
 mso-position-horizontal:right;mso-position-vertical:top;
 mso-position-vertical-relative:line' o:allowoverlap="f" stroked="t"
 strokeweight="1.25pt">
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/../../../Archive%202008/PA-maxicpc/maxicpc.jpg" />
 <w:wrap type="square"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=319 height=447
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/../../../Archive%202008/PA-maxicpc/maxicpc.jpg"  align=right v:shapes="_x0000_s1026"><![endif]>You
are organizing a wrestling tournament. The tournament will be a playoff
tournament, where 2<em><sup>N</sup></em> wrestlers meet in <em>N</em> rounds.
In each round, the remaining wrestlers are paired up and pitted against each
other. The winning wrestlers then proceed to the next round, and the losing
wrestlers are out of the tournament. After the <span class=SpellE><em>N</em><span
class=GramE>:th</span></span> round, one lucky champion remains. </p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>Exactly who meets who in each round is decided <span
class=GramE>randomly.</span> Officially, that is. Unofficially, however, your
number one priority is of course to make all the matches as entertaining as
possible. You therefore try to make sure that the matches are scheduled in such
a way that the least exciting match will be as exciting as possible. </p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>To be able to quantify this, you have assigned an
<em>Index of Certainly Perceived Charm</em> to each pair of wrestlers. The
higher the ICPC, the more exciting you anticipate that a match between those
two wrestlers will be. </p>

<p style='text-align:justify'>Write a program to determine the ICPC of the
least exciting match in the current round, provided we schedule the round in
such a way so as to make this as large as possible. </p>

<h2><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></h2>

<p>The first line of input contains an integer <em>T</em>, giving the number of
test cases. Each test case, giving a round to be scheduled, begins with an
integer 1 &#8804; <em>N</em> &#8804; 6, indicating that there are <em>W</em>&nbsp;=&nbsp;2<em><sup>N</sup></em>
wrestlers in the round. Then follow <em>W</em>-1 lines of integers, the <span
class=SpellE><em>i</em><span class=GramE>:th</span></span> of which contains <em>W</em>-<span
class=SpellE><em>i</em></span> integers. The <span class=SpellE><em>j</em><span
class=GramE>:th</span></span> integer on the <span class=SpellE><em>i</em>:th</span>
line gives the ICPC of wrestlers <span class=SpellE><em>i</em></span> and <span
class=SpellE><em>i</em>+<em>j</em></span>. The <span class=SpellE>ICPC<span
class=GramE>:s</span></span> are integers between 1 and 10<sup>9</sup>,
inclusive. </p>

<h2><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></h2>

<p>For each test case, output a line &quot;Case <em>X</em>: <em>Y</em>&quot;,
where <em>X</em> is the number of the test case (starting from 1), and <em>Y</em>
is the ICPC of the least exciting match, provided an optimal schedule is used. </p>

<h1 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Sample
Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%"
 style='width:100.0%;background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;
 mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width="48%" valign=top style='width:48.12%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>2<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>2<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>100 <span class=SpellE>100</span> <span
  class=SpellE>100</span><o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt'>100 <span class=SpellE>100</span><o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>100<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>2<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>300 <span class=SpellE>300</span> <span
  class=SpellE>300</span><o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span style='font-size:
  11.0pt'>100 200<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>100<o:p></o:p></span></pre>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";color:black'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width="51%" valign=top style='width:51.88%;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>Case 1: 100<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span

  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span

<h2 align=center style='text-align:center'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</h2>

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633CC" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem D</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Help Mr. <span class=SpellE>Tomisu</span>
</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>After wasting a significant time of
his life in problem-setting, Mr. <span class=SpellE>Tomisu</span> is now
searching for glory: A glory that will make him famous like <span class=SpellE>Goldbach</span>
and rich like Bill Gates :). And he has chosen the field of Number Theory as
his prime interest. <span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'>His
creator did not make him very bright and so he needs your help to solve an
elementary problem, using which he will begin his pursuit for glory!<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=SpellE>Tomisu</span>
has come to know that finding out numbers having large prime factors are very
important in cryptography. Given two integers N and M, <span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt;color:windowtext'>he aims to count the number of integers x between 2
and N! (<span class=GramE>factorial</span> N), having the property that all
prime factors of x are greater than M.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input file contains at most 500
lines of inputs. Each line contains two integers N (1&lt;N&lt;10000001) and M
(1&#8804;M&#8804;N and N-M&#8804;100000). Input is terminated by a line
containing two zeroes. This line should not be processed.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Output </span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>For each line
of input produce one line of output. This line contains the value T % 100000007
(Modulo 100000007 value of T). Here T is the total number of numbers between 1
and N! (<span class=GramE>factorial</span> N) which have prime factors greater
than M.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                                    
</span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>100
  10<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>100
  20<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>10000
  9000<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0
  <span class=SpellE>0</span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=309 valign=top style='width:231.85pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>43274465<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>70342844<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>39714141<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>
