   <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="PBrush" ShapeID="_x0000_i1026"
    DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1277110598">
   </o:OLEObject>
  </xml><![endif]--></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Many lattice triangles are formed
in an (NxN) grid, but not all of them are Pythagorean (Right angled) triangles.
Given the value of N your job is to write a program that produces the number of
lattice triangles in an (NxN) grid. A lattice triangle is triangle whose three
vertices are lattice points. A lattice point in two dimensional Cartesian
coordinate system is a point whose abscissa and ordinate are integers.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input file contains at most
15 lines of inputs. Each line contains an integer N (0&lt;N&lt;2001). Input is
terminated by a line containing a single zero. This line should not be
processed.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>For each value
of N produce one line of output which contains an integer T. Here T denotes the
total number of right angled triangles in that (NxN) grid.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                              
</span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width=667
 style='width:6.95in;background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;
 mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>10<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>20<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>30<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=348 valign=top style='width:261.0pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>23596<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>418716<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2288304<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Problem Setter: Shahriar Manzoor<o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Special Thanks: Derek Kisman<o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

</div>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoTableGrid border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .25pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.25pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:60.0pt;font-family:
  Arial'>H<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=446 valign=top style='width:4.65in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
  style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Impact;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Substring<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=100 valign=top style='width:75.35pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E0E0E0;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
   id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
   path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
   <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
   <v:formulas>
    <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>

    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>

   </v:formulas>

  </v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:62.25pt;
   height:65.25pt' o:ole=" >
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/h_files/image003.png"  o:title=" />
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=83 height=87
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/h_files/image003.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
   <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="PBrush" ShapeID="_x0000_i1025"
    DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1277138758">
   </o:OLEObject>
  </xml><![endif]--></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Given a set of pattern strings, and
a text, you have to find, if any of the pattern is a substring of the text. If
any of the pattern string can be found in text, then print yes, otherwise
no (without quotes). </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>But, unfortunately, thats not
what is asked here. <span style='font-family:Wingdings;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-char-type:symbol;
mso-symbol-font-family:Wingdings'><span style='mso-char-type:symbol;mso-symbol-font-family:
Wingdings'>J</span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The problem described above,
requires a input file generator. The generator generates a text of length <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>L</i>, by choosing <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>L</i> characters randomly. Probability of choosing each character is
given as priori, and independent of choosing others.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Now, given a set of patterns,
calculate the probability of a valid program generating no.</p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></span></h5>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>First line contains an integer <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>T</i>, the number of test cases. Each case
starts with an integer <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>K</i>, the number
of pattern strings. Next <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>K</i> lines each
contain a pattern string, followed by an integer <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>N</i>, number of valid characters.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> 
</span>Next <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>N</i> lines each contain a
character and the probability of selecting that character, <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>p<sub>i</sub></i>. Next an integer <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>L</i>,
the length of the string generated. The generated text can consist of only the
valid characters, given above.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>There will be a blank line after
each test case.</p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></span></h4>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal>For each test case, output the number of test case, and the
probability of getting a no.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Constraints<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=ListParagraphCxSpFirst style='text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:Symbol;
mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:Symbol'><span
style='mso-list:Ignore'>·<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]>T<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>&#8804;
50<span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=ListParagraphCxSpLast style='text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:Symbol;
mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:Symbol'><span
style='mso-list:Ignore'>·<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
line-height:115%'>K &#8804; 20<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:
Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:Symbol;color:windowtext'><span style='mso-list:
Ignore'>·<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
color:windowtext'>Length of each pattern string is between 1 and 20<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:
Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:Symbol;color:windowtext'><span style='mso-list:
Ignore'>·<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
color:windowtext'>Each pattern string consists of only alphanumeric characters
(a to z, A to Z,0 to 9)<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:
Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:Symbol;color:windowtext'><span style='mso-list:
Ignore'>·<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
color:windowtext'>Valid characters are all alphanumeric characters<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:
Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:Symbol;color:windowtext'><span style='mso-list:
Ignore'>·<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
color:windowtext'>&#8721;p<sub>i </sub>= 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:
Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:Symbol;color:windowtext'><span style='mso-list:
Ignore'>·<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
color:windowtext'>L &#8804; 100<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                             </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

	mso-border-insideh:.5pt solid windowtext;
	mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid windowtext;
	mso-para-margin:0in;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-ansi-language:#0400;
	mso-fareast-language:#0400;
	mso-bidi-language:#0400;}
</style>
<![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="5122"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoTableGrid border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .25pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.25pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:60.0pt;font-family:
  Arial'>I<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=446 valign=top style='width:4.65in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
  style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Impact;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Treasure
  Hunt<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=100 valign=top style='width:75.35pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E0E0E0;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
   id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
   path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
   <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
   <v:formulas>
    <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
   </v:formulas>
   <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
   <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>

   height:65.25pt' o:ole=" >
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/i_files/image003.png"  o:title=" />
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=83 height=87
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/i_files/image003.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
   <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="PBrush" ShapeID="_x0000_i1025"
    DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1277138816">
   </o:OLEObject>
  </xml><![endif]--></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><st1:Street w:st="on"><st1:address
 w:st="on">Famous Archaeologist Dr.</st1:address></st1:Street> Asiana Jones has
discovered something extraordinary. He found a thousand years old tomb, and discovered
that there are thousands of treasure rooms beneath it. Each treasure room
contains a chest full of treasure. There can be a number of tunnels to go from
one room to another. But, since the tunnels are thousand years old(like the
tomb itself), they are very fragile. You have to be very quick, and you can't
use a tunnel more than once.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Dr. Asiana Jones has managed to
calculate the exact positions of all the tombs. But, as the rooms are beneath
the tomb, he must dig a hole, one the floor to get to any of them. He doesn't
want to dig more than one hole, because, otherwise, the whole tomb may become
unstable.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>If Dr. Jones can start from any
of the treasure room, find the maximum number of treasure he can collect. Dr.
Jones has to start and end at the same room, since, that's the only way to get
out of the tomb.</p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-weight:normal;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></span></h5>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>First line of input contains an
integer T, the number of test cases, followed by T scenarios. Each scenario
starts with two integers, N and M, the number of treasure rooms, and the number
of tunnels.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Each treasure room is uniquely
identified by an integer between 1 and N. Each of the following M lines each,
contain two integers, the treasure rooms at the end of the corresponding
tunnel. The tunnels can be traversed in any direction, but at most once. That
is, if there is a tunnel between room 1 and 2, it can be used to move from room
1 to 2, or 2 to 1. But, after any of these move, you can't use this tunnel any
more. There will be a blank line before each scenario.</p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></span></h4>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each scenario, print the
scenario number, followed by the maximum number of treasure to collect. Next
line will contain a sequence of integers, the starting rooms, from where, you
can collect maximum number of treasures.</p>

<h2><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Constraints<o:p></o:p></span></h2>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;
mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>·<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]>T<span style='font-family:"Nimbus Roman No9 L"'>
&#8804;</span><span style='font-family:"Nimbus Sans L"'> 31</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;
mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>·<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]>1 <span style='font-family:"Nimbus Roman No9 L"'>&#8804;
</span><span style='font-family:"Nimbus Sans L"'>N </span><span
style='font-family:"Nimbus Roman No9 L"'>&#8804; 10,000</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;
mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>·<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]>0 &#8804; M &#8804; 1,000,000</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                             </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Do you know that there are
squares within a square. This might seem confusing, but take a look at this.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>Suppose you have a square grid of size 5 X 5 completely
filled with integers.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>3<o:p></o:p></b></p>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>You can make three squares from
the table above
 well there are more but we will consider only concentric
squares. The squares are denoted using different fonts.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>In this problem you have to find
the sum of the numbers of each square.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For the above case the sums are</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>5 + 3 + 2 + 7 + 9 + 1 + 4 + 5 + 6 + 1 + 1 + 1 + 4 + 5 + 6 +
3 = 63</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>7 + 4 + 2 + 3 + 4 + 3 + 4 + 5 = 32</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>2 = 2</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input</span></span><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>There will be several lines in
the input file. Each case starts with an integer <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>n(n&lt;=10) </b>that determines the dimension of the square grid. Each
of the next <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>n</b> lines will contain <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>n</b> integers each that will fill the
square table in row major order. Input is terminated by a case where <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>n</b> == 0.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Output</span></span><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:
"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Each line of output will start
with <span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>Case #:</span> where <span
style='font-family:"Courier New"'>#</span> is replaced by the case number. Then
you have to output <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>ceil(n/2)</b> space
separated numbers that will represent the sums from outer to inner. Follow the
sample for exact details.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>     </span><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                        </span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>5<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>5 3 2 7 9<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1 7 4 2 4<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>5 3 2 4 6<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1 3 4 5 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1 4 5 6 3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span

  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <pre><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>0<span
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p></o:p></span></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=309 valign=top style='width:231.85pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 1: 63 32 2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=NoSpacing><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 2: 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='mso-bidi-language:EN-US'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='mso-bidi-language:EN-US'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='mso-bidi-language:EN-US'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='mso-bidi-language:EN-US'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='mso-bidi-language:EN-US'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='mso-bidi-language:EN-US'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

11471||||||false||||||
<title>A :: Arrange the Tiles</title>
<style type="text/css">
<!--
.style1 {
	font-family: Garamond;
	font-weight: bold;
	font-size: 28px;
	color: #FFFFFF;
}
.style3 {
	font-family: "Courier New", Courier, monospace;
	font-weight: bold;
	font-size:15px
}
.style4 {
	font-family: Georgia, "Times New Roman", Times, serif;
	font-weight: bold;
	font-size: 18px;
	color: #0000FF;
}
.style10 {font-family: "Courier New", Courier, monospace; font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; }
.style12 {font-family: Garamond; font-weight: bold; font-size: 16px; color: #FFFFFF; }
.style11 {color: #0000FF}
-->
</style>
<body>
<table width="100%" border="0">
  <tr>
    <td width="3%" height="38">&nbsp;</td>
    <td  width="32%" bgcolor="#0000FF"><div align="center" class="style1">Problem A </div></td>
    <td bgcolor="#0000FF" width="30%"><div align="center"><span class="style1">
    Arrange the Tiles</span></div></td>
    <td width="21%" align="center" valign="middle" bgcolor="#0000FF"><div align="center"><span class="style12">Time
    Limit : 4 seconds</span></div></td>
    <td width="12%"><div align="center"></div></td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="3"><p>&nbsp;</p>
      <p>There is a board of dimension 4 x 3. Each cell of the board is a container that can hold a tile. The board is shown in the following diagram. </p>
      <table width="100%" border="0">
      <tr>
        <td>&nbsp;</td>
        <td align="center"><img src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/p11471a.png"  align="baseline"></td>
        <td>&nbsp;</td>
      </tr>
    </table>
    <p align="justify">As expected, you have got 12 tiles with you and you are required to place them in the containers so that every container has one tile in it. However, the tiles that you have are not ordinary tiles. Each tile is a square piece with all its 4 edges colored. A tile is described by its 4 edge colors starting from top and going clockwise.    </p>

      <table align="center" width="228" border="1">
          <tr>
            <td align="center" width="75"><img src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/p11471a.png"  align="middle"></td>
            <td width="75" align="center"><img src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/p11471a.png"  align="middle"></td>
            <td width="75" align="center"><img src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/p11471a.png"  align="middle"></td>
          </tr>
          <tr>
            <td align="center">R G B Y </td>
            <td align="center">R G R Y </td>
            <td align="center">Y Y Y Y </td>
          </tr>
      </table><br />
      The image shows 3 tiles. The description of the tiles are given below the image. The colors that will be used to denote the tiles will be from the set {yellow, green, blue and  red} and will be represented by {Y, G, B and R} for the sake of brevity.
        <p align="justify">There are 12 factorials (12!) ways of placing the tiles on the board. A placement is considered fragile if the touching sides of  any two adjacent tiles is made up of different colors. You are required to find out the total number of placements which are not fragile. </p>
        <p align="justify">Note: You can not rotate the tiles. That is, the initial orientation must be preserved. </p></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>

  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="2"><span class="style4">Input</span></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="3" align="justify">The first line of input is an integer <span class="style10">T</span>( <span class="style10">T</span> &lt; 20 ) that denotes the number of test cases.
    Each case starts on a new line and consists of one or more lines containing 12 strings. Each string represents a tile
    and is made up of 4 characters.</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="3">&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="3"><span class="style4">Output</span></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="3" align="justify">For each case, output the case number followed by the total number of non-fragile placements. </td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="3">&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td><span class="style4">Sample Input</span></td>
    <td><span class="style4">Sample Output </span></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>

    <td valign="top"><p class="style10">2<br>
      BBBB BBBB BBBB BBBB BBBB BBBB BBBB BBBB BBBB BBBB BBBB  YYYY<br>
      GGGG GGGG GGGG GGGG GGGG GGGG GGGG GGGG GGGG GGGG GGGG GGGG<br>
      <br>
        </p>
    </td>

    <td valign="top"><span class="style10">Case 1: 0<br>
      Case 2: 479001600 
      <br>
    <br />
</span></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td class="style10" colspan="3"><hr />
      Problem Setter: Sohel Hafiz <br />
      Special Thanks: Shamim Hafiz, Md. Arifuzzaman Arif<br>
      <span class="style11">Next Generation Contest 5</span></td>
    <td valign="top">&nbsp;</td>
    <td width="1%">&nbsp;</td>
    <td width="1%">&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
</table>
</body>

11472||||||false||||||
<title>B :: Beautiful Number</title>
<style type="text/css">
<!--
.style1 {
	font-family: Garamond;
	font-weight: bold;
	font-size: 28px;
	color: #FFFFFF;
}
.style3 {
	font-family: "Courier New", Courier, monospace;
	font-weight: bold;
	font-size:15px
}
.style4 {
	font-family: Georgia, "Times New Roman", Times, serif;
	font-weight: bold;
	font-size: 18px;
	color: #0000FF;
}
.style10 {font-family: "Courier New", Courier, monospace; font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; }
.style11 {color: #0000FF}
.style13 {font-family: Garamond; font-weight: bold; font-size: 16px; color: #FFFFFF; }
-->
</style>
<body>
<table width="100%" border="0">
  <tr>
    <td width="2%" height="38">&nbsp;</td>
    <td  width="32%" bgcolor="#0000FF"><div align="center"><span class="style1">Problem B
      </span>
    </div>
    <div align="center"></div></td>
    
    <td bgcolor="#0000FF" width="32%"><div align="center"><span class="style1">Beautiful Numbers </span></div></td>
    <td width="24%" valign="middle" bgcolor="#0000FF"><div align="center"><span class="style13">Time Limit : 
    3 seconds</span></div></td>
    
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="4"><p>&nbsp;</p>
    <p align="justify">An <span class="style3">N</span>-based number is beautiful if all of the digits from <span class="style3">0</span> to <span class="style3">N-1</span> are used in that number and the difference between any two adjacent digits is exactly 1 (one).
For example, 9876543210 is a 10-based beautiful number.


You have to calculate the number beautiful numbers that has got atmost <span class="style10">M</span> digits.. </p>

	<p align="justify">
<b>Note:</b> No leading zero is allowed in a beautiful number.</p>
    <p align="justify">&nbsp;</p></td>
    <td width="7%">&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>

  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="3"><span class="style4">Input</span></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="4" align="justify">The first line of input is an integer <span class="style3">T</span> (<span class="style3">T&lt;100</span>) that indicates the number of test cases. Each case starts with a line containing two integers <span class="style3">N</span> and<span class="style3"> M</span> (  <span class="style3">2&le;N&le;10 &amp; 0&le;M&le;100</span> ).  </td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="4">&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="4"><span class="style4">Output</span></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="4" align="justify">For each case, output the number of beautiful  <span class="style3">N</span>-based numbers, which are using less than or equal to <span class="style3">M</span> digits in a single line. You have to give your output modulo 1000000007. </td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="4">&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td><span class="style4">Sample Input</span></td>
    <td><span class="style4">Sample Output </span></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>

    <td class="style10">3<br />
2 4<br />
3 7<br />
10 10</td>
    <td valign="top"><span class="style10">3<br />
31<br />
1</span></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td class="style10" colspan="4"><hr />
      <p>Problem Setter: Md. Arifuzzaman Arif<br>
      Special Thanks: Sohel Hafiz<br>
      <span class="style11">Next Generation Contest 5 </span></p>
      </td>
    <td valign="top">&nbsp;</td>
    <td width="1%">&nbsp;</td>
    <td width="1%">&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
</table>
</body>
______________________________________________________
11473||||||false||||||
<title>C :: Campus Roads</title>
<style type="text/css">
<!--
.style1 {
	font-family: Garamond;
	font-weight: bold;
	font-size: 28px;
	color: #FFFFFF;
}
.style3 {
	font-family: "Courier New", Courier, monospace;
	font-weight: bold;
	font-size:15px
}
.style4 {
	font-family: Georgia, "Times New Roman", Times, serif;
	font-weight: bold;
	font-size: 18px;
	color: #0000FF;
}
.style10 {font-family: "Courier New", Courier, monospace; font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; }
.style12 {font-family: Garamond; font-weight: bold; font-size: 16px; color: #FFFFFF; }
.style11 {color: #0000FF}
-->
</style>
<body>
<table width="100%" border="0">
  <tr>
    <td width="4%" height="38">&nbsp;</td>
    <td  width="27%" bgcolor="#0000FF"><div align="center" class="style1">Problem C </div></td>
    <td bgcolor="#0000FF" width="33%"><div align="center"><span class="style1">
      Campus Roads </span></div></td>
    <td width="24%"  bgcolor="#0000FF"><div align="center"><span class="style12">Time 
    Limit : 2 seconds</span></div></td>
    <td width="12%"><div align="center"></div></td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="3"><p>&nbsp;</p>
    <p align="justify">NGU 
    has a beautiful campus. The authority of NGU has decided to take some more 
    steps about beautification of this campus. One of these steps is <b>tree plantation</b> 
    in some roads. To complete this project they will select some roads, and for 
    any road they will also select a number that how many tree will be planted 
    on that road. To make this campus 
    more beautiful they decided in a single road, the gap between any two 
    adjacent tree will be fixed, and this gap will be as large as possible. So If 
    you walk through the road in a constant speed, you will reach a tree after 
    constant intervals.</p>

    <p align="justify">A road can be described by <b>K</b> points <b>P<sub>1</sub>, P<sub>2</sub>, 
    ...... , P<sub>K</sub></b>. <b>P<sub>i</sub></b> and <b>P<sub>i+1</sub></b> are connected by a 
    straight line.&nbsp;So, it is clear that a road consists of some contiguous 
    straight lines. <sub>&nbsp;</sub></p>

	<p align="justify">
 In this problem you have to find all the points, where to plant a tree. For the 
 sake of simplicity, we will consider that roads will not have any width. </p>
    <p align="justify">&nbsp;</p></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>

  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="2"><span class="style4">Input</span></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="3" align="justify">The first line of input is an integer
    <span class="style3">N</span> (<span class="style3">N&lt;100</span>) that 
    indicates the number of roads under this beautification project. From next 
    line <b>N</b> roads is described one by one. Description of each road starts with a 
    line containing two integers <span class="style3">K</span> (<span class="style3">2&#8804;K&#8804;100</span>) 
    and <span class="style3">T</span> (<span class="style3">2&#8804;T&#8804;100</span>).&nbsp; 
    Here <b>K</b> represents number of points that represents the road, and <b>T</b> represents 
    the number of trees to be planted. This line is 
    followed by <b>K</b> lines having <b>2</b> integers <b>x, 
    y(-1000.00&lt;=x&lt;=1000.00 and -1000.00&lt;=y&lt;=1000.00)</b> each, <i><b>i<sub>th</sub></b></i> line 
    of these <b>K</b> lines is the co-ordinate of&nbsp; <b>Pi</b>.  
     
    <p>  <span class="style3">&nbsp;</span>  </td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="3">&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="3"><span class="style4">Output</span></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="3" align="justify">You have to give your output for every roads 
    one by one. Output of each road starts with a line &quot;<b>Road #n:</b>&quot; 
    (without quotes), here <b>n</b> is the 
    road number. Next <b>T</b> lines will give the co-ordinates of&nbsp; trees 
    to be planted. x, y 
    co-ordinate will be separated by a single space and having two decimal 
    points. You have to represent the points sequentially in the order in which 
    order you will find those trees when you walk through the road <b>P<sub>1</sub></b> 
    to <b>P<sub>K</sub></b>. Print a blank line after describing each road.</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="3">&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td><span class="style4">Sample Input</span></td>
    <td><span class="style4">Sample Output </span></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>

    <td valign="top"><span class="style10">1<br>
    5 6<br>
    10.00 10.00<br>
    20.00 20.00<br>
    30.00 10.00<br>
    10.00 0.00<br>
    9.00 9.00<br />
</span></td>

    <td valign="top"><span class="style10">Road #1:<br>
    10.00 10.00<br>
    18.44 18.44<br>
    26.89 13.11<br>
    23.26 6.63<br>
    12.58 1.29<br>
    9.00 9.00<br>
    <br />
</span></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td class="style10" colspan="3">Hint: <span style="font-weight: 400">You 
    have to maximize the distance between two adjacent trees in a road. So it is 
    sure that first and last tree will be on the first and last point, i.e. in P<sub>1</sub> 
    and P<sub>k</sub>.</span><hr />
      Problem Setter: Md. Arifuzzaman Arif<br /> 
      Special Thanks: Shamim Hafiz<br>
      <span class="style11">Next Generation Contest 5</span></td>
    <td valign="top">&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
</table>
</body>
______________________________________________________
11474||||||false||||||
<title>D :: Dying Tree</title>
<style type="text/css">
<!--
.style1 {
	font-family: Garamond;
	font-weight: bold;
	font-size: 28px;
	color: #FFFFFF;
}
.style2 {
	color: #0000FF;
	font-weight: bold;
}
.style4 {
	font-family: Georgia, "Times New Roman", Times, serif;
	font-weight: bold;
	font-size: 18px;
	color: #0000FF;
}
.style10 {font-family: "Courier New", Courier, monospace; font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; }
.style12 {font-family: Garamond; font-weight: bold; font-size: 16px; color: #FFFFFF; }
-->
</style>
<body>
<table width="100%" border="0">
  <tr>
    <td width="3%" height="38">&nbsp;</td>
    <td  width="26%" bgcolor="#0000FF"><div align="center" class="style1">Problem D </div></td>
    <td bgcolor="#0000FF" width="35%"><div align="center"><span class="style1">
    Dying Tree</span></div></td>
    <td width="26%" align="center" valign="middle" bgcolor="#0000FF"><div align="center"><span class="style12">Time 
    Limit : 2 seconds</span></div></td>
    <td width="8%"><div align="center"></div></td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="3">
      <p align="justify"><br><font face="Calibri">Once upon the time in the forest, there were 
        lots of trees who were all friends to one another. One of the trees T was very 
        sick. She needed a tree doctor to save her life. As you may already know, trees 
        can't move, but what you probably didn't know is that they can talk. Each tree 
        t1 can talk to tree t2 if the minimum distance between any two branches from 
        each 
        is less than or equal to some value <span class="style10">k</span>. All trees decided to help their sick 
        friend by trying to reach a doctor tree. They will continue to tell one another 
        that tree T is sick until some tree S finds a tree doctor (who is at distance <span class="style10">d</span>      or less from any branch of tree S). S will tell the doctor about her friend so he can go help 
        her.</font></p>
      <ul>
        <li>
          <p align="left"><font face="Calibri">A tree is represented by a set of points 
            representing her branches.</font>      
        </li>
        <li>
          <p align="left"><font face="Calibri">A doctor is represented by a single 
            point.</font>      
        </li>
      </ul>
    <p align="left"><font face="Calibri"></font></p></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>

  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="2"><span class="style4">Input</span></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="3" align="justify"><p align="justify">Input begins with a number <span class="style10">t</span> &lt; 100   representing the number of test cases; t test cases follow. Each test case   begins with 4 integers 0 &lt; <span class="style10">n</span> &lt; 100, 0 &lt; <span class="style10">m</span> &le; 10, 0 &le; <span class="style10">k, d</span> &le; 100 where n   is the number of trees in the forest, <span class="style10">m</span> is the number of doctors in the forest,   <span class="style10">k</span> &amp; <span class="style10">d</span> are as described above. The next m lines represent the positions of   doctors in x, y coordinates. The following lines describe the set of trees in   the forest. Each set begins with an integer 0 &lt; <span class="style10">b</span> &lt; 10 representing the   number of branches this tree has. Followed by b points representing the branches   positions. The sick tree is always the first tree in the input. All points   coordinates are integers with absolute values less than or equal to   1000.</p>
    </td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="3">&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="3"><span class="style4">Output</span></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="3" align="justify"><p align="left">For each test case determine whether or not the   trees can help their friend by finding a doctor for her. If yes, then print   "Tree can be saved :)", if no then print "Tree can't be saved :(".</p></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="3">&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td><span class="style4">Sample Input</span></td>
    <td><span class="style4">Sample Output </span></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>

    <td valign="top"><p align="left" class="style10">2<BR>
      3 2 2 3<BR>
      3 8<BR>
      7 4<BR>
      <strong>4</strong><BR>
      0   0<BR>
      1 1<BR>
      3 2<BR>
      2 0<BR>
      <strong>3</strong><BR>
      6 -1<BR>
      7 1<BR>
      8 2<BR>
      <strong>3</strong><BR>
      -1   -1<BR>
      2 -3<BR>
      5 -2<BR>
      3 2 1 2<BR>
      3 8<BR>
      7 4<BR>
      <strong>4</strong><BR>
      0 0<BR>
      1 1<BR>
      3   2<BR>
      2 0<BR>
      <strong>3</strong><BR>
      6 -1<BR>
      7 1<BR>
      8 2<BR>
      <strong>3</strong><BR>
      -1 -1<BR>
      2 -3<BR>
    5   -2</p></td>

    <td valign="top"><span class="style10">Tree can be saved :)<BR>
      Tree can't be saved :(<br>
    <br />
</span></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td class="style10" colspan="3"><hr />
      <p>Problem Setter: Asmaa Magdi<br /> 
        Special Thanks: Muhammad Magdy<br>
      Alternate Solution: Sohel Hafiz </p>
      <p>Illustration: The following diagram depicts Sample #1 </p>
      <p><img src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/p11474.png" ></p></td>
    <td valign="top">&nbsp;</td>
    <td width="1%">&nbsp;</td>
    <td width="1%">&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
</table>
</body>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellpadding=0 width="100%"
 style='width:100.0%;mso-cellspacing:1.5pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;height:28.5pt;mso-row-margin-right:19.35pt'>
  <td width="1%" style='width:1.0%;padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt;height:28.5pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td width="30%" style='width:30.0%;background:blue;padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt;
  height:28.5pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:21.0pt;font-family:Garamond;color:white'>Problem E <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width="38%" style='width:38.0%;background:blue;padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt;
  height:28.5pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
  class=style11><span style='font-size:21.0pt'>Extend to Palindromes </span></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width="27%" style='width:27.0%;background:blue;padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt;
  height:28.5pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
  class=style151>Time Limit : 3 seconds</span></p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" style='width:1.0%;padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt;height:28.5pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  </td>
  <td style='mso-cell-special:placeholder;border:none;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'
  width=26 colspan=3><p class='MsoNormal'>&nbsp;</td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;height:158.25pt;mso-row-margin-right:12.15pt'>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt;height:158.25pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td colspan=4 style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt;height:158.25pt'>
  <div>
  <p class=MsoNormal>Your task is, given an integer <span class=style101><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt'>N</span></span>, to make a palidrome (word that
  reads the same when you reverse it) of length at least <span class=style101><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt'>N</span></span>. Any palindrome will do. Easy, isn't
  it? That's what you thought before you passed it on to your inexperienced
  team-mate. When the contest is almost over, you find out that that problem
  still isn't solved. The problem with the code is that the strings generated
  are often not palindromic. There's not enough time to start again from
  scratch or to debug his messy code. Seeing that the situation is desperate,
  you decide to simply write some additional code that takes the output and
  adds just enough extra characters to it to make it a palindrome and hope for
  the best. Your solution should take as its input a string and produce the
  smallest palindrome that can be formed by adding zero or more characters at
  its end. </p>
  </div>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" style='width:1.0%;padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt;height:158.25pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td style='mso-cell-special:placeholder;border:none;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'
  width=16 colspan=2><p class='MsoNormal'>&nbsp;</td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:2;mso-row-margin-right:12.15pt'>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td colspan=3 style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span class=style41><span style='font-size:13.5pt'>Input</span></span></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td style='mso-cell-special:placeholder;border:none;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'
  width=16 colspan=2><p class='MsoNormal'>&nbsp;</td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:3;mso-row-margin-right:12.15pt'>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td colspan=4 style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p>Input will consist of several lines ending in EOF. Each line will contain
  a non-empty string made up of upper case and lower case English letters
  ('A'-'Z' and 'a'-'z'). The length of the string will be less than or equal to
  100,000.</p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td style='mso-cell-special:placeholder;border:none;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'
  width=16 colspan=2><p class='MsoNormal'>&nbsp;</td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:4;mso-row-margin-right:12.15pt'>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td colspan=4 style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td style='mso-cell-special:placeholder;border:none;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'
  width=16 colspan=2><p class='MsoNormal'>&nbsp;</td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:5;mso-row-margin-right:12.15pt'>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td colspan=4 style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span class=style41><span style='font-size:13.5pt'>Output</span></span></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td style='mso-cell-special:placeholder;border:none;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'
  width=16 colspan=2><p class='MsoNormal'>&nbsp;</td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:6;mso-row-margin-right:12.15pt'>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td colspan=4 style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p>For each line of input, output will consist of exactly one line. It should
  contain the palindrome formed by adding the fewest number of extra letters to
  the end of the corresponding input string.</p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td style='mso-cell-special:placeholder;border:none;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'
  width=16 colspan=2><p class='MsoNormal'>&nbsp;</td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:7;mso-row-margin-right:12.15pt'>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td colspan=4 style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td style='mso-cell-special:placeholder;border:none;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'
  width=16 colspan=2><p class='MsoNormal'>&nbsp;</td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:8;mso-row-margin-right:12.15pt'>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span class=style41><span style='font-size:13.5pt'>Sample
  Input</span></span></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span class=style41><span style='font-size:13.5pt'>Sample
  Output </span></span></p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td style='mso-cell-special:placeholder;border:none;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'
  width=16 colspan=2><p class='MsoNormal'>&nbsp;</td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:9;mso-row-margin-right:12.15pt'>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td valign=top style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>aaaa<br>
  abba<br>
  amanaplanacanal<br>
  xyz<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td valign=top style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=style10>aaaa<br>
  abba<br>
  amanaplanacanalpanama<br>
  xyzyx</p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td style='mso-cell-special:placeholder;border:none;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'
  width=16 colspan=2><p class='MsoNormal'>&nbsp;</td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:10;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td colspan=4 style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>
  <hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>
  </span></b></div>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Problem
  Setter: Muntasir Azam Khan <br>
  Special Thanks: Rakibul Hossain <br>
  <span class=style131>Next Generation Contest 5 </span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td valign=top style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" style='width:1.0%;padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
  <td width="1%" style='width:1.0%;padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>
  </td>
 </tr>

11476||||||false||||||
<title>F :: Factorizing Large Integers</title>
<style type="text/css">
<!--
.style1 {
	font-family: Garamond;
	font-weight: bold;
	font-size: 28px;
	color: #FFFFFF;
}
.style4 {
	font-family: Georgia, "Times New Roman", Times, serif;
	font-weight: bold;
	font-size: 18px;
	color: #0000FF;
}
.style10 {font-family: "Courier New", Courier, monospace; font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; }
 li.MsoNormal
	{mso-style-parent:" ;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	margin-left:0in; margin-right:0in; margin-top:0in}
.style13 {color: #0000FF}
.style14 {font-family: Garamond; font-weight: bold; font-size: 16px; color: #FFFFFF; }
-->
</style>
<body>
<table width="100%" border="0">
  <tr>
    <td width="3%" height="38">&nbsp;</td>
    <td  width="27%" bgcolor="#0000FF"><div align="center" class="style1">Problem F </div></td>
    <td bgcolor="#0000FF" width="33%"><div align="center"><span class="style1">
      Factorizing Large Integers </span></div></td>
    <td width="25%" align="center" valign="middle" bgcolor="#0000FF"><div align="center" class="style14"><span class="style14">Time Limit : 
    15 seconds</span></div></td>
    <td width="10%"><div align="center"></div></td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="3">
      <p><br>
      Given an integer <span class="style10">N</span>(&le;10^16)  find its prime factoring.</p>
      <p>
      </p></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>

  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="2"><span class="style4">Input</span></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="3" align="justify">The first line of the input contains <span class="style10">T</span>(&le;800) , the number of test cases. Then the next <span class="style10">T</span> lines contains an integer <span class="style10">N</span> (1 &lt; <span class="style10">N</span> &le;10^16).</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="3">&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="3"><span class="style4">Output</span></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="3" align="justify">For every test case output its prime factoring representation. See the sample output for the output format.</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="3">&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td><span class="style4">Sample Input</span></td>
    <td><span class="style4">Sample Output </span></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>

    <td valign="top" class="style10">3<br>
      60<br>
      36<br>
    10007</td>

    <td valign="top" class="style10">60 = 2^2 * 3 * 5<br>
      36 = 2^2 * 3^2<br>
    10007 = 10007</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td class="style10" colspan="3"><hr />
      <p>Problem Setter: Tasnim Imran Sunny<br>
        Special Thanks: Mir Wasi Ahmed    
        <br>
      <span class="style13">Next Generation Contest 5</span></p>
    </td>
    <td valign="top">&nbsp;</td>
    <td width="1%">&nbsp;</td>
    <td width="1%">&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
</table>
