11477||||||false||||||
<title>G :: Game of Rectangles</title>
<style type="text/css">
<!--
.style1 {
	font-family: Garamond;
	font-weight: bold;
	font-size: 28px;
	color: #FFFFFF;
}
.style4 {
	font-family: Georgia, "Times New Roman", Times, serif;
	font-weight: bold;
	font-size: 18px;
	color: #0000FF;
}
.style10 {font-family: "Courier New", Courier, monospace; font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; }
 li.MsoNormal
	{mso-style-parent:" ;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	margin-left:0in; margin-right:0in; margin-top:0in}
.style13 {color: #0000FF}
.style14 {font-family: Garamond; font-weight: bold; font-size: 16px; color: #FFFFFF; }
-->
</style>
<body>
<table width="100%" border="0">
  <tr>
    <td width="4%" height="38">&nbsp;</td>
    <td  width="27%" bgcolor="#0000FF"><div align="center" class="style1">Problem G </div></td>
    <td bgcolor="#0000FF" width="33%"><div align="center"><span class="style1">
      Game of Rectangles </span></div></td>
    <td width="24%" align="center" valign="middle" bgcolor="#0000FF"><div align="center" class="style14"><span class="style14">Time Limit : 
    7 seconds</span></div></td>
    <td width="12%"><div align="center"></div></td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="3"><p>&nbsp;</p>
    <p><b>Arif</b> and <b>Nadia</b> are playing a two player game. The game has following rules 
    -&nbsp;</p>
    <ol style="margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: 0in" start="1" type="1">
      <li class="MsoNormal">Given a rectangular board of Width <b class="style10">W</b>, and 
      Height <b class="style10">H</b>. Consider the co-ordinate of lower left corner of this 
      board is <b>(<span class="style10">0,0</span>)</b> and co-ordinate of upper right corner is <b>(<span class="style10">W</span>,<span class="style10"> H</span>)</b>.</li>
      <li class="MsoNormal">In each turn a player can draw a rectangle in this 
      board. </li>
      <li class="MsoNormal">The player who place the last rectangle will win.</li>
    </ol>
    <p>
    <br>
    But since the board itself is a rectangle, the first player will always win 
    if we do not restrict in drawing any kind of and any size of rectangle.<br>
    So we will put some restriction in drawing rectangles. Here are the rules.</p>
    <ol style="margin-top: 0in; margin-bottom: 0in" start="1" type="1">
      <li class="MsoNormal">All edges of the rectangle will be parallel to any 
      of the edges of rectangular board.</li>
      <li class="MsoNormal">All corners of the rectangle must be a lattice 
      point. Lattice points, are the points in two-dimensional coordinate system 
      whose abscissa and ordinate has integer values. For example (3, 4) is a 
      lattice point but (3, 4.5) is not a lattice point.</li>
      <li class="MsoNormal">The width of the rectangle will be at most <b>
      MaxWidth </b>and at least <b>MinWidth</b>.</li>
      <li class="MsoNormal">The height of the rectangle will be at most <b>
      MaxHeight</b> and at least <b>MinHeight</b>.</li>
      <li class="MsoNormal">&nbsp;No two rectangles can overlap with each other.<br>
      &nbsp;</li>
    </ol>
    <p>
    Note that, A rectangle can be represented as (x1, y1, x2, y2), where (x1, 
    y1) is the lower left corner and (x2, y2) is the upper right corner. So, the 
    height of the rectangle is y2 - y1 and width of the rectangle is x2 - x1, 
    and area of the rectangle is (y2-y1)*(x2-x1).<br>
    <br>

    Predicting the winner of such a game is very hard. But your task is not that 
    hard. At any stage of the game, Nadia wants to know how many possible moves are available to her. Your task is to help her. It might help her to win aginst Arif. 
	
	You will be given a state of board. You have to calculate, how many 
    ways Nadia can place a rectangle having this state. <br>
&nbsp;</p>
</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>

  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="2"><span class="style4">Input</span></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="3" align="justify">The first line of input is an integer <span class="style10"><b>T</b></span><b>(<span class="style10">T</span>&lt;=100)</b> 
    that indicates the number of test cases. Each case will starts with a line 
    containing two integer, <b class="style10">W</b> <b>(1&lt;=<span class="style10">W</span>&lt;=1000000000)</b> width of the 
    board and <span class="style10"><b>H</b></span><b>(1&lt;=<span class="style10">H</span>&lt;=1000000000) </b>height of the board. Next Line will 
    contain 4 integers, <span class="style10"><b>MaxWidth</b>, <b>MinWidth</b>, <b>MaxHeight</b>, <b>
    MinHeight</b></span>. This line will be followed by another line containing a 
    single integer <span class="style10"><b>K</b></span><b>(0&lt;=<span class="style10">K</span>&lt;=50)</b>, the number of rectangles placed in the 
    board. Next <b class="style10">K</b> line will represents one rectangle each. Each rectangle 
    will be represented with <span class="style10">4</span> space separated integer values <b>(<span class="style10">x1, y1, x2, 
    y2</span>)</b>, as described above. There is a blank line between two test cases.. <br>
&nbsp;  </td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="3">&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="3"><span class="style4">Output</span></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="3" align="justify">For each test case, output will be a single 
    line containing <b class="style10">N</b>, the number of ways to place a rectangle in that 
    board modulo <b>1000000007</b>.</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="3">&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td><span class="style4">Sample Input</span></td>
    <td><span class="style4">Sample Output </span></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>

    <td valign="top"><span class="style10">2</span><span class="style10"><br>
      <br>
    20 10<br>
    2 2 5 4<br>
    2<br>
    10 5 11 6<br>
    4 4 5 5<br>
    <br>
</span>
    <span class="style10">20 10<br>
    2 2 5 4<br>
    1<br>
    10 5 11 6<br />
</span></td>

    <td valign="top"><span class="style10">211<br>
    229</span></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td class="style10" colspan="3"><hr />
      <p>Problem Setter: Md. Arifuzzaman Arif<br /> 
      Special Thanks: Istiaque Ahmed<br>
      <span class="style13">Next Generation Contest 5</span></p>
      </td>
    <td valign="top">&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
</table>
</body>
______________________________________________________
11478||||||false||||||
<title>H :: Halum</title>
<style type="text/css">
<!--
.style1 {
	font-family: Garamond;
	font-weight: bold;
	font-size: 28px;
	color: #FFFFFF;
}
.style3 {
	font-family: "Courier New", Courier, monospace;
	font-weight: bold;
	font-size:15px
}
.style4 {
	font-family: Georgia, "Times New Roman", Times, serif;
	font-weight: bold;
	font-size: 18px;
	color: #0000FF;
}
.style10 {font-family: "Courier New", Courier, monospace; font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; }
.style12 {font-family: Garamond; font-weight: bold; font-size: 16px; color: #FFFFFF; }
.style11 {color: #0000FF}
-->
</style>
<body>
<table width="100%" border="0">
  <tr>
    <td width="3%" height="38">&nbsp;</td>
    <td  width="32%" bgcolor="#0000FF"><div align="center" class="style1">Problem H </div></td>
    <td bgcolor="#0000FF" width="30%"><div align="center"><span class="style1">
    Halum</span></div></td>
    <td width="21%" align="center" valign="middle" bgcolor="#0000FF"><div align="center"><span class="style12">Time
    Limit : 3 seconds</span></div></td>
    <td width="12%"><div align="center"></div></td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="3"><p align="justify"><br>
      You are given a directed graph G(V,E) with a set of vertices  and edges. Each edge (i,j) that connects some vertex i to vertex j has an  integer cost associated with that edge.<br>
&nbsp;<br>
Define the operation Halum(v, d) to operate on a vertex v  using an integer d as follows: subtract d from the cost of all edges that enter  v and add d to the cost of every edge that leaves v.</p>
      <p align="justify">As an example of that operation, consider graph G that has  three vertices named (1, 2, 3) and two edges. Edge (1, 2) has cost -1, and edge  (2,3) has cost 1. The operation Halum(2,-3) operates on edges entering and  leaving vertex 2.&nbsp; Thus, edge (1, 2) gets  cost -1-(-3)=2 and the edge (2, 3) gets cost 1 + (-3) = -2.</p>
      <p align="justify">Your goal is to apply the Halum function to a graph, potentially  repeatedly, until every edge in the graph has at least a certain cost that is  greater than zero. You have to maximize this cost.</p>
      <p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>

  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="2"><span class="style4">Input</span></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="3" align="justify"><p>Two space-separated integers per case: <span class="style10">V(V&le;500)</span> and <span class="style10">E(E&le;2700)</span>. <span class="style10">E</span> lines follow. Each line represents a directed edge using three  space-separated integers (u, v, d). Absolute value of cost can be at most  10000.</p></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="3">&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="3"><span class="style4">Output</span></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="3" align="justify"><p>If the problem is solvable, then print the maximum possible  value. If there is no such solution print &ldquo;No Solution&rdquo;. If the value can be  arbitrary large print &ldquo;Infinite&rdquo;</p></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="3">&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td><span class="style4">Sample Input</span></td>
    <td><span class="style4">Sample Output </span></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>

    <td valign="top"><p class="style10">2 1<br>
      1 2 10<br>
      2 1<br>
      1 2 -10<br>
      3 3<br>
      1 2 4<br>
      2 3 2<br>
      3 1 5<br>
      4 5<br>
      2 3 4<br>
      4 2 5<br>
      3 4 2<br>
      3 1 0<br>
      1 2 -1</p>    <p class="style10"><br>
    </p>
    </td>

    <td valign="top"><p class="style10">Infinite<br>
      Infinite<br>
      3<br>
      1</p>      
      <span class="style10"><br>
      <br />
      </span></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td class="style10" colspan="3"><hr />
      <p>Problem Setter: Md. Mahbubul Hasan<br>
      <span class="style11">Next Generation Contest 5 </span></p>
      </td>
    <td valign="top">&nbsp;</td>
    <td width="1%">&nbsp;</td>
    <td width="1%">&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
</table>
</body>
______________________________________________________
11479||||||false||||||
<title>I :: Is this the easiest problem?</title>
<style type="text/css">
<!--
.style1 {
	font-family: Garamond;
	font-weight: bold;
	font-size: 28px;
	color: #FFFFFF;
}
.style3 {
	font-family: "Courier New", Courier, monospace;
	font-weight: bold;
	font-size:15px
}
.style4 {
	font-family: Georgia, "Times New Roman", Times, serif;
	font-weight: bold;
	font-size: 18px;
	color: #0000FF;
}
.style10 {font-family: "Courier New", Courier, monospace; font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; }
.style11 {color: #0000FF}
.style13 {font-family: Garamond; font-weight: bold; font-size: 16px; color: #FFFFFF; }
-->
</style>
<body>
<table width="100%" border="0">
  <tr>
    <td width="2%" height="38">&nbsp;</td>
    <td  width="32%" bgcolor="#0000FF"><div align="center"><span class="style1">Problem I
      </span>
    </div>
      <div align="center"></div></td>
    
    <td bgcolor="#0000FF" width="32%"><div align="center"><span class="style1">Is this the easiest problem? </span></div></td>
    <td width="24%" valign="middle" bgcolor="#0000FF"><div align="center"><span class="style13">Time Limit : 
    1 second</span></div></td>
    
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="4"><p>&nbsp;</p>
      <p align="justify">A triangle is a geometric shape with three positive sides. However,  any given three sides won&rsquo;t necessarily form a triangle. The three sides must  form a closed region. Triangles are categorized depending on the values of the  sides of a valid triangle. In this problem you are required to determine the  type of a triangle.</p>
      

	<p align="justify">&nbsp;</p></td>
    <td width="7%">&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>

  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="3"><span class="style4">Input</span></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="4" align="justify"><p>The first line of input will contain a positive integer <strong>T&lt;20, </strong>where <strong>T</strong> denotes the number of test cases. Each of the next <strong>T</strong> lines will contain three 32 bit  signed integer.</p></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="4">&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="4"><span class="style4">Output</span></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="4" align="justify"><p>For each case of&nbsp;  input there will be one line of output. It will be formatted as: <br />
<strong>Case  {x}: {triangle type}</strong>. Where <strong>x</strong> denotes the case number being processed and <strong>{triangle type}</strong> is the type of the triangle..<strong>{triangle type}</strong> will be one of the following, depending on the  values of the three sides:</p>
      <ol>
      <ul>
        <li>Invalid - The three sides can not form a triangle</li>
        <li>Equilateral&nbsp; - All three sides of valid triangle are equal</li>
        <li>Isosceles&nbsp; -  Exactly two of the sides of a valid triangle are equal. </li>
        <li>Scalene - No pair of sides are equal in a valid triangle.</li>
      </ul>
    </td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="4">&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td><span class="style4">Sample Input</span></td>
    <td><span class="style4">Sample Output </span></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>

    <td class="style10"><p>4<br />
      1 2 5<br />
      1 1 1<br />
      4 4 2<br />
    3 4 5</p></td>
    <td valign="top"><p><span class="style10">Case 1: Invalid<br />
      Case 2: Equilateral<br />
      Case 3: Isosceles<br />
      Case 4: Scalene</span> </p></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td class="style10" colspan="4"><hr />
      <p>Problem Setter: Shamim Hafiz <br>
      <span class="style11">Next Generation Contest 5 </span></p>
    </td>
    <td valign="top">&nbsp;</td>
    <td width="1%">&nbsp;</td>
    <td width="1%">&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
</table>
</body>

______________________________________________________
11480||||||false||||||
<title>J :: Jimmy's Balls</title>
<style type="text/css">
<!--
.style1 {
	font-family: Garamond;
	font-weight: bold;
	font-size: 28px;
	color: #FFFFFF;
}
.style3 {
	font-family: "Courier New", Courier, monospace;
	font-weight: bold;
	font-size:15px
}
.style4 {
	font-family: Georgia, "Times New Roman", Times, serif;
	font-weight: bold;
	font-size: 18px;
	color: #0000FF;
}
.style10 {font-family: "Courier New", Courier, monospace; font-weight: bold; font-size: 13px; }
.style11 {color: #0000FF}
.style13 {font-family: Garamond; font-weight: bold; font-size: 16px; color: #FFFFFF; }
-->
</style>
<body>
<table width="100%" border="0">
  <tr>
    <td width="2%" height="38">&nbsp;</td>
    <td  width="32%" bgcolor="#0000FF"><div align="center"><span class="style1">Problem J
      </span>
    </div>
      <div align="center"></div></td>
    
    <td bgcolor="#0000FF" width="32%"><div align="center"><span class="style1">Jimmy's Balls  </span></div></td>
    <td width="24%" valign="middle" bgcolor="#0000FF"><div align="center"><span class="style13">Time Limit : 
    1 second</span></div></td>
    
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="4"><p>&nbsp;</p>
      <p>Jimmy has a very large bag full of balls. Each ball has a  single color. There are three colors; red, blue and green. There is atleast one ball of each type and the number of blue balls is more than that of red balls. And the number of green balls is more than that of blue balls. </p>
      <p><strong><em>0 &lt; number</em></strong><strong><em> of red balls &lt;&nbsp; number of blue balls &lt; number of green  balls.</em></strong></p>
      <p><strong></strong>Given the total number of balls, how many different colored  combinations can there be.</p>
      <p>For <span class="style10">N</span> = 10, there are 4 combinations as shown in the diagram.</p>
      <p><span>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span> <img src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/p11480.png"  /> </p>
      <p align="justify">&nbsp;</p>

	</td>
    <td width="7%">&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>

  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="3"><span class="style4">Input</span></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="4" align="justify">There will be many cases. Each case is an integer <span class="style10"><strong>N</strong></span><strong> (<span class="style10"> 6 &lt;= N &lt;= 1000010</span> ). <span class="style10">N</span> </strong>denotes  the total number of balls in the bag. Input is terminated with a <span class="style10">0</span>.</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="4">&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="4"><span class="style4">Output</span></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="4" align="justify">For each case, output the case number, followed by the  answer. Look at the sample for clarification.</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td colspan="4">&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td><span class="style4">Sample Input</span></td>
    <td><span class="style4">Sample Output </span></td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>

    <td class="style10"><p>6<br />
      10<br />
      0</p>
    </td>
    <td valign="top"><p class="style10">Case 1: 1<br />
      Case 2: 4</p>
    </td>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td>&nbsp;</td>
    <td class="style10" colspan="4"><hr />
      <p>Problem Setter: Sohel Hafiz <br>
      <span class="style11">Next Generation Contest 5 </span></p>
      </td>
    <td valign="top">&nbsp;</td>
    <td width="1%">&nbsp;</td>
    <td width="1%">&nbsp;</td>
  </tr>
</table>
</body>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;mso-table-layout-alt:fixed;border:none;
 mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:
 0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:.25pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:
 .25pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:67.25pt'>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
  height:67.25pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:72.0pt;font-family:
  Arial'>A<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=544 style='width:407.8pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-left:
  none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:67.25pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
  style='font-size:36.0pt;font-family:Impact;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Arrange
  the Numbers<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=ListParagraph><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:16.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:Garamond'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt'>Consider this sequence {1, 2, 3, 
 , N}, as a initial sequence of first
<b>N</b> natural numbers. You can rearrange this sequence in many ways. There
will be <b>N!</b> different arrangements. You have to calculate the number of
arrangement of first <b>N</b> natural numbers, where in first <b>M </b>(M&lt;=N)
positions, exactly <b>K </b>(K&lt;=M) numbers are in its initial position.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt'>Example:<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt'>For, N = 5, M = 3, K =2<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt'>You should count this arrangement {1, 4, 3, 2, 5}, here in first 3
positions 1 is in 1<sup>st</sup> position and 3 in 3<sup>rd</sup> position. So
exactly 2 of its first 3 are in there initial position. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt'>But you should not count this {1, 2, 3, 4, 5}.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:Arial'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>The first line of
input is an integer <b>T(T&lt;=1000)</b> that indicates the number of test
cases. Next T line contains 3 integers each, <b>N(1&lt;=N&lt;=1000),</b> <b>M</b>,
and <b>K</b>. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:Arial'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>For each case,
output the case number, followed by the answer modulo <b>1000000007</b>. Look
at the sample for clarification.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-style:normal'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></h1>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                             </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1<br>
  5 3 2<br style='mso-special-character:line-break'>
  <![if !supportLineBreakNewLine]><br style='mso-special-character:line-break'>
  <![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=309 valign=top style='width:231.85pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case <st1:time
  Hour="13" Minute="12" w:st="on">1: 12</st1:time><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<body lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:16.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:Garamond'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width=641
 style='width:480.9pt;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .25pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.25pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:67.25pt'>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
  height:67.25pt'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:16.0pt;
  font-family:Garamond;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Times New Roman";mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US;
  mso-bidi-language:AR-SA'><br clear=all style='page-break-before:always'>
  </span>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;
  text-align:center;line-height:normal;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:72.0pt;font-family:Arial'>B<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=544 style='width:407.8pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-left:
  none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:67.25pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;
  text-align:center;line-height:normal;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
  style='font-size:36.0pt;font-family:Impact;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Building
  a Triangular Museum<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;
  text-align:center;line-height:normal;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=ListParagraph><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:16.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:Garamond'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
text-align:justify;line-height:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman"'>You are an architect now; you work for a firm as
a head architect. People find you smart and brilliant. You have already showed
your talent in some sources. That's why your popularity is growing day by day. And
of course who doesn't enjoy such popularity!<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
line-height:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Your
firm has recently got a job. The job is quite simple. You have to build a
museum, actually a '<st1:place w:st="on"><st1:PlaceName w:st="on">Triangular</st1:PlaceName>
 <st1:PlaceType w:st="on">Museum</st1:PlaceType></st1:place>'. The shape of the
museum will be triangular and the rooms inside it will be triangular, too. And
the overall building process is given below<span class=GramE>:</span><br>
You will be given two numbers </span><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>M</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman"'> and </span><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>N</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman"'>. </span><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>N</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman"'> denotes the number of levels and </span><b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>M</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'> denotes the size. That
means you have to build a museum which should have </span><b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>N</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'> levels, the first level
will contain one triangular room.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
text-align:justify;line-height:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;Now, for building a triangular room of
size </span><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>M</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>, first you have to put<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
text-align:justify;line-height:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;</span><b><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>/\&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
(forward slash and a backward slash)</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
text-align:justify;line-height:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;Then for each </span><b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>i-th</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'> row (</span><b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>i = 2 to M-1</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>), you have to put<span
class=GramE>&nbsp; a</span> </span><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
"Courier New"'>'/'</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>
(forward slash) and </span><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2*(i-1)</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'> spaces and after that a
</span><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>'\'</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'> (backward slash). The </span><b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>M-th</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'> row will contain a </span><b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>'/'</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>,<span class=GramE>&nbsp;
<b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>2</span></b></span></span><b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>*(M-1)</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'> </span><b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>'_'</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'> (underscore) and a </span><b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>'\'</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>. And add spaces to the
previous parts so that the overall shape looks fully triangular. Suppose, </span><b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>M = 4</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>. Then a room will be
like:<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
text-align:justify;line-height:normal'><b><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>.../\<br>
../..\<br>
./....\<br>
/______\</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
text-align:justify;line-height:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;(Here spaces are shown as dots)&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
text-align:justify;line-height:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Now, for building all the </span><b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>N</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'> levels, for each </span><b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>i-th</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'> level (</span><b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>i = 2 to N</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>), you have to build </span><b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>i</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'> triangular rooms, each
will start from the base vertices of the previous triangular rooms. (Note that
the first level will contain one room only). If </span><b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>N = 1</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'> and </span><b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>M = 2</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>. Then the museum will
be like:&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
line-height:normal'><b><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>./\<br>
/__\</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
line-height:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
line-height:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;If
</span><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>N = 2</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'> and </span><b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>M = 2</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>. Then the museum will
be like: (Two triangular rooms added)&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
line-height:normal'><b><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>.../\<br>
../__\<br>
&nbsp;/\../\<br>
/__\/__\<br>
<br>
</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>If </span><b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>N = 3</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'> and </span><b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>M = 2</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>. Then the museum will
be like: (Three triangular rooms added)<br>
</span><b><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>...../\<br>
..../__\<br>
.../\../\<br>
../__\/__\<br>
./\../\../\<br>
/__\/__\/__\</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
text-align:justify;line-height:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Now given </span><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>M</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman"'> and </span><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'>N</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman"'>, your job is to build the triangular museum.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:normal'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input<br>
</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Input
contains several sets of inputs. Each set contains two integers </span><b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>M (1 &lt; M &lt;= 100)</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'> and </span><b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>N (1 &lt;= N &lt;= 100)</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>. A line containing two zeroes
denotes the end of input.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:72.75pt'><span class=GramE><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>Output<br>
</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>For
each set of input.</span></span><span style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;
font-family:"Times New Roman"'> <span class=GramE>First print <b>'<st1:place
w:st="on"><st1:PlaceName w:st="on">Triangular</st1:PlaceName> <st1:PlaceType
 w:st="on">Museum</st1:PlaceType></st1:place> x'</b> (where <b>x</b> denotes
the set number starting from <b>1</b>) in a single line.</span> Then draw the
triangular museum according to the description. Finally print a blank line.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-style:normal'>Sample Input</span></b><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:
normal'><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                             </span></span></b><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-style:normal'>Output for
Sample Input</span></b><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'><o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:245.65pt'>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:245.65pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:normal'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>2 1<br>
  2 2<br>
  3 3<br>
  0 0<br>
  <br style='mso-special-character:line-break'>
  <![if !supportLineBreakNewLine]><br style='mso-special-character:line-break'>
  <![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=309 valign=top style='width:231.85pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:245.65pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
  line-height:normal'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Triangular Museum 1&nbsp;<br>
  <span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>/\<br>
  /__\</span></b><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:
  10.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
  line-height:normal'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Triangular Museum 2<br>
  &nbsp;&nbsp; /\<br>
  &nbsp; /__\<br>
  &nbsp;/\&nbsp; /\<br>
  /__\/__\<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
  line-height:normal'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Triangular Museum 3<br>
  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; /\<br>
  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; /&nbsp; \<br>
  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; /____\<br>
  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; /\&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; /\<br>
  &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; /&nbsp; \&nbsp; /&nbsp; \<br>
  &nbsp;&nbsp; /____\/____\<br>
  &nbsp; /\&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; /\&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; /\<br>
  &nbsp;/&nbsp; \&nbsp; /&nbsp; \&nbsp; /&nbsp; \<br>
  /____\/____\/____\</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div style='margin-bottom:10.0pt'>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;
text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

	font-size:11.0pt;

	mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
p.HTMLPreformatted0, li.HTMLPreformatted0, div.HTMLPreformatted0
	{mso-style-name:"HTML Preformatted\,Char";
	mso-style-link:"Char Char Char";
	margin-top:0in;
	margin-right:0in;
	margin-bottom:10.0pt;
	margin-left:0in;
	line-height:115%;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:Calibri;
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
p.HTMLPreformatted1, li.HTMLPreformatted1, div.HTMLPreformatted1
	{mso-style-name:"HTML Preformatted\,Char";
	mso-style-link:"Char Char Char";
	margin-top:0in;
	margin-right:0in;
	margin-bottom:10.0pt;
	margin-left:0in;
	line-height:115%;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:Calibri;
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
p.HTMLPreformatted2, li.HTMLPreformatted2, div.HTMLPreformatted2
	{mso-style-name:"HTML Preformatted\,Char";
	mso-style-link:"Char Char Char";
	margin-top:0in;
	margin-right:0in;
	margin-bottom:10.0pt;
	margin-left:0in;
	line-height:115%;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:Calibri;
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
span.StyleArial16pt
	{mso-style-name:"Style Arial 16 pt";
	mso-ansi-font-size:16.0pt;
	font-family:Arial;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;
	mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
	font-weight:bold;}
span.style31
	{mso-style-name:style31;
	mso-ansi-font-size:11.5pt;
	mso-bidi-font-size:11.5pt;
	font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-ascii-font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
	font-weight:bold;}
span.style101
	{mso-style-name:style101;
	mso-ansi-font-size:10.0pt;
	mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;

	mso-ascii-font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";

	{mso-style-name:" ;
	mso-spl-e:yes;}

	{mso-style-name:" ;
	mso-gram-e:yes;}

</style>
<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-parent:" ;
	mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin:0in;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-ansi-language:#0400;
	mso-fareast-language:#0400;
	mso-bidi-language:#0400;}

	{mso-style-name:"Table Grid";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;

	mso-para-margin:0in;

	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-ansi-language:#0400;
	mso-fareast-language:#0400;
	mso-bidi-language:#0400;}
</style>

 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="5122"/>

 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .25pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.25pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:67.25pt'>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.05pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
  height:67.25pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;
  text-align:center;line-height:normal;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:72.0pt;font-family:Arial'>C<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=541 style='width:405.75pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-left:
  none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:67.25pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;
  text-align:center;line-height:normal;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
  style='font-size:36.0pt;font-family:Impact;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Code
  Creator<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;
  text-align:center;line-height:normal;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=ListParagraph><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:16.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:Garamond'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:normal'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>With increased
popularity of programming competitions, there are so many online judges where contestants
can practice. Usually, most of these sites allow users to submit solutions to
problems and if they are accepted, the users total number of solved is
increased. To increase competition among users, these sites maintain a ranking
of users based on the total number of solves. Unfortunately, this at times has
introduced unhealthy competition among some users. A lot of the problems at
these sites are collected from external sites, and the online judge uses data
file directly from these external sites. This means, for certain problem, one
is only required to submit the output file to get a problem accepted, without
solving the problem at all. Just out of curiosity, you try to investigate how
many of these problems are actually using judge data from the external site. To
accelerate your investigation, you want to automate the process of creating
codes that will submit judge data only. In this problem, you are required to
make such a code generator.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:Arial'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Each case of input starts with a positive
integer <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N&lt;100</b>. <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b> lines follow each containing at least
1 and at most 100 characters. The Input characters will consist of
alphanumeric, spaces, backslash and quotation only. The last case is followed
by a value of 0 for <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b>.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:Arial'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:normal'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Each case of output will
start with a line containing the case number in the format <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>Case x: </b>where x is the case number. The next few lines will be a C
code which when compiled and run will generate the input given for that case.
Since there are so many ways to write a program that will generate the same
output, for this problem we will restrict ourselves to the following format. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>#include&lt;<span class=SpellE>string.h</span>&gt;<br>
#include&lt;<span class=SpellE>stdio.h</span>&gt;<br>
<span class=SpellE>int</span> <span class=GramE>main(</span>)<br>
{<br>
&lt;case specific lines&gt;<br>
printf(\n);<br>
return 0;<br>
}<o:p></o:p></span></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:normal'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>&lt;<span class=GramE>case</span> specific lines&gt; </span></i><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>will contain the same
number of lines as <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b> for that case,
each formatted as: <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>printf(&lt;line&gt;\n);
</b>where <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>&lt;line&gt;</b> is the input
value entered for that corresponding line. Note that, the two characters <span
class=GramE><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'></b> and</span> <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>\</b> must be escaped by a <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>\</b> in order to be displayed by <span
class=SpellE>printf</span> . The sample input/output will clarify further.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:normal'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>In case you are curious,
why there is a <span class=GramE><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>printf(</i></span><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>\n); </i>before the <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>return 0; </i>, its there to get this code presentation error so that
its not counted as accepted. You dont want to increase your number that way,
do you?<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Sample
Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:normal'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:normal'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>I like to solve<br>
I do not like to code<br>
1<br>
yeah accepted<br>
0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Sample
Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<div style='mso-element:para-border-div;border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
mso-border-bottom-alt:solid windowtext .75pt;padding:0in 0in 1.0pt 0in'>

<p class=MsoNormal style='border:none;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid windowtext .75pt;
padding:0in;mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 1.0pt 0in'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 1: <br>
#include&lt;<span class=SpellE>string.h</span>&gt;<br>
#include&lt;<span class=SpellE>stdio.h</span>&gt;<br>
<span class=SpellE>int</span> main()<br>
{<br>
<span class=SpellE>printf</span>(\I like to solve\\n);<br>
<span class=SpellE>printf</span>(I do not like to code\n);<br>
<span class=SpellE>printf</span>(\n);<br>
return 0;<br>
}<br>
Case 2:<br>
#include&lt;<span class=SpellE>string.h</span>&gt;<br>
#include&lt;<span class=SpellE>stdio.h</span>&gt;<br>
<span class=SpellE>int</span> main()<br>
{<br>
<span class=SpellE>printf</span>(yeah accepted\n);<br>
<span class=SpellE>printf</span>(\n);<br>
return 0;<br>
}<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:
Arial'>Problem <span class=GramE>Setter :</span> <span class=SpellE>Shamim</span>
Hafiz<br>
Special Thanks : <span class=SpellE>Sohel</span> Hafiz<o:p></o:p></span></p>

</div>

</body>

</html>

	mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
p.HTMLPreformatted1, li.HTMLPreformatted1, div.HTMLPreformatted1
	{mso-style-name:"HTML Preformatted\,Char";
	mso-style-link:"Char Char Char";
	margin-top:0in;
	margin-right:0in;
	margin-bottom:10.0pt;
	margin-left:0in;
	line-height:115%;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:Calibri;
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
p.HTMLPreformatted2, li.HTMLPreformatted2, div.HTMLPreformatted2
	{mso-style-name:"HTML Preformatted\,Char";
	mso-style-link:"Char Char Char";
	margin-top:0in;
	margin-right:0in;
	margin-bottom:10.0pt;
	margin-left:0in;
	line-height:115%;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:11.0pt;
	font-family:Calibri;
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
span.StyleArial16pt
	{mso-style-name:"Style Arial 16 pt";
	mso-ansi-font-size:16.0pt;
	font-family:Arial;
	mso-ascii-font-family:Arial;
	mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;
	mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
	font-weight:bold;}
span.style31
	{mso-style-name:style31;
	mso-ansi-font-size:11.5pt;
	mso-bidi-font-size:11.5pt;
	font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-ascii-font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
	font-weight:bold;}
span.style101
	{mso-style-name:style101;
	mso-ansi-font-size:10.0pt;
	mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-ascii-font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-hansi-font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
	font-weight:bold;}
span.SpellE
	{mso-style-name:" ;
	mso-spl-e:yes;}
span.GramE
	{mso-style-name:" ;
	mso-gram-e:yes;}

	{size:8.5in 11.0in;
	margin:1.0in 1.0in 1.0in 1.0in;
	mso-header-margin:.5in;
	mso-footer-margin:.5in;
	mso-paper-source:0;}
div.Section1
	{page:Section1;}
 /* List Definitions */
 @list l0
	{mso-list-id:125974433;

<!--[if gte mso 10]>

 /* Style Definitions */

</head>

<body lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .25pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.25pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:67.25pt'>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.0pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
  height:67.25pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;
  text-align:center;line-height:normal;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:72.0pt;font-family:Arial'>D<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=541 style='width:405.8pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-left:
  none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:67.25pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;
  text-align:center;line-height:normal;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
  style='font-size:36.0pt;font-family:Impact;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Document
  Object Model<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;
  text-align:center;line-height:normal;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=ListParagraph><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:16.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:Garamond'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:normal'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>The <span class=GramE>DOM(</span>Document
Object Model) is a way to represent HTML pages. The entire document is composed
of nested elements. There is one parent element and all other elements are children
or grandchildren of this element. In order to traverse between the elements,
the browser uses few functions. In this problem we will be simulating a subset
of those functions, on a given HTML document.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:normal'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>For this problem we will
assume that the html document is defined as follows.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:normal'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Each line of the
document will be in one of the following format: <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:0in;
margin-left:39.0pt;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;tab-stops:list 39.0pt'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'><span style='mso-list:
Ignore'>i)<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>&lt;n value=<i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>&lt;word&gt;</i>&gt; </span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>where <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>&lt;word&gt;</i></b>
will consist of one or more alphabets.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:0in;
margin-left:39.0pt;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
line-height:normal;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;tab-stops:list 39.0pt'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'><span style='mso-list:
Ignore'>ii)<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>&lt;/n&gt;</span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:normal'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:normal'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Here lines of first category
indicate the opening of a new element and that of the second indicates the
closing of one. Note that, an element may have zero or more elements nested
inside so a <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>&lt;/n&gt; </b>would
indicate the closing of most recently opened element. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=HTMLPreformatted style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:
12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>The simulation will be done as follows:
Initially a pointer will be pointing the parent element. Each instruction will
move the pointer to a new element, depending on the instruction given. There
maybe situations when the instruction given will attempt to move the pointer to
an element that doesnt exist. In that case, the pointer will remain at the
current element. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:
Arial'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:normal;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Each case of input
starts with a positive number <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N&lt;=1000</b>.
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b> lines then follow, each containing
the definition of the document. You may assume that the definition is correct
and complete. The next line will contain a positive integer <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>I&lt;=100</b>, where <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>I</b> denotes the total number of instructions for that case. Next <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>I</b> lines each contain a single valid
instruction. The last case is followed by a value of 0 for <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>N</b>. Each line of input file will contain at most 100 characters.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:normal;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>The instructions will be
from the following set:<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:0in;
margin-left:39.0pt;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
line-height:normal;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo4;tab-stops:list 39.0pt'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'><span style='mso-list:
Ignore'>i)<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>first_<span
class=GramE>child :</span> move to the first child of the current element.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:0in;
margin-left:39.0pt;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.5in;
line-height:normal;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo4;tab-stops:list 39.0pt'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'><span style='mso-list:
Ignore'>ii)<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>next_sibling:
move to the next sibling of the current element.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:0in;
margin-left:39.0pt;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-indent:-.5in;line-height:normal;
mso-list:l1 level1 lfo4;tab-stops:list 39.0pt'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'><span style='mso-list:
Ignore'>iii)<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>previous_sibling:
move to the previous sibling of the current element.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-top:0in;margin-right:0in;margin-bottom:0in;
margin-left:39.0pt;margin-bottom:.0001pt;text-indent:-.5in;line-height:normal;
mso-list:l1 level1 lfo4;tab-stops:list 39.0pt'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'><span style='mso-list:
Ignore'>iv)<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span class=GramE><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman"'>parent</span></span><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman"'>: move to the parent element of the current
element.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:
Arial'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:
Arial'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:normal;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>The output for each case
starts with a line containing the case number in the form, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>Case &lt;x&gt;<span class=GramE>:<span style='font-weight:normal'> ,</span></span></b>
where <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>&lt;x&gt;</b> denotes the case
number. Each of the next <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>I</b> lines,
one for each instruction, contain the value of the current node as described
earlier. See the sample input/output for further clarification.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:
normal'>Sample Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                            
</span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:normal'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>4<br>
  &lt;n value=parent&gt;<br>
  &lt;n value=child&gt;<br>
  &lt;/n&gt;<br>
  &lt;/n&gt;<br>
  2<br>
  next_sibling<br>
  first_child<br>
  0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:normal'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><br
  style='mso-special-character:line-break'>
  <![if !supportLineBreakNewLine]><br style='mso-special-character:line-break'>
  <![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=309 valign=top style='width:231.85pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='line-height:normal'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 1:<br>
  parent<br>
  child<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div style='mso-element:para-border-div;border:none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
mso-border-bottom-alt:solid windowtext .75pt;padding:0in 0in 1.0pt 0in'>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
border:none;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid windowtext .75pt;padding:0in;
mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 1.0pt 0in'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
16.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:Garamond'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:Arial'>Problem <span
class=GramE>Setter :</span> <span class=SpellE>Shamim</span> Hafiz<br>
Special Thanks : Jane <span class=SpellE>Alam</span> Jan<o:p></o:p></span></p>

</div>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;

 .25pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.25pt solid windowtext'>

  height:67.25pt'>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.0pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
  height:67.25pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;
  text-align:center;line-height:normal;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:72.0pt;font-family:Arial'>E<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=541 style='width:405.8pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-left:
  none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;

  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-bottom:0in;margin-bottom:.0001pt;
  text-align:center;line-height:normal;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
  style='font-size:36.0pt;font-family:Impact;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Extreme
  Discrete Summation <o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=ListParagraph style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:16.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:
Garamond'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>Given set S what is the value of the right hand side of the
following assignment? In other words<br>
what is the value of <span class=GramE>A.</span></span><span style='font-family:
"Times New Roman"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:480pt;
 height:70.5pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/e_files/image027.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=640 height=94
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/e_files/image027.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1025"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1282574589">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>For example if S<span class=GramE>={</span>1.2, 3.6, 4.1}
then the possible values for variable <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1026"
 type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:12pt;height:24pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/e_files/image027.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=16 height=32
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/e_files/image027.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1026"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1282574590">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>is 1.2, 3.6 or 4.1.
The same is true for <span class=GramE>variables </span><sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1027" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:14.25pt;height:24pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/e_files/image027.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=19 height=32
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/e_files/image027.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1027"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1027"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1282574591">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->, <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1028" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:12.75pt;height:25.5pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/e_files/image027.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=17 height=34
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/e_files/image027.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1028"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1028"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1282574592">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->, <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1029" type="#_x0000_t75"

 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->, <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1030" type="#_x0000_t75"

 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->,<sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1031" type="#_x0000_t75"

</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=19 height=34

 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1031"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1282574595">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->,<sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1032" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:14.25pt;height:25.5pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/e_files/image027.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=19 height=34
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/e_files/image027.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1032"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1032"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1282574596">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->,<sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1033" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:12.75pt;height:25.5pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/e_files/image027.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=17 height=34
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/e_files/image027.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1033"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1033"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1282574597">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->. Here <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1034"
 type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:18.75pt;height:18pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/e_files/image027.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=25 height=24
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/e_files/image027.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1034"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1034"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1282574598">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>means the nearest
smaller integer value of x (floor function). For <span class=GramE>example </span><sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1035" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:42pt;height:18pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/e_files/image027.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=56 height=24
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/e_files/image027.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1035"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1035"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1282574599">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->, <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1036" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:45.75pt;height:18pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/e_files/image027.wmz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=61 height=24
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/114/e_files/image027.wmz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1036"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1036"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1282574600">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->, <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1037" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:60.75pt;height:18pt' o:ole=" >

</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=81 height=24
