<body lang=EN-US link=blue vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem D</span></b><span
style='font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Recycling</span></b><b><span
style='font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input: </span></b><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard
Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard
Output </span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:
18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<table border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 style='border-collapse:collapse;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='height:103.05pt'>
  <td width=427 valign=top style='width:4.45in;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
  height:103.05pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  bold'>Recycling</span> involves processing used materials into new products
  in order to prevent the waste of potentially useful materials.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Recycling materials include
  things like glass, paper, plastic, metal and textiles. There are some
  materials that cant be recycled such as Aerosol Cans. Aerosol cans that are
  not empty may leak or explode during the sorting and baling processes of
  recycling.</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style="mso-spacerun:
  yes">  </span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=163 valign=top style='width:1.7in;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
  height:103.05pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=right style='text-align:right'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600"
   o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t" path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f"
   stroked="f">
   <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
   <v:formulas>
    <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
   </v:formulas>
   <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
   <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
  </v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:104.25pt;
   height:113.25pt'>
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/./d_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=139 height=151
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/./d_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]><o:p></o:p></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:304.75pt'>You are given
a list of materials to be recycled. The materials are initially aligned in a
line one after another. For every type of recyclable-material there is a
corresponding bin. You are required to place each recyclable-material in its
corresponding bin.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:304.75pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:304.75pt'>Example:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;text-indent:.5in;tab-stops:304.75pt'><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>paper  glass  paper  aerosol  paper<o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:304.75pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:304.75pt'>In the example
above, there are two types of recyclable-materials (paper &amp; glass) and one
type of non-recyclable-material. If we were to pick each material one by one
and throw them in the bins, we would require 4 moves since there are 4
recyclable-materials. However, if we remove consecutive items in one move,
provided they are of the same type, we could achieve the desired task in lesser
number of moves.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:304.75pt'>Lets see how
this can be done: If we remove the glass first then the first two papers appear
side by side enabling them to be moved together in the next move. Then we just
have one paper remaining at the end and that requires a further move. This
accumulates to a figure of 3 moves.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:304.75pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:304.75pt'>Illustration:<br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Courier New"'># Start<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">  </span>:
paper  glass  paper  aerosol  paper<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:304.75pt'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'># Move 1 :
paper  paper  aerosol  paper [ </span></b><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>after removing
glass</span></i><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'> ]<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:304.75pt'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'># Move 2 :
aerosol  paper<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">  </span>[ </span></b><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
"Courier New"'>after removing first 2 papers </span></i><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>]<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:304.75pt'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'># Move 3 :
aerosol [ </span></b><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>after removing the last
paper</span></i><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'> ]<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:304.75pt'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<h2>Input</h2>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:304.75pt'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>The first line of input is an integer <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>T</b>(<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>T</b>&lt;50)
that indicates the number of test cases. Each case starts with an integer <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b>(<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b>&lt;100).
The next line contains the names of <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b>
materials. The name of each material is a string containing only characters
from the set [a..z] and [A..Z] and the length of each is at most 20. A
recyclable-material is represented by lowercase letters only and that of
non-recyclable-material by uppercase letters only.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:304.75pt'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h2>Output</h2>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:304.75pt'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>For each case, output the case number
followed by the minimum number of moves required to clean up all the
recyclable-materials meeting the constraints mentioned above.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:304.75pt'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-style:normal'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">                                
</span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width=595 bgcolor="#cccccc"
 style='width:446.45pt;background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;
 mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr>
  <td width=331 valign=top style='width:3.45in;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>3<br>
  5<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>paper glass paper AEROSOL paper<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>4<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>icpc icpc icpc icpc<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>NO RECYCLABLE MATERIALS<br
  style='mso-special-character:line-break'>
  <![if !supportLineBreakNewLine]><br style='mso-special-character:line-break'>
  <![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=264 valign=top style='width:198.05pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 1: 3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 2: 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <h3>Case 3: 0</h3>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:304.75pt'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:304.75pt'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Problem Setter : Sohel
Hafiz<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Verdana;
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Special Thanks : Md. Arifuzzaman Arif<o:p></o:p></span></p>

</div>

<title>Problem E - In-Circle</title>
<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>

<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="1040"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem E</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>In-Circle</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b>S<span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>tandard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>In-circle of a triangle is the circle
that touches all the three sides of the triangle internally. The center of the
in-circle of a triangle happens to be the common intersection point of the
three bisectors of the internal angles. In this problem you will not be asked
to find the in-circle of a triangle, but will be asked to do the opposite!!</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><!--[if gte vml 1]><o:wrapblock><v:shapetype
  id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
  path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
  <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
  <v:formulas>
   <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
   <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
   <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
   <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
   <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
   <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
   <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
   <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
   <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
   <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
   <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
   <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
  </v:formulas>
  <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
  <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
 </v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_s1036" type="#_x0000_t75" style='position:absolute;
  left:0;text-align:left;margin-left:126pt;margin-top:0;width:234pt;height:147.45pt;
  z-index:1;mso-position-horizontal:absolute;mso-position-vertical:absolute'>
  <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/./e_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
  <w:wrap type="topAndBottom" anchorx="page"/>
 </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><span style='mso-ignore:vglayout'>
 <table cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0>
  <tr>
   <td width=168 height=0></td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
   <td></td>
   <td><img width=312 height=197 src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/./e_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_s1036"></td>
  </tr>
 </table>
 </span><![endif]><!--[if gte vml 1]></o:wrapblock><![endif]--><br
style='mso-ignore:vglayout' clear=ALL>
You can see in the figure above that the in-circle of triangle ABC touches the
sides AB, BC and CA at point P, Q and R respectively and P, Q and R divides AB,
BC and CA in ratio m1:n1, m2:n2 and m3:n3 respectively. Given these ratios and
the value of the radius of in-circle, you have to find the area of triangle
ABC. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<br style='mso-ignore:vglayout' clear=ALL>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>First line of the input file
contains an integer N (0&lt;N&lt;50001), which denotes how many input sets are
to follow. The description of each set is given below.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Each set consists of four lines.
The first line contains a floating-point number r (1&lt;r&lt;5000), which
denotes the radius of the in-circle. Each of the next three lines contains two floating-point
numbers, which denote the values of m<sub>1</sub>, n<sub>1</sub>, m<sub>2</sub>,
n<sub>2</sub>, m<sub>3</sub> and n<sub>3</sub> (1&lt;m<sub>1</sub>, n<sub>1</sub>,
m<sub>2</sub>, n<sub>2</sub>, m<sub>3</sub>, n<sub>3</sub>&lt;50000)
respectively. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-tab-count:5'>                                                            </span></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:121.5pt'>For each set of
input produce one line of output. This line contains a floating-point number
that denotes the area of the triangle ABC. This floating-point number should
contain four digits after the decimal point. Errors less than 5*10<sup>-3</sup>
will be ignored. Use double-precision floating-point number for calculation. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">                              
</span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 bgcolor="#cccccc" style='background:

 <tr>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid windowtext .5pt;

<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="1051"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633cc" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem F</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Permutation</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b>Input: </b>Standard Input</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'>Standard
Output </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Given N and K find the Nth
permutation of the integers from 1 to K when those permutations are
lexicographically ordered.<span style="mso-spacerun: yes">  </span>N starts
from 0. Since N is very large N will be represented by a sequence of K
non-negative integers S<sub>1</sub>, S<sub>2</sub> ,
, S<sub>k</sub>. From this
sequence of integers N can be calculated with the following expression.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:1.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:
.5in'><span style="mso-spacerun: yes"> </span><!--[if supportFields]><span
style='mso-element:field-begin'></span><span style="mso-spacerun:
yes"> </span>QUOTE <span style='mso-text-raise:-5.5pt'><![if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:71.25pt;
 height:15pt'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/./f_files/image001.png"  o:title="  chromakey="white"/>
</v:shape><![endif]><![if !vml]><img width=95 height=20
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/./f_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></span><span
style="mso-spacerun: yes"> </span><span style='mso-element:field-separator'></span><![endif]--><span
style='mso-text-raise:-5.5pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1026"
 type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:71.25pt;height:15pt'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/./f_files/image001.png"  o:title="  chromakey="white"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=95 height=20
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/./f_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"><![endif]></span><!--[if supportFields]><span
style='mso-element:field-end'></span><![endif]--></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=stylearial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input</span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>First line of the input contains
T(&#8804;10) the number of test cases. Each of these test cases consists of 2
lines. First line contains a integer K(1&#8804;K&#8804;50000). Next line
contains K integers S<sub>1</sub>, S<sub>2</sub> ,
, S<sub>k</sub>.(0&#8804;S<sub>i</sub>&#8804;K-i).
</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>

<h4><span class=stylearial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output
</span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoBodyText2>For each test case output contains Nth permutation of
the integers from 1 to K. These K integers should be separated by a single
space.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
Output for Sample Input</span></b><o:p></o:p></h1>

<table border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 bgcolor="#cccccc" style='background:
 #CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=301 valign=top style='width:225.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><span lang=EN style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;mso-ansi-language:EN'>4<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  lang=EN style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;mso-ansi-language:
  EN'>3<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span lang=EN style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;mso-ansi-language:EN'>2 1 0<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  lang=EN style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;mso-ansi-language:
  EN'>3<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span lang=EN style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;mso-ansi-language:EN'>1 0 0<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  lang=EN style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;mso-ansi-language:
  EN'>4<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span lang=EN style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;mso-ansi-language:EN'>2 1 1 0<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  lang=EN style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;mso-ansi-language:
  EN'>4<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span lang=EN style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;mso-ansi-language:EN'>1 2 1 0<o:p></o:p></span></pre>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
  text-autospace:none'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
  <td width=315 valign=top style='width:236.35pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><span lang=EN
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;mso-ansi-language:EN'>3 2 1<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  lang=EN style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;mso-ansi-language:
  EN'>2 1 3<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span lang=EN style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;mso-ansi-language:EN'>3 2 4 1<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  lang=EN style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;mso-ansi-language:
  EN'>2 4 3 1<o:p></o:p></span></pre>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>


<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>


<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:Verdana'>Problemsetter: Abdullah al
Mahmud<o:p></o:p></span></p>

Rahman Khan<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<body lang=EN-US link="#009999" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem G</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>H(n) </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b>S<span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>tandard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output </span><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoPlainText><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoPlainText><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:"Times New Roman"'>What is the value this simple C++ function will
return?<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoPlainText><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoPlainText><b>long long H(int n){<o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoPlainText><b><span style='mso-tab-count:1'>      </span>long long
res = 0;<o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoPlainText><b><span style="mso-spacerun: yes">     </span>for( int i
= 1; i &lt;= n; i=i+1 ){<o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoPlainText><b><span style='mso-tab-count:2'>            </span>res =
(res + n/i);<o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoPlainText><b><span style='mso-tab-count:1'>      </span>} <o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoPlainText><b><span style="mso-spacerun: yes">     </span>return
res;<o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoPlainText><b>} <o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoPlainText><b><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoPlainText style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:
18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input</span></b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>The first line of input is an integer <b>T ( T &lt;= 1000 )</b>
that indicates the number of test cases. Each of the next T line will contain a
single signed 32 bit integer <b>n</b>.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoPlainText><b><span style='font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Arial'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoPlainText style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:
18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output</span></b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>For each test case, output will be a single line containing <b>H(n)</b>.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoPlainText style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h1><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:normal;
mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>Sample Input<span style="mso-spacerun:
yes">                      </span>Output for Sample Input</span><span
style='font-size:18.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 bgcolor="#cccccc" style='background:
 #CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=299 valign=top style='width:224.3pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoPlainText>2</p>
  <p class=MsoPlainText>5</p>
  <p class=MsoPlainText>10</p>
  <pre><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><span style='font-size:11.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></pre></td>
  <td width=317 valign=top style='width:237.95pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoPlainText>10</p>
  <p class=MsoPlainText>27</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>


<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>

<hr size=3 width="100%" align=center>

</div>


<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Problem-setter: Md. Arifuzzaman Arif<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;

	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
p.MsoCaption, li.MsoCaption, div.MsoCaption
	{margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	font-weight:bold;}
p.MsoTitle, li.MsoTitle, div.MsoTitle
	{margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	text-align:center;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;

	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	font-weight:bold;}

	{margin:0in;

<!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="1027"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633cc" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem H</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Morning Walk! </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b>Input: </b>Standard Input</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'>Standard
Output </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Many people walks in the morning
to keep fit. But morning walks can be strange for people who knows mathematics pretty
well. That is what has happened to Peter who loves mathematics and loves to
walk in the morning. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Peter starts walking from a fixed
point M. He walks s1 steps towards a certain direction, turns left or right and
then walks s2 steps to reach another place N. At N he turns left or right and
walks s3 steps in a straight line and then turns left or right and walks s4
steps in that direction and reaches another place P. At P he turns left or
right walks s5 steps in the same direction and then turns left or right and
then he again walks s6 steps to reach point M from where he started walking.
The next morning Peter decides to walks less, so from M he walks at the
direction of N and after exactly s7 steps he reaches N. From N he walks towards
the direction P and after s8 steps he reaches point P and from P he walks
towards point M. After walking exactly s9 steps he reaches point M again.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>But after walking he becomes very
exhausted and forgets his walking directions or the location of N and Q. He
only remembers that he has walked total S steps on the second morning. For
simplification you can assume the following things:<span style="mso-spacerun:
yes">   </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;
mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;tab-stops:list .5in'><![if !supportLists]>(a)<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><![endif]>At
each step Peter covers exactly the same distance.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;
mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;tab-stops:list .5in'><![if !supportLists]>(b)<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><![endif]>If peter
turns left or right is walking direction changes exactly 90 degree.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;
mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;tab-stops:list .5in'><![if !supportLists]>(c)<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><![endif]>While turning
only the direction of Peter changes, his position remains the same. Turning
left or right is not considered as a step.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;
mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;tab-stops:list .5in'><![if !supportLists]>(d)<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp; </span><![endif]>For the
first morning assume that s1, s2, s3, s4, s5, s6<span style='font-family:Arial'>&#8805;</span>0.
Also assume that M, N and P are three different point and not collinear.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><![if !supportEmptyParas]>&nbsp;<![endif]><o:p></o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>Given the value of S, your job is to find possible values of
s7, s8 and s9.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<h5><span class=stylearial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input</span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Input file contains at most 300
lines of inputs. Each line contains an integer S(0&lt;S <span style='font-family:
Arial'>&#8804; </span>60000). Input is terminated by a line containing a single
zero, which should not be processed.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>

<h4><span class=stylearial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output
</span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each line of input produce
two or more line of output. The first line should contain the serial of output.
The next lines should contain possible values of s7, s8 and s9. Please note
than you should print only those solutions where s7 <span style='font-family:
Arial'>&#8804;</span> s8 <span style='font-family:Arial'>&#8804; </span>s9. If
there is more than one solution then print them in the ascending order of s7.
If there is still a tie then print in the ascending order of S8. If no valid
values of s7, s8 and s9 is found print the line <span style='font-family:"Courier New"'></span><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Peter
has Forgotten Everything </span>instead. Look at the output for sample input
for details.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
Output for Sample Input</span></b></h1>

<table border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width=626 bgcolor="#cccccc"
 style='width:469.8pt;margin-left:-6.4pt;background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:
 collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
 <tr>
  <td width=313 valign=top style='width:234.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>10<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>12<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>13<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>100<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>50002<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=313 valign=top style='width:234.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;

  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;

  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>Peter has Forgotten Everything<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;

  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;

  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 3:<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>Peter has Forgotten Everything<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 4:<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;

  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;

  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;

	font-size:12.0pt;
	mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	color:black;
	mso-bidi-font-weight:bold;}
a:link, span.MsoHyperlink
	{color:#009999;
	mso-text-animation:none;
	text-decoration:none;
	text-underline:none;
	text-decoration:none;
	text-line-through:none;}
a:visited, span.MsoHyperlinkFollowed
	{color:purple;
	text-decoration:underline;
	text-underline:single;}
p
	{mso-margin-top-alt:auto;
	margin-right:0in;
	mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
	margin-left:0in;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";}
pre
	{margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Courier New";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Courier New";}

	{font-family:"Courier New";

</style>
<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;

	mso-fareast-language:#0400;
	mso-bidi-language:#0400;}
</style>
<![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="2050"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US link="#009999" vlink=purple style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:28.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem I</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:24.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Switch Grid</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Input: </b>S<span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>tandard Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>There is a grid with N rows and M columns. The rows are
numbered from 0 to N-1 and columns are numbered from 0 to M-1. Each of the <span
class=GramE>cell</span> in row 0 and each of the cell in column 0 contains a
bulb. Except the cell in row 0 and column 0 is empty. All the other rows can
contain a switch. The <span class=GramE>switch in the cell on row r and column
c change</span> the states of both bulbs in row r and column c. You are given
the initial states and the desired states of each of the bulb. Now given a list
of switches you need to press them in such a way that all the bulbs change
their states from their initial to desired states.</p>

<pre style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
18.0pt;font-family:Arial'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></pre>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Input</span></b><br>
<span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>Input contains multiple test cases.
First line contains T the number of test cases.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> 
</span>Each of the test <span class=GramE>case</span> consists of 7 lines. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=ListParagraphCxSpFirst style='text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>1.<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><![endif]><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>3 space
separated integers <span class=GramE>N(</span>1&#8804;N&#8804;1000),M(1&#8804;(1&#8804;N&#8804;1000)&#8804;1000)
and S(1&#8804;S&#8804;4000). N is the number of rows in the grid, M is the
number of columns in the grid and S is the number of switches.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=ListParagraphCxSpMiddle style='text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>2.<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><![endif]><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>N-1
space separated integers.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>Each of these
integers is either 0 or 1.The <span class=SpellE>ith</span> (<span
class=SpellE>i</span> starts from 1) denotes the initial state of the bulb in (i<span
class=GramE>,0</span>). 0 means off and 1 means on.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=ListParagraphCxSpMiddle style='text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>3.<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><![endif]><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>N-1
space separated integers.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>Each of these
integers is either 0 or 1. The <span class=SpellE>ith</span> (<span
class=SpellE>i</span> starts from 1) denotes the final state of the bulb in (i<span
class=GramE>,0</span>). <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=ListParagraphCxSpMiddle style='text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>4.<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><![endif]><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>M-1
space separated integers. Each of these integers is either 0 or 1. The <span
class=SpellE>ith</span> (<span class=SpellE>i</span> starts from 1) denotes
the initial state of the bulb in (0<span class=GramE>,i</span>). <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=ListParagraphCxSpMiddle style='text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>5.<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><![endif]><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>M-1
space separated integers. Each of these integers is either 0 or 1. The <span
class=SpellE>ith</span> (<span class=SpellE>i</span> starts from 1) denotes
the final state of the bulb in (0<span class=GramE>,i</span>). <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=ListParagraphCxSpMiddle style='text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>6.<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><![endif]><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>S space
separated integers.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>Each of these
integers is between 1 and N-1 inclusive. The <span class=SpellE>ith</span> (<span
class=SpellE>i</span> starts from 0) integers denote the row number of the <span
class=SpellE>ith</span> switch.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=ListParagraphCxSpLast style='text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman"'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>7.<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span></span><![endif]><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>S space
separated integers.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>Each of these
integers is between 1 and M-1 inclusive. The <span class=SpellE>ith</span> (<span
class=SpellE>i</span> starts from 0) integers denote the column number of the <span
class=SpellE>ith</span> switch.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>There is a blank
line after each of the test case. There will be 100 test cases.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Output</span></b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><br>
</span>For each test case output contains a single line. When there is no way
to transform the state of all the bulbs the line contains -1. Otherwise the
line starts with X followed by X integers. X is the number of switch presses
required to transform all the bulbs into the desired states. X should be less
than 10000.The next X integers denotes the indices of the switches that need to
be pressed. All of these X integers should be distinct. Any combination of
switch presses that transforms all the bulbs to their desired state will be
considered correct.</p>

<pre><span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></pre>

<h1 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-size:18.0pt'>&nbsp;</span><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Sample
Input&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
Output for Sample Input</span><span style='font-size:18.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=301 valign=top style='width:225.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3
  <span class=SpellE>3</span> 2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0
  <span class=SpellE>0</span><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1
  0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0
  <span class=SpellE>0</span><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0
  1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1
  2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1
  2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3
  <span class=SpellE>3</span> <span class=SpellE>3</span><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0
  <span class=SpellE>0</span><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1

  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1

  <span class=SpellE>1</span> 2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1
  2 <span class=SpellE>2</span><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>4
  <span class=SpellE>4</span> 5<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0
  <span class=SpellE>0</span> <span class=SpellE>0</span><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0
  1 <span class=SpellE>1</span><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0

  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1

  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1

  text-autospace:none'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span

"Times New Roman"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></pre></div>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .25pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.25pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  page-break-inside:avoid'>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:60.0pt;font-family:
  Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>A<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=546 valign=top style='width:409.3pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
  style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Impact;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Strange
  Tax Calculation<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Output</span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The people living in large cities
have to pay more tax than people living in rural areas. That is because in
cities people have many facilities, which rural people dont have. Also people
in large and famous cities tend to pay more tax than people living in smaller
cities or towns. Government of Euphoria now has a strange rule to decide tax
rate  Tax rate of a house is proportional to the total number of houses within
1 kilometer radius of it. The rule apparently seems ok, but as a result people
have started building houses 500 meters away from the main city and in this way
they are enjoying all the facilities but paying much less taxes. Also in this
way the town has begun to expand very quickly, which is not desirable.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>So the government of Euphoria now
decides to make a new tax rule which will be less (or not) understood by common
people and hence it will have less chance of being manipulated. In the new
rule, tax depends on the number of high rise buildings in the city and their
orientation. Any three high rise building makes Bermuda block in the city and
the tax depends on average number of high rise buildings per <st1:place w:st="on">Bermuda</st1:place>
block.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:.5pt solid windowtext;
 mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>
  <td width=349 valign=top style='width:261.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
  mso-no-proof:yes'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype id="_x0000_t75"

  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/a_files/image003.jpg"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=306 valign=top style='width:229.15pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><!--[if gte vml 1]><o:wrapblock><v:shape
    id="_x0000_s1035" type="#_x0000_t75" style='position:absolute;left:0;
    text-align:left;margin-left:-3.5pt;margin-top:-128.15pt;width:195.8pt;
    height:154.5pt;z-index:1;mso-position-horizontal-relative:text;
    mso-position-vertical-relative:text'>

    <w:wrap type="topAndBottom"/>
   </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><span style='mso-ignore:vglayout;

  style='mso-ignore:vglayout' clear=ALL>
  </p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=349 valign=top style='width:261.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Figure 1: High-rise buildings
  of Euphoria</p>
  </td>
  <td width=306 valign=top style='width:229.15pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Figure 2: The black circles
  denote the locations of high-rise buildings. Of the 10 <st1:place w:st="on">Bermuda</st1:place>
  blocks only 2 contains one high-rise building each. So the average number of high-rise
  building per <st1:place w:st="on">Bermuda</st1:place> block is 2/10 = 0.2.
  This figure corresponds to the first sample input.</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>As total number of buildings can
be high so you have to help the Mayor of Euphoria to write an efficient program
that will help calculate tax.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input file contains several
sets of inputs. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Each set starts with an integer N
(0 &#8804; N &#8804; 1200), which denotes the total number of high rise
building in the city. Each of the next N lines contains two integers x<sub><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>i</span></sub>, y<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt'>i</span></sub> (0 &#8804; x<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>i</span></sub>,
y<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>i </span></sub>&#8804; 10000)
which actually denotes that the Cartesian coordinate of the i-th high-rise
building is (x<sub><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>i</span></sub>, y<sub><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>i</span></sub>). You can assume that the city
is located on a flat land and it is so large that a point can actually be used
to denote the position of a high-rise building. You can also assume that no
three buildings are on the same straight line and no two buildings are at the
same place either. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>Input is terminated by a case where N=0.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>For each set
of input produce one line of output. This line contains the serial of output
followed by a floating-point number. This floating-point number denotes the
average number of high rise buildings per <st1:place w:st="on">Bermuda</st1:place>
block.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>This floating-point number should
be rounded to two digits after the floating-point. Look at the output for
sample input for details.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                            </span>Output for Sample
Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=301 valign=top style='width:225.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>5<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>29 84<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>81 81<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>28 36<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span

  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span

  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .25pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.25pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  page-break-inside:avoid'>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:60.0pt;font-family:
  Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>B<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=546 valign=top style='width:409.3pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
  style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Impact;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>SMS
  Typing<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width=648
 style='width:486.05pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-yfti-tbllook:480;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=486 valign=top style='width:364.25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>Cell phones have become an essential part of modern life.
  In addition to making voice calls, cell phones can be used to send text
  messages, which are known as SMS for short. Unlike computer keyboards, most cell
  phones have limited number of keys. To accommodate all alphabets, letters are
  compacted into single key. Therefore, to type certain characters, a key must
  be repeatedly pressed until that character is shown on the display panel. </p>
  </td>
  <td width=162 valign=top style='width:121.8pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
   id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
   path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
   <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
   <v:formulas>
    <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
   </v:formulas>
   <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
   <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
  </v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:105pt;
   height:67.5pt'>
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/p11530.gif"  o:title=" />
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=140 height=90
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/p11530.gif"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>In this problem we are interested in finding out the number
of times keys on a cell phone must be pressed to type a particular message.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>In this problem we will assume that the key pad of our cell
phone is arranged as follows. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>---------------------<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>|<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>      </span>| abc | def <span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>|<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>---------------------<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>| ghi<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>| jkl | mno<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> 
</span>|<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>---------------------<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>| pqrs |
tuv | wxyz |<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>---------------------<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>|<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>      </span>| &lt;SP&gt;|<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>      </span>|<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>---------------------</span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>In the above grid each cell
represents one key. Here <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>SP </b>means a
space. In order to type<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>the letter
a,<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>we must press that key once,
however to type b the same key must be repeatedly pressed twice and for c
three times. In the same manner, one key press for d, two for e and three
for f.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>This is also applicable for the
remaining keys and letters. Note that it takes a single press to type a space.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The first line of input will be a
positive integer <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>T </b>where <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>T</b> denotes the number of test cases. <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>T</b> lines will then follow each
containing only spaces and lower case letters. Each line will contain at least
1 and at most 100 characters. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For every case of input there
will be one line of output. It will first contain the case number followed by
the number of key presses required to type the message of that case. Look at
the sample output for exact formatting.<i><o:p></o:p></i></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                            </span>Output for Sample
Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=301 valign=top style='width:225.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>welcome
  to ulab<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>good luck and have fun</span></b><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=315 valign=top style='width:236.35pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>Case #1:
  29<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>Case #2:
  41<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .25pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.25pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  page-break-inside:avoid'>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:60.0pt;font-family:
  Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>C<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=546 valign=top style='width:409.3pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
  style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Impact;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Solve
  the Broken Maze<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText>There is a maze having 4 rows. Each of the 4 rows contains
N square blocks. There are two types of blocks used in this maze -</p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-left:35.35pt;text-indent:-14.15pt;
mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;tab-stops:list .5in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='mso-list:Ignore'>1.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span><![endif]>Type A </p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-left:35.35pt;text-indent:-14.15pt;
mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;tab-stops:list .5in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='mso-list:Ignore'>2.<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span><![endif]>Type B </p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Type A:</b> These
types of block have a path connecting two opposite sides of the block. There
are 2 possible ways to connect two adjacent sides of a block. So you can
classify Type A into 2 subclasses. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal><a name=w55t></a><span style='font-size:2.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:2.15pt 2.15pt 2.15pt 2.15pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  page-break-inside:avoid;height:.3in'>
  <td width=313 style='width:234.7pt;padding:2.15pt 2.15pt 2.15pt 2.15pt;
  height:.3in'>
  <p class=TableContents align=center style='text-align:center'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
   id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"

   <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>

    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>

    <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>

    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
   </v:formulas>
   <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
