   height:56.25pt'>
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/c_files/image007.gif"  o:title=" />
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=75 height=75
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/c_files/image007.gif"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></p>
  <p class=TableContents><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  </td>
  <td width=313 style='width:234.75pt;padding:2.15pt 2.15pt 2.15pt 2.15pt;
  height:.3in'>
  <p class=TableContents align=center style='text-align:center'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
   id="_x0000_i1026" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:56.25pt;height:56.25pt'>
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/c_files/image007.gif"  o:title=" />
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=75 height=75
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/c_files/image007.gif"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"><![endif]></p>
  <p class=TableContents><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoBodyText align=center style='text-align:center'>Fig: Type A </p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Type B:</b> These
types of block have a path connecting two adjacent sides of the block. There are
4 possible ways to connect two opposite sides of a block. So you can classify
Type B into 4 subclasses. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal><a name=a.pu></a><span style='font-size:2.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width=588
 style='width:441.0pt;margin-left:2.15pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:
 2.15pt 2.15pt 2.15pt 2.15pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  page-break-inside:avoid'>
  <td width=156 style='width:117.0pt;padding:2.15pt 2.15pt 2.15pt 2.15pt'>
  <p class=TableContents align=center style='text-align:center'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
   id="_x0000_i1027" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:56.25pt;height:56.25pt'>
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/c_files/image007.gif"  o:title=" />
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=75 height=75
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/c_files/image007.gif"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1027"><![endif]></p>
  </td>
  <td width=144 style='width:1.5in;padding:2.15pt 2.15pt 2.15pt 2.15pt'>
  <p class=TableContents align=center style='text-align:center'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
   id="_x0000_i1028" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:56.25pt;height:56.25pt'>
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/c_files/image007.gif"  o:title=" />
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=75 height=75
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/c_files/image007.gif"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1028"><![endif]></p>
  </td>
  <td width=144 style='width:1.5in;padding:2.15pt 2.15pt 2.15pt 2.15pt'>
  <p class=TableContents align=center style='text-align:center'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
   id="_x0000_i1029" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:56.25pt;height:56.25pt'>
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/c_files/image007.gif"  o:title=" />
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=75 height=75
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/c_files/image007.gif"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1029"><![endif]></p>
  </td>
  <td width=144 style='width:1.5in;padding:2.15pt 2.15pt 2.15pt 2.15pt'>
  <p class=TableContents align=center style='text-align:center'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
   id="_x0000_i1030" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:56.25pt;height:56.25pt'>
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/c_files/image007.gif"  o:title=" />
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=75 height=75
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/c_files/image007.gif"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1030"><![endif]></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoBodyText align=center style='text-align:center'>Fig: Type B </p>

<p class=MsoBodyText>So there are 4*N blocks in the maze. There is a player. By
entering into the left side, if the player can exit from the right side of the
maze using the paths of blocks, he will solve the maze. Unfortunately some of
the blocks are broken. The player cannot enter a broken block. </p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText>The player is very confused. He wants to know whether
there is a way to solve this maze. He wants your help. He doesnt want to start
solving the maze if the probability of having solution is zero. He e-mailed you
the maze description, and wants your suggestion whether he should start solving
or not. </p>

<p class=MsoBodyText>The player describes the maze by an integer N and 4 lines
of N characters. He uses three characters A, B, X. Here A represents block of
type A, B represents block of type B and X represents a broken block. The j<sub>th</sub>
character of i<sub>th</sub> line of these 4 lines represents the j<sub>th</sub>
block of i<sub>th</sub> row. </p>

<p class=MsoBodyText>By getting the mail you decided that it is not possible to
say whether there exists a solution or not, without knowing the subclasses. So
you decided to calculate the probability. If the probability is positive you
will reply the mail asking him to try otherwise you will reply asking him not
to try. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoBodyText>The first line of input is an integer T (T&lt;=25) that
indicates the number of e-mails from the player. Each mail consists of 5 lines.
First line is N ( 1&lt;=N&lt;=20,000 ). Each of the next 4 lines consists of N
characters. Only possible characters are A, B and X. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Output</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoBodyText>For each case output one line which describes your reply,
Try., or Dont Try. (Quotes for clarity).</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                          </span><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=301 valign=top style='width:225.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=TableContents><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>1 <o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=TableContents><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=TableContents><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>BAA <o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=TableContents><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>AXB <o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=TableContents><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>BAB <o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=TableContents><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>AXA <o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=315 valign=top style='width:236.35pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=TableContents>Try. </p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoBodyText><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>Explanation of
Sample Input:<o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText>Two images are given below, which are two possible mazes
according to players e-mail, as given in sample input. You have to reply with
Try. Because there is a positive probability that maze is solvable. </p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width=703
 style='width:526.95pt;margin-left:2.15pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:
 2.15pt 2.15pt 2.15pt 2.15pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  page-break-inside:avoid'>
  <td width=351 style='width:263.45pt;padding:2.15pt 2.15pt 2.15pt 2.15pt'>
  <p class=TableContents align=center style='text-align:center'><a name=inc-></a><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape

  <p class=TableContents align=center style='text-align:center'>There is a path
  to solve the maze.<br style='mso-special-character:line-break'>
  <![if !supportLineBreakNewLine]><br style='mso-special-character:line-break'>
  <![endif]></p>
  <p class=TableContents><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

for sample inputs.</p>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .25pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.25pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  page-break-inside:avoid'>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-left:.25in;text-align:center;
  tab-stops:143.25pt'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:60.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>D<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=546 valign=top style='width:409.3pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
  style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Impact;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Simple
  Adjacency Maximization <o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Output</span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>Find the smallest integer <b>N</b> that has both of the
following properties:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;
tab-stops:list .5in'><![if !supportLists]><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>1.<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span><![endif]>The
binary representation of <b>N</b> has exactly <b>P</b> 1s &amp; exactly <b>Q</b>
0s. (Leading Zeroes are allowed).</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;
tab-stops:list .5in'><![if !supportLists]><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>2.<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </span></span><![endif]>The
number of 1s adjacent to one or more 0 in the binary representation is
maximized.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'>The
first line of the input file contains a single integer <b>C</b>, the number of
test cases in the input file. Each of the next <b>C</b> lines contains two
non-negative integers <b>P</b> &amp; <b>Q </b>(1&lt;=<b>P+Q&lt;=50</b>).</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'>For
each test case a print the value of <b>N</b>, as explained in the statement, in
a line by itself.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                            </span>Output for Sample
Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=301 valign=top style='width:225.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>4 3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>1 1 <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>3 2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=315 valign=top style='width:236.35pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>45<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>13<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>

.shape {behavior:url(#default#VML);}
</style>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .25pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.25pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  page-break-inside:avoid'>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:60.0pt;font-family:
  Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>E<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=546 valign=top style='width:409.3pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
  style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Impact;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Special
  Number<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Output</span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>A puzzle from the 1962
International Mathematics Olympiad: &quot;We have a number (integer) with 6 as
the last (right-most) digit (936 for example). If we erase the 6 and put it on
the left end of the number (693 in our example), then we have a number four
times our original number. We see that 936 doesn't work. What is the smallest
number that does fit the above conditions?&quot; </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify'>For this problem, we slightly
generalize this puzzle: </p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify'>&quot;We have an <b>N</b>-base
number (integer) with <b>X</b> as the last (right-most) digit. If we erase the <b>X</b>
and put it on the left end of the number, then we have another <b>N</b>-base
number which is <b>Y</b> times our original number. Given <b>N</b> (in [2,
256]), <b>X</b> and <b>Y</b>, what is the smallest number that does fit the
above conditions?&quot;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'>There
will be no more than 1000 cases. Each test case will consist of exactly three integers
in a line, giving the values of <b>N</b>, <b>X</b> and <b>Y</b> respectively.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Output</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'>For
each case, print the case number, followed by the digits in the target number,
each digit seperated by a single space. If there is no solution, print a
message 'No solution' for that case.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                               </span>Output for
Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width=655
 style='width:491.4pt;background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;
 mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>10 6 4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>10 3 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>123 31 3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=336 valign=top style='width:3.5in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Case
  1: 1 5 3 8 4 6<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:

  3: 10 44 55 100 74 65 103 116 79 108 77 25 90 71 23 89 111 119 39 95 31 92 71

  </td>

</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>Problemsetter:
Sadrul Habib Chowdhury</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>Special

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:60.0pt;font-family:
  Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>F<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=546 valign=top style='width:409.3pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span

  Goodbye to Tic-Tac-Toe<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_s1036" type="#_x0000_t75" style='position:absolute;
 left:0;text-align:left;margin-left:0;margin-top:10.9pt;width:181.5pt;height:147.15pt;
 z-index:1;mso-position-horizontal:left;mso-position-horizontal-relative:text;
 mso-position-vertical-relative:text'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/f_files/image018.png"  o:title=" />
 <w:wrap type="square"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=242 height=196
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/f_files/image018.png"  align=left hspace=12 v:shapes="_x0000_s1036"><![endif]></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><a name=h9nd></a><st1:place w:st="on"><st1:City w:st="on"><span
  class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal'>Alice</span></span></st1:City></st1:place><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal'> was bored with the
game tic-tac-toe. Usually she used to play against computer. She was so bored
because, she always managed to make a tie against computer as she already
became an expert in this game. She was also bored about the matching things,
that means she does not like to see two adjacent 'X's or two adjacent 'O's. So
Bob created a new computer game for her. <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:
12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
font-weight:normal'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:
12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
font-weight:normal'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:
12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
font-weight:normal'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:
12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
font-weight:normal'>Here is the description of this new 2-player game -<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:
12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
font-weight:normal'>- A 1 X N grid will be given.<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:
12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
font-weight:normal'>- In each turn A player can mark an unmarked cell by an 'X'
or by an 'O' (No Zero it is big O).<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:
12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
font-weight:normal'>- No two adjacent 'X's are allowed in this game.<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:
12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
font-weight:normal'>- No two adjacent 'O's are allowed in this game.<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:
12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
font-weight:normal'>- The player who marks the last cell wins the game. <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:
12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
font-weight:normal'>Let's have an example for N = 3. Suppose first player mark
the leftmost cell with an 'X'. Then the grid will look like this -<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText align=center style='text-align:center'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:144.75pt;height:49.5pt'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/f_files/image018.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=193 height=66
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/f_files/image018.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]><span
style='mso-bidi-font-family:Verdana'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal'>From this state, the winning move of the
second player is to mark the rightmost cell with an 'O'.<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText align=center style='text-align:center'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1026" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:144.75pt;height:49.5pt'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/f_files/image018.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=193 height=66
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/f_files/image018.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"><![endif]><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal'><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify'>Now first player has no move,
because in the only empty cell she cannot mark 'X' and cannot mark 'O' because
the left of this cell is already marked 'X' and the right of this cell is
marked 'O'. The second player will win.</p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify'><br>
But this is not an optimal example for first player. If in first move, the
first player marks the middle cell with any one of 'X' or 'O', she will win.</p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify'>Now about Bob's computer game, <st1:City
w:st="on"><st1:place w:st="on">Alice</st1:place></st1:City> always makes the
first move. <st1:City w:st="on"><st1:place w:st="on">Alice</st1:place></st1:City>
usually used to start playing with Bob. But most often after some move, Bob
gave his responsibility to the computer. Computer always play optimally.</p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify'><br>
Your are given the state of the grid after Bob's departure and your task is to
determine whether it is possible to win against computer from this state for <st1:place
w:st="on"><st1:City w:st="on">Alice</st1:City></st1:place>.<span
style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:Verdana'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";font-weight:normal'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>Input</span></span><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText2>The input starts with an integer T (T &lt; 10001), which
specifies the number of test cases. In each of the next T line there is a
string which represents the state of the game after Bob's departure. Here the
length of the string is N(0&lt;N&lt;101). In this string besides 'X' and 'O',
another character '.' is used, which represents an unmarked cell.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>For each input
output a single line, &quot;Possible.&quot;, If it is possible to win against
computer, &quot;Impossible.&quot; otherwise.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                             </span>Output for Sample
Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><span
  lang=FR style='mso-bidi-font-family:Verdana;mso-ansi-language:FR'>3<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  lang=FR style='mso-bidi-font-family:Verdana;mso-ansi-language:FR'>...<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  lang=FR style='mso-bidi-font-family:Verdana;mso-ansi-language:FR'>X..<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  lang=FR style='mso-bidi-font-family:Verdana;mso-ansi-language:FR'>O<br
  style='mso-special-character:line-break'>
  <![if !supportLineBreakNewLine]><br style='mso-special-character:line-break'>
  <![endif]></span><b><span lang=FR style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-ansi-language:
  FR'><o:p></o:p></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=309 valign=top style='width:231.85pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
  lang=FR style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:Verdana;
  mso-ansi-language:FR'>Possible.<br>
  Impossible.<br>
  </span><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:Verdana'>Possible.<br
  style='mso-special-character:line-break'>
  <![if !supportLineBreakNewLine]><br style='mso-special-character:line-break'>
  <![endif]></span><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>Problemsetter:
<st1:place w:st="on"><st1:State w:st="on">Md.</st1:State></st1:place>
Arifuzzaman Arif</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>Special
Thanks: Manzurur Rahman Khan (Sidky)</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width=643
 style='width:6.7in;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .25pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.25pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  page-break-inside:avoid'>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:60.0pt;font-family:
  Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>G<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=546 valign=top style='width:409.3pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
  style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Impact;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Set of
  Marbles<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Output</span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal>You have n marbles of different colors which are distributed
in 2 boxes. In each move you can move one marble from one box into another. You
have to move the marbles in such a way that first box contains each combination
of marble sets exactly once. There are 2<sup>n</sup> combinations of marbles.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>For example you have 4 marbles. <st1:address w:st="on"><st1:Street
 w:st="on">Box</st1:Street> 1</st1:address> has marbles of color 1 and 3. And <st1:address
w:st="on"><st1:Street w:st="on">Box</st1:Street> 2</st1:address> has marbles of
color 2 and 4. Then the solution can be as follows.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:1184;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid black;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid black'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>

  style='font-family:"Arial Narrow"'> marbles<o:p></o:p></span></p>

  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Arial Narrow"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Input contains multiple test
cases. The first line of the input contains T(1&#8804;T&#8804;20) the number of
test cases. Each test case consists of 2 lines. The first line contains n(1&#8804;n&#8804;10)
and b1(0&#8804;b1&#8804;n). n is the number of marbles and b1 is the number of
marbles in the first box. The next line contains b1 integer the indices of the
marbles which are in the first box. All of these numbers are distinct and
between 1 and n inclusive. The rest of the n-b1 marbles are in 2<sup>nd</sup>
box.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Output</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each test case output
contains 2<sup>n</sup> lines. The first 2<sup>n</sup>-1 lines contains the
moves( see the sample output for formatting). The last line is blank. In case
there are multiple solutions any valid solution is acceptable.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                            </span>Output for Sample
Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

  <w:BrowserLevel>MicrosoftInternetExplorer4</w:BrowserLevel>
 </w:WordDocument>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <w:LatentStyles DefLockedState="false" LatentStyleCount="156">
 </w:LatentStyles>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if !mso]><object

<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;

	mso-para-margin:0in;

	mso-ansi-language:#0400;
	mso-fareast-language:#0400;
	mso-bidi-language:#0400;}

<![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="4098"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><b><span style='font-size:
  28.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:black;mso-ansi-language:EN-US;
  mso-fareast-language:EN-US;mso-bidi-language:#0845'><br clear=all
  style='page-break-before:always'>
  </span></b>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-size:60.0pt;font-family:Arial'>H</span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=546 valign=top style='width:409.3pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
  style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Impact'>Smallest Sub-Array</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'>
  Standard Input</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'>
  Standard Output</span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Consider an integer sequence
consisting of <b>N</b> elements where </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>X<sub>1</sub>
= 1</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>X<sub>2</sub>
= 2</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>X<sub>3</sub>
= 3</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>X<sub>i</sub>
= (X<sub>i-1</sub> + X<sub>i-2</sub> + X<sub>i-3</sub>) % M +
1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; for <span class=SpellE>i</span>
= 4 to N</span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Find 2 values <b><span
style='font-family:"Courier New"'>a</span></b> and <b><span style='font-family:
"Courier New"'>b</span></b> so that the sequence (<span class=SpellE><b><span
style='font-family:"Courier New"'>X<sub>a</sub></span></b></span><b><span
style='font-family:"Courier New"'> X<sub>a+1</sub> X<sub>a+2</sub> ... X<sub>b-1</sub>
<span class=SpellE>X<sub>b</sub></span></span></b><b><sub><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>)</span></sub></b> contains
all the integers from [<b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>1<span
class=GramE>,K</span></span></b>]. If there are multiple solutions then make
sure (<b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>b-a</span></b>) is as low as
possible. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>In other words, find the smallest
subsequence from the given sequence that contains all the integers from <b><span
style='font-family:"Courier New"'>1</span></b> to <b><span style='font-family:
"Courier New"'>K</span></b>. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Consider an example where <b><span
style='font-family:"Courier New"'>N</span></b> = 20, <b><span style='font-family:
"Courier New"'>M</span></b> = 12 and <b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>K</span></b>
= 4.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The sequence is {<span
style='font-family:"Courier New"'>1 2 3 7 1 12 9 11 9 6 3 7 5 4 5 3 1 10 3 <span
class=SpellE>3</span>}.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The smallest subsequence that
contains all the integers {1 2 3 4} has length 13 and is highlighted in the
following sequence:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span class=GramE>{<span
style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>1</span><span
style='font-family:"Courier New"'> <b>2 3 7 1 12 9 11 9 6 3 7 5 4 </b></span><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>5 3 1 10 3 <span
class=SpellE>3</span></span>}.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=stylearial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt'>Input</span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>First line of input is an integer
<span class=GramE><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>T</span></b>(</span><b><span
style='font-family:"Courier New"'>T</span></b>&lt;100) that represents the
number of test cases. Each case consists of a line containing 3 integers <span
class=GramE><b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>N</span></b>(</span>2
&lt; <b><span style='font-family:"Courier New"'>N</span></b> &lt; 1000001), <b><span
style='font-family:"Courier New"'>M</span></b>(0 &lt; <b><span
style='font-family:"Courier New"'>M</span></b> &lt; 1001) and <b><span
style='font-family:"Courier New"'>K</span></b>(1&lt; <b><span style='font-family:
"Courier New"'>K</span></b> &lt; 101). The meaning of these variables is
mentioned above.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>

<h4><span class=stylearial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt'>Output </span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each case, output the case
number followed by the minimum length of the subsequence. If there is no valid
subsequence, output sequence <span class=SpellE>nai</span> instead. Look at
the sample for exact format.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
Output for Sample Input</span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 0in 0in 0in'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>20
  12 4</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>20
  12 8</span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=348 valign=top style='width:261.0pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  1: 13</span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  2: sequence <span class=SpellE>nai</span></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=SpellE>Problemsetter</span>: <span class=SpellE>Sohel</span> Hafiz</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>Special
Thanks: <st1:State w:st="on"><st1:place w:st="on">Md.</st1:place></st1:State> <span
class=SpellE>Arifuzzaman</span> <span class=SpellE>Arif</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>&nbsp;</p>

</div>

</body>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:

 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><span
  style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";
  mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";

  AR-SA'><br clear=all style='page-break-before:always'>
  </span>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:60.0pt;font-family:
  Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>I<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=546 valign=top style='width:409.3pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
  style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Impact;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Secret
  Problemetters <st1:place w:st="on">Union</st1:place><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_s1042" type="#_x0000_t75" style='position:absolute;
 left:0;text-align:left;margin-left:0;margin-top:-.7pt;width:243pt;height:182.4pt;
 z-index:1;mso-position-horizontal:left'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/i_files/image022.png"  o:title=" />
 <w:wrap type="square"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=324 height=243
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/i_files/image022.png"  align=left hspace=12 v:shapes="_x0000_s1042"><![endif]>Solving
problem is tough? Solving problem is easy? Rather confusing. But no doubt,
problem solving is fun. Again, theres no doubt that problem setting is hard.
Let alone the art of finding new ideas &amp; all those statement, solution,
data stuffs. The toughest part is to live with the fact that, if ever theres
the slightest of errors, you are doomed. Hence, setting quality problems
requires time. But once upon a time in a far far away country, contest
organizers forgot this fact completely. So they went on organizing one after
another prestigious contests with very short notice to the problem setters.
However, the contests had grand success &amp; everyone forgot about what
happened to the poor problem setters thereafter. Hence, the problem setters
united &amp; decided to have a useful plan for the future. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The problem setters decided that
everyone of them will create problems throughout the year &amp; maintain his
own problem bank. Whenever someone creates a new problem, he adds the problem
to his problem bank &amp; the problem setting director gives it a rating.
Rating is an integer between 1 and 100007. Whenever a problem setter is
requested to arrange a contest, best <b>K </b>problems (<b>K </b>problems with
maximum rating) are picked from his bank. The problems are used &amp; removed
from the bank. There can be at most 100 problems in a contest. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Once a year, before the tide of
contest season begins, the problem setting director collects all the problems
from the available banks &amp; merges into a central problem bank. Any
subsequent request for problem is served from the central problem bank. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>You are to write a program that
manages the problem bank.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'>Input
file start with an integer <b>C (1&lt;=C&lt;=15), </b>The number of test cases.
Every test case starts with an integer <b>P (1&lt;=P&lt;=50) </b>indicating the
number of problems setters for that test case. Every problem setter has his own
problem bank. The bank of problem setter <b>X </b>is denoted by the integer <b>X
(1&lt;=X&lt;=P)</b>. At the beginning of a test case, all problem banks are
empty. Another important thing to notice is that, at a time there will be at
most <b>5000000 </b>problems in the merged problem bank &amp; at most <b>100000</b>
problems in any other bank. Rest of the lines describe the operations on a
problem bank using some instructions. There can be 4 kinds of instructions as
described below:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'>An <b>I
</b>instruction stands for an insert operation. The format of a single
character <b>I</b> followed by 4 integers <b>B (1&lt;=B&lt;=P)</b>, <b>N(0&lt;=N&lt;=100000)</b>,
<b>A<sub>0</sub> (0&lt;=A<sub>0</sub>&lt;=1000000) </b>&amp; <b>X(0&lt;=X&lt;=10000000)</b>,
means insert <b>N</b> problems in the problem bank with id <b>B</b>. The
ratings of these <b>N </b>problems can be calculated using <b>A<sub>0</sub></b>
&amp; <b>X</b>. The rating of a particular problem <b>A</b><b><sub><span
style='font-size:8.5pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>n</span></sub> = (A</b><b><sub><span
style='font-size:8.5pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>n-1</span></sub> + n * X) %
100007 </b>where <b>n = 1 to N</b>.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'>An <b>U
</b>instruction stands for a use &amp; remove operation. The <b>U </b>instruction
consists of a single <b>U </b>character followed by two integers <b>B
(1&lt;=B&lt;=P)</b> &amp; <b>K(0&lt;=K&lt;=number of problems in bank B)</b>
meaning that pick &amp; remove the best <b>K </b>problems from problem bank <b>B</b>.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'>A <b>M
</b>instruction means a merge operation. There'll be at most one merge
operation in a test case. A <b>M </b>instruction merges all the existing
problem banks in a single problem bank. This merged bank is denoted as bank #1
thereafter.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'>A <b>Q
</b>instruction indicates the end of a test case.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Output</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'>For
every U instruction you receive, print 2 integers in a line showing the highest
&amp; lowest rating of the problems selected with that particular instruction.
If you don't pick any problem print a couple of 0. Print a blank line between
test cases.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                            </span>Output for Sample
Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width=602
 style='width:451.8pt;background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;
 mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=301 valign=top style='width:225.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><a name="DDE_LINK"><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>1<o:p></o:p></span></a></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><span style='mso-bookmark:DDE_LINK'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><span style='mso-bookmark:DDE_LINK'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>I 1 3 0 1<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><span style='mso-bookmark:DDE_LINK'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>I 2 5 0 3<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><span style='mso-bookmark:DDE_LINK'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>I 3 4 2 3<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><span style='mso-bookmark:DDE_LINK'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>I 1 2 5 3<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><span style='mso-bookmark:DDE_LINK'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>U 1 4<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><span style='mso-bookmark:DDE_LINK'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>U 2 2<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><span style='mso-bookmark:DDE_LINK'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>M<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><span style='mso-bookmark:DDE_LINK'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>U 1 3<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><span style='mso-bookmark:DDE_LINK'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>I 1 0 1 1<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><span style='mso-bookmark:DDE_LINK'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>Q</span></span><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=301 valign=top style='width:225.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>14 3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>45 30<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>32 18<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b>Explanation
of Sample Input:<o:p></o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'>As we
see, here are 3 problem setters in this case. We'll call their problem banks 1,
2 &amp; 3. The first I instruction adds 3 problems to bank 1. The ratings of
these 3 problems are, 1 (0 + 1 * 1), 3 (1 + 2 * 1) &amp; 6 (3 + 3 * 1). The
second I instruction adds 5 problems to bank 2 with ratings 3 (0 + 1 * 3), 9 (3
+ 2 * 3), 18 (9 + 3 * 3), 30 (18 + 4 * 3) &amp; 45 (30 + 5 * 3). The third I
instruction adds 4 problems to bank 3 with ratings 5 (2 + 1 * 3), 11 (5 + 2 *
3), 20 (11 + 3 * 3) &amp; 32 (20 + 4 * 3). The next I instruction adds 2 more
problems to bank 1. The ratings are 8 (5 + 1 * 3) &amp; 14 (8 + 2 * 3). That
means, bank 1 now has 5 problems. Then comes an U instruction. The first U
instruction picks the 4 most rated problems from bank 1 i.e. the problems with
rating 14, 8, 6 &amp; 3. You should print 14 &amp; 3. The next U instruction
selects 2 best problems from bank 2. They are the problems with rating 45 &amp;
30. The merge operation merges the remaining problems (1, 3 &amp; 4 problems
from bank 1, 2 &amp; 3 respectively) into a single bank &amp; names it bank 1.
The following U instruction is served from this merged bank &amp; the problems
with rating 32, 20 &amp; 18 are selected. The final I instruction asks to add 0
new problems to the merged problem bank.</p>

</div>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt
549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 7
32.8pt'><span
class=SpellE>Problemsetter</span>: Mohammad <span class=SpellE>Mahmudur</span> <span
class=SpellE>Rahman</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 7
32.8pt'>Special
Thanks: <span class=SpellE>Manzurur</span> <span class=SpellE>Rahman</span>
Khan</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span></p>

</div>



</body>

</html>

<body bgcolor=white lang=EN-US link="#6633CC" vlink=purple>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem A</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Chess Queen </span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
<b>Input: </b>Standard Input</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'>Standard
Output </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>You probably know how the game of
chess is played and how chess queen operates. Two chess queens are in attacking
position when they are on same row, column or diagonal of a chess board.
Suppose two such chess queens (one black and the other white) are placed on
(2x2) chess board. They can be in attacking positions in 12 ways, these are
shown in the picture below: </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse'>
 <tr style='height:207.85pt'>
  <td width=375 valign=top style='width:280.9pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:207.85pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;layout-grid-mode:char'>
  <table cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0>
   <tr>
    <td width=4 height=0></td>
   </tr>
   <tr>
    <td></td>
    <td><img width=347 height=254 src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/p11538.jpg" ></td>
   </tr>
  </table>
  <br clear=ALL>
  </p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
  <td width=375 valign=top style='width:280.9pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;layout-grid-mode:char'>Figure:
  in a (2x2) chessboard 2 queens can be in attacking position in 12 ways</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Given an (<b>N</b>x<b>M</b>)
board you will have to decide in how many ways 2 queens can be in attacking
position in that.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<h5 style='margin-left:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:0in'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt'>Input</span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Input file can contain up to 5000
lines of inputs. Each line contains two non-negative integers which denote the
value of <b>M</b> and <b>N</b> (<b>0&lt; M, N</b><b><span style='font-family:
Symbol'>£</span>10<sup>6</sup></b>) respectively.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoBodyText2>Input is terminated by a line containing two zeroes.
These two zeroes need not be processed.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>

<h4 style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0in'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt'>Output </span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each line of input produce
one line of output. This line contains an integer which denotes in how many
ways two queens can be in attacking position in  an (<b>MxN</b>) board, where
the values of <b>M</b> and <b>N</b> came from the input. All output values will
fit in 64-bit signed integer.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<h1 align=left style='margin-left:0in;text-align:left;text-indent:0in'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample
Input                              Output for Sample Input</span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:-1.0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
 <tr>
  <td width=313 valign=top style='width:234.9pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;background:#CCCCCC;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2 2</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>100 223</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2300 1000</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0 0</span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=339 valign=top style='width:254.0pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  background:#CCCCCC;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>12</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>10907100</span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>11514134000</span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div style='border:none;border-bottom:double gray 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'>

<p class=HorizontalLine>&nbsp;</p>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal>Problemsetter: Shahriar Manzoor</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>Special Thanks to: Mohammad Mahmudur Rahman</p>

</div>

</body>

</html>

	margin-bottom:14.0pt;
	margin-left:0in;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";}
address
	{margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	font-style:italic;}
pre
	{margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Courier New";}
span.StyleArial16pt
	{font-family:Arial;
	font-weight:bold;}
p.Heading, li.Heading, div.Heading
	{margin-top:12.0pt;
	margin-right:0in;
	margin-bottom:6.0pt;
	margin-left:0in;
	page-break-after:avoid;
	font-size:14.0pt;
	font-family:"Liberation Sans";
	color:black;}
p.Index, li.Index, div.Index
	{margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	color:black;}
p.Preformatted, li.Preformatted, div.Preformatted
	{margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	layout-grid-mode:char;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Courier New";}
p.TableContents, li.TableContents, div.TableContents
	{margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	color:black;}
p.TableHeading, li.TableHeading, div.TableHeading
	{margin:0in;

	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	color:black;
	font-weight:bold;}

	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	color:black;}
 /* Page Definitions */
 @page Section1
	{size:595.25pt 841.85pt;
	margin:.8in .8in 67.7pt .8in;}
div.Section1
	{page:Section1;}
 /* List Definitions */
 ol
	{margin-bottom:0in;}
ul
	{margin-bottom:0in;}
-->
</style>

</head>

<body lang=EN-US link="#6633CC" vlink=purple>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Problem B</span></b><span
style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span><b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial'>Another Word Game</span></b><b><span
style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial'> </span></b><span style='font-family:
Arial'><br>
<b>Input: </b>Standard Input</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-family:Arial'>Output: </span></b><span style='font-family:Arial'>Standard
Output </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>This is just another word game. You are given a dictionary
of words. Each of the word has a weight <b>W</b>, which is an integer value.
You are given another string <b>S</b>. Initially your score is zero. In each
turn you can mark some consecutive characters. If these consecutive characters
create a word in the given dictionary, corresponding weight will be added to
your score, otherwise a penalty <b>P</b> will be subtracted word length times
from your score. Here word length is number of character in a word, and <b>P</b>
is an integer value. What is the maximum score you can gain?</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Note that your have to make a
move until all characters of S are marked, and you cannot mark one character
more than once.</p>

<h5 style='margin-left:0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:0in'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt'>Input</span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Input will start with an integer
number <b>T </b>(T&#8804;20), which indicates the number of test case. Each
test case starts with two integer <b>N</b> (N &#8804; 10000) and <b>P</b> (0
&#8804; P &#8804; 10000). Here <b>N</b> is the number of words in the
dictionary and <b>P</b> is the value of Penalty. Each of the next <b>N</b>
lines will contain a word and corresponding integer weight <b>W</b> 
(0 &#8804; W &#8804; 10000). No word of
this dictionary will contain more than 100 characters, and a word will only
contain lower case alphabet ('a', 'b', ... ,'z'). The last line of the input
will contain string <b>S</b>. S will not contain more than <b>10000</b>
characters, and will contain only lower case letters.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>

<h4 style='margin-left:0in;text-indent:0in'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt'>Output </span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>For each test case you have to
output one line which &quot;Case #:&quot; where # is replaced by the case
number, then a space, then the maximum score.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<h1 align=left style='margin-left:0in;text-align:left;text-indent:0in'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;font-family:Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample Input                             
Output for Sample Input</span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:-1.0pt;border-collapse:collapse'>
 <tr>
  <td width=313 valign=top style='width:234.9pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;background:#CCCCCC;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char;text-autospace:ideograph-numeric'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3<br>
  2 5<br>
  ab 2<br>
  cd 3<br>
  abcd<br>
  3 5<br>
  ab 2<br>
  cd 3<br>
  bc 16<br>
  abcd<br>
  1 100<br>
  abd 1<br>
  abcd</span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=339 valign=top style='width:254.0pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  background:#CCCCCC;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 1: 5<br>
  Case 2: 6<br>
  Case 3: -400</span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'>&nbsp;</p>

<div style='border:none;border-bottom:double gray 1.0pt;padding:0in 0in 0in 0in'>

<p class=HorizontalLine>&nbsp;</p>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal>Problemsetter: Md. Arifuzzaman Arif</p>

<p class=MsoNormal>Special Thanks to: Sabbir Yousuf Sanny</p>

</div>

</body>
