<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoTableGrid border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .25pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.25pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:60.0pt;font-family:
  Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>B<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=446 valign=top style='width:4.65in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
  style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Impact;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Image
  Coding<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=100 valign=top style='width:75.35pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E0E0E0;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
   id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
   path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
   <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
   <v:formulas>
    <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>

    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>

    <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
   </v:formulas>

   <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>

   height:63.75pt'>
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/b_files/image001.png"  o:href="http://www.informatik.uni-ulm.de/acm/images/acmlogo.gif"/>
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=86 height=85
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/b_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'>Communicating
images over the internet is a costly process, thanks to the limits in available
bandwidth. This problem is resolved to an extent by employing point of interest
image coding. To be more specific, the point of interest image coding assumes
that, some part of the image is most important, encodes this region with high
quality &amp; the other regions of the image with low quality, thus reducing
file size.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'>You
are to implement a very simple case of point of interest image coding. Assume
an image file is represented by a grid of letters from 'A' to 'Z', each letter
representing one pixel. All pixels represented by the same letter represents a
same region in the image whereas two different letters stand for two different
regions. The region with maximum number of letters is to be considered as the
most important region. If there are more than one region tied for the maximum,
treat all of them as most important. Every single letter in the most important
region(s) is encoded as <b>M</b> byte data while each non-important region
letter is encoded as <b>N</b> bytes. You are to determine the image file size.
You can assume the image file consists of image data only i.e. no image header,
title, meta information etc.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'>The
input file starts with <b>X, </b>the number of test cases (<b>1 </b><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>&#8804; <span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>X </span>&#8804; <span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>50). X</span></b>
cases follows. Each test case begins with 4 integers in a line, <b>R (1 </b><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>&#8804;<span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'> R </span>&#8804;<span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> 20), C(1 </span>&#8804;<span
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> C </span>&#8804;<span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'> 20), M(1 </span>&#8804;<span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> M </span>&#8804;<span
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> 10) &amp; N(1 </span>&#8804;<span
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> N </span>&#8804;<span style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'> 10) </span></b>where <b>R </b>&amp; <b>C</b> are the number of rows
&amp; columns in the pixel grid respectively. <b>M</b> is the number of bytes
for each important pixel &amp; <b>N </b>is the number of bytes for each
non-important pixel. The following <b>R </b>lines describe the pixel grid. Each
of these lines contain <b>C</b> letters between <b>'A'</b> &amp; <b>'Z'</b>
(inclusive)</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'>For
each test case, print a line in the format <b>Case x: y </b>where <b>x </b>is
the case number &amp; <b>y </b>is the number of bytes in the image file.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>         </span><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                    </span>Output for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>5 4 2 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>ABCD<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>ABCA<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>EFAC<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>BCAG<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>AZIP<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=336 valign=top style='width:3.5in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  1: 26<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b>Explanation
of sample I / O: </b>The image contains 10 regions namely 'A', 'B', 'C', 'D',
'E', 'F', 'G', Z', 'I' &amp; 'P'. Region 'A' has the highest frequency of 6.
So, this is the most important region. We encode 6 letters of this region with
2 bytes each &amp; each of the remaining 14 letters with 1 byte. That makes the
total file size = 6 * 2 + 14 * 1 = 26 bytes.</p>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Problemsetter:
Mohammad Mahmudur Rahman<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:Arial'>Special
Thanks to: <st1:place w:st="on"><st1:State w:st="on">Md.</st1:State></st1:place>
Arifuzzaman Arif<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:Arial'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

</div>

</body>

</html>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoTableGrid border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0

  the President<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;

  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=100 valign=top style='width:75.35pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;

  solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E0E0E0;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype

 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>You have to save the president,
who is now living in a very dangerous world. Helps are coming as members of the
elite force are on the way, but till then you must save him and take him to a
place that is secured for sometime. As a programmer and scientist you have some
means that are unique (No other person can achieve): You can travel through
hyperspace- (a) Reach the same location at a different time (b) Reach a
different place at the same time (c) Reach a different place at a different
time. So you can save the President in situations where others have no hope.
But like the elite force you cannot defuse any bomb or use some protective
shield to save the President.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>To make things simple you can
assume that your world is a three dimensional grid as shown in figure 1.</p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:.5pt solid windowtext;
 mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;height:181.75pt'>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:181.75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><!--[if gte vml 1]><o:wrapblock><v:shape

  </p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=295 valign=top style='width:221.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Figure 1: The world can be
  viewed as a three dimensional grid.</p>
  </td>
  <td width=360 valign=top style='width:269.65pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;

  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Figure 2: An object in 3
  dimensional space. The corner nearest to the origin has coordinate (p,q,r)
  and the corner farthest from the origin has coordinate <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
   id="_x0000_i1026" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:120pt;height:18.75pt'
   o:ole=" >
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/c_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />

   <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1026"
    DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1299267201">
   </o:OLEObject>
  </xml><![endif]--></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>In this three dimensional space objects
are placed in axis parallel positions and for simplicity all the objects are
box shaped and have integer dimensions and all the eight corners of the box
have integer coordinates (In three dimensional Cartesian coordinate system)
when placed. So if the object has a dimension <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1027" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:69.75pt;height:18.75pt'
 o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/c_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=93 height=25
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/c_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1027"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1027"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1299267202">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>(That is the dimension
of the box along x, y and z axis is <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1028"
 type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:15pt;height:18pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/c_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=20 height=24
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/c_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1028"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1028"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1299267203">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>, <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1029" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:15.75pt;height:18.75pt'
 o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/c_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=21 height=25
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/c_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1029"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1029"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1299267204">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>and <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1030" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:15pt;height:17.25pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/c_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=20 height=23
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/c_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1030"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1030"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1299267205">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->respectively) and if coordinate of its nearest to the origin ((0,0,0))
corner is (p, q, r) then the coordinate of the corner which is farthest from
the origin would be <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1031" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:117.75pt;height:18.75pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/c_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=157 height=25
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/c_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1031"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1031"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1299267206">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>But many bombs have also been
placed in this three dimensional world which are causing security problems for
the president. Given the dimensions of the three dimensional world, and the
position and possible explosion time range of the bombs, you have to find total
number of safe time and space positions (The coordinate of the location and the
time when the coordinate is safe) for the president for a given duration.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input file contains at most <b>5</b>
sets of inputs. The description of each set is given below.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<pre style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>Each case starts with five positive integers N, dim<sub>x</sub>, dim<sub>y</sub> dim<sub>z</sub>, Q. 
Here N (0&lt;N&lt;2500) is the total number of bombs in the grid. 
The integers dim<sub>x</sub>, dim<sub>y</sub>, dim<sub>z</sub> (0 </span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>&#8804; </b><span style='font-size:12.0pt; font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'>dim<sub>x</sub>, dim<sub>y</sub>, dim<sub>z</sub> </span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>&#8804;</b><span style='font-size:12.0pt; font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman"'> 18) denote that 3D world you are considering can be viewed as a <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1032" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:102pt;height:18.75pt' o:ole=" > <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/c_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=136 height=25 src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/c_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1032"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml> <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1032"  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1299267207"> </o:OLEObject></xml><![endif]-->three dimensional grid. 
Q (Q &#8804; 5) is the total number security queries to follow after the bomb descriptions. 

Next N lines describe N bombs. 
Each bomb description consists six non negative integers <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1033" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:87.75pt;height:17.25pt'
 o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/c_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=117 height=23
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/c_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1033"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1033"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1299267208">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>and two strings of the format hour:minute. 
The two strings denote the time span when the bomb can explode. 
The time is written in 24 hour clock format </span><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>but the only exception is 24:00 which denotes the end of the day. </span><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman"'>and the minute part is always a multiple of 15. 
The six integer <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1034" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:87.75pt;height:17.25pt'
 o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/c_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=117 height=23
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/c_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1034"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1034"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1299267209">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>denotes that the bomb explodes within the box area denoted by the two corners <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1035" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:51pt;height:17.25pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/c_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=68 height=23
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/c_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1035"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1035"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1299267210">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>and <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1036" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:54.75pt;height:17.25pt'
 o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/c_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=73 height=23
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/c_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1036"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1036"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1299267211">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->. 
For example the description of the first bomb is given by the line <o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></pre><pre
style='text-align:center'><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>0 0 4 </span></b><span
style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>1 1 6<b> 23:15 </b>24:00<b><o:p></o:p></b></span></pre><pre
style='text-align:center'><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></pre>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>This means that when the bomb explodes it can
destroy anything within the box whose two corners are (0,0,4) (The corner
nearest to the origin) and (1,1,6) (The corner farthest from the origin). And
this bomb can explode at any time between 23:15 and 24:00 (inclusive). So any
point within this box is unsafe between 23:15 and 24:00. At other times this
location is safe if not threatened by other bombs.<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>Each of the next Q lines describes a security
query. The first three integers denote the minimum 3D dimension required by the
president to survive. These three integers are followed by a string which
denotes the time length for which the president must be kept secured. This time
length is also always multiple of 15 minutes. Let is time length be T. Note
that everything happens in a single day. So if you are supposed to keep the
president secured for 30 minutes, you cannot keep him secured for 15 minutes
today and 15 minutes after midnight. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>Input is terminated by a line containing five
zeroes.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Output
<o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt;
mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'>For each set input produce Q+1
lines of outputs. The first line is the serial of output. Each of the next
lines is the output for one query. This line is of the format N safe places
found. Here N is the total number of location and times where you can take the
president to keep him safe for time length T. Please note again that to keep
the president safe for time length T you can jump to another 3D location
(Denoted by the coordinate of the nearest to origin point) and even go to a
different time and 3D location for safety. After reaching there your goal is to
stay safe for time T without moving or traveling through time. If no safe place
is found print <span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";color:windowtext;mso-bidi-language:#0845'>No
safe place(s) found</span><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Courier New";color:windowtext;mso-bidi-language:#0845'> instead.</span><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
color:windowtext;mso-bidi-language:#0845'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>Look at the
output for sample input for formatting details.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                            </span>Output for Sample
Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

 style='width:451.8pt;background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;
 mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=301 valign=top style='width:225.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><pre><b>10 6 7 6 2<o:p></o:p></b></pre><pre><b>0 0 4 1 1 6 23:15 24:00<o:p></o:p></b></pre><pre><b>1 2 1 3 3 2 23:30 24:00<o:p></o:p></b></pre><pre><b>3 2 0 4 4 1 16:15 16:45<o:p></o:p></b></pre><pre><b>2 5 0 3 7 2 07:15 09:45<o:p></o:p></b></pre><pre><b>4 3 4 5 4 6 09:30 10:45<o:p></o:p></b></pre><pre><b>2 5 2 4 6 4 16:00 17:00<o:p></o:p></b></pre><pre><b>2 4 0 4 6 1 08:00 08:30<o:p></o:p></b></pre><pre><b>2 3 4 4 5 5 14:30 17:00<o:p></o:p></b></pre><pre><b>0 4 4 2 5 5 14:15 15:45<o:p></o:p></b></pre><pre><b>2 0 3 4 2 5 02:30 03:45<o:p></o:p></b></pre><pre><b>1 6 3 03:15<o:p></o:p></b></pre><pre><b>5 2 3 00:15<o:p></o:p></b></pre><pre><b>0 0 0 0 0<o:p></o:p></b></pre></td>
  <td width=301 valign=top style='width:225.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>3D
  World 1:<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>2539
  safe place(s) found<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>3831
  safe place(s) found<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoTableGrid border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0

 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-left:.25in;text-align:center;
  tab-stops:143.25pt'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:60.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>D<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=446 valign=top style='width:4.65in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:

  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span

  Lookup<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b

  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype

  </td>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>Prefix
lookup is an important part of Router design. Looking at the destination
address, a router needs to decide about the potential outbound link. For
example, assume a router table consists of the following entries  </p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<table class=MsoTableGrid border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:.7in;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
 mso-border-insideh:.5pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>
  <td width=120 valign=top style='width:1.25in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>Prefix</p>
  </td>
  <td width=144 valign=top style='width:1.5in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>Outbound Link</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1'>
  <td width=120 valign=top style='width:1.25in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>0*</p>
  </td>
  <td width=144 valign=top style='width:1.5in;border-top:none;border-left:none;
  border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>1, 2</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:2'>
  <td width=120 valign=top style='width:1.25in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>11*</p>
  </td>
  <td width=144 valign=top style='width:1.5in;border-top:none;border-left:none;
  border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>1, 3</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:3'>
  <td width=120 valign=top style='width:1.25in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>011*</p>
  </td>
  <td width=144 valign=top style='width:1.5in;border-top:none;border-left:none;
  border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>2, 3</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:4'>
  <td width=120 valign=top style='width:1.25in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>1110*</p>
  </td>
  <td width=144 valign=top style='width:1.5in;border-top:none;border-left:none;
  border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>4</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:5;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=120 valign=top style='width:1.25in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>*</p>
  </td>
  <td width=144 valign=top style='width:1.5in;border-top:none;border-left:none;
  border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal>1</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>Here
* means following bits are dont care. Now if a destination address (8 bit)
takes the form 01101010, then it matches with two prefixes 0*, 011*. Router
always takes the longest matching prefix, and thus 01101010 will match with
011*, but not with 0*. On the other hand, address 10101010 does not match with
any other prefix except the default prefix, *.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>Current
routers can do this lookup very efficiently, and in this problem, we are not interested
about efficient implementation of longest matching prefix.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h2 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-style:normal;mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>Problem<o:p></o:p></span></h2>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>Given
a set of prefix entries, it is significant to know, which prefixes are commonly
looked up. In that case, corresponding links can be given special priority
(such as more bandwidth share). Here, you need to run a simulation to find the
number of times certain prefixes are looked up for a given set of prefixes, and
all possible destination addresses. As an example, for 4-bit addresses 0*
matches with 6 addresses (0000, 0001, 0010, 0011, 0100, 0101) </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Verdana'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>Each
test case starts with two integers <b><span style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>N
(1 &#8804; N &#8804; 20000)</span></b>, and <b><span style='mso-bidi-font-style:
italic'>M (1 &#8804; M &#8804; 64)</span></b>. <b><span style='mso-bidi-font-style:
italic'>N</span></b> denotes the number of prefixes whereas <b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>M</span></b> represents the number of bits
in an address. Next <b><span style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>N</span></b>
lines contains the prefixes (combination of at most <b>M</b> 0, 1s followed by
*). Along with given prefix entries, you should also assume that there is a
default prefix, * (matches with all addresses). Next line contains an integer
<b><span style='mso-bidi-font-style:italic'>K (0&lt;K&lt;1000)</span></b> that
represents the number of queries. Following <b><span style='mso-bidi-font-style:
italic'>K</span></b> lines contain the query prefixes (a subset of prefix table
entries).<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>Input for each set is followed
by a blank line.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>Input
file terminates with a line containing two zeroes. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
font-weight:normal'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></span></p>

<h4 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Output
<o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>For
each test case, print the number of matched addresses (different line for each
query prefix). Put a blank line after each test case.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                            </span>Output for Sample
Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=301 valign=top style='width:225.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>4 4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;
  font-family:"Courier New"'>0*<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;

	mso-hansi-font-family:Arial;
	mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
	font-weight:bold;}
 /* Page Definitions */
 @page
	{mso-footnote-separator:url("e_files/header.html") fs;
	mso-footnote-continuation-separator:url("e_files/header.html") fcs;
	mso-endnote-separator:url("e_files/header.html") es;
	mso-endnote-continuation-separator:url("e_files/header.html") ecs;}

	mso-paper-source:0;}

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoTableGrid border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .25pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.25pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:60.0pt;font-family:
  Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>E<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=446 valign=top style='width:4.65in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
  style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Impact;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Bulb
  inside a Grid<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=100 valign=top style='width:75.35pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E0E0E0;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
   id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
   path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
   <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
   <v:formulas>
    <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>

    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>

    <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
   </v:formulas>
   <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>

   height:63.75pt'>
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/e_files/image001.png"  o:href="http://www.informatik.uni-ulm.de/acm/images/acmlogo.gif"/>
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=86 height=85
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/e_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>You
are given a grid of size <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N x N</b>. Each
cell in the grid incorporates a bulb which can be initially <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>on</i> or <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>off</i> depending on its position. A bulb located at <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>i<sup>th</sup></b> row and <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>j<sup>th</sup></b> column will be initially
<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>off</i> if <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>i &lt; j, </b>otherwise it will be <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>on</i>.
The following figure shows a grid of dimension 6 x 6 in its initial
configuration.</p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;mso-yfti-tbllook:1184;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=247 valign=top style='width:185.4pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  </td>
  <td width=178 valign=top style='width:133.8pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>1 0 0 0 0 0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>1 1 0 0 0 0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>1 1 1 0 0 0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>1 1 1 1 0 0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>1 1 1 1 1 0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>1 1 1 1 1 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  </td>
  <td width=213 valign=top style='width:159.6pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>Here
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>1</b> indicates <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>on</i> state and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>0</b> indicates
<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>off</i> state.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>Switches
come in two shapes and in various sizes. A switch can cover a rectangular or a
square region in the grid.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>A switch,
when pressed, toggles all the bulbs in its corresponding region (that is, all
the bulbs that are <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>on</i> goes <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>off</i> and vice versa).</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>A
switch that engulfs a square region is represented as (<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>row</b>, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>column</b>, <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>size</b>) where (<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>row</b>, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>column</b>) denotes the
top-left corner and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>size</b> denotes the
size of the square.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>A
switch that engulfs a rectangular region is represented as (<b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>row</b>, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>column</b>, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>width</b>, <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>height</b>) where (<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>row</b>, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>column</b>) denotes the
top-left corner and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>width</b> &amp; <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>height</b> are self-explanatory.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>Here
is a diagram that should extricate things.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='mso-no-proof:yes'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1026" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:91.5pt;height:89.25pt;visibility:visible'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/e_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=122 height=119
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/e_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"><![endif]></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>The
diagram shows a grid of size 6 x 6 with 3 switches in action.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>There
are 2 square switches; (<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>4</b>, <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>3</b>, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>2</b>)
and (<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>5</b>, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>5</b>, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>4</b>) and 1 rectangular
switch; (<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>2</b>, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>5</b>, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>3</b>, <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>2</b>). Note that the regions wrap around
and they can also overlap.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>Given
the dimension of the grid, the number of switches in action and the number of
times each switch is pressed, can you find out the number of bulbs that are on
at the end?</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>The
first line of input is an integer <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>T</b>(<b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>T</b>&lt;<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>50</b>) that indicates the total number of test cases.<br>
Each case starts with two integers <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b>(<b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>0</b>&lt;<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>N</b>&lt;<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>10<sup>8</sup></b>) and
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>M</b>(<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>0 &#8804; M</b>&lt;<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>50</b>). <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b> indicates the size of the grid and <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>M</b> specifies the total number of
switches. Each of the following <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>M</b>
lines gives the information of a switch.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>The
information for a square-switch is formatted as (<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>row</b>, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>column</b>, <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>size</b>)  <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>times</b> where (<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>1 &#8804; row</b>,
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>column</b>, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>size &#8804; N</b>) and (<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>0 </b>&lt;
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>times </b>&lt; <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>2<sup>30</sup></b>). The meaning of (<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>row,</b> <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>column</b>, <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>size</b>) is given in the description and <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>times</b> represents the number of times
that particular switch is pressed.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>The
information for a rectangle-switch is formatted as (<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>row</b>, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>column</b>, <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>width</b>, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>height</b>)  <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>times</b>. Here (<b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>1 &#8804; row</b>, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>column</b>, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>width</b>, <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>height &#8804;</b> <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>N</b>) and (<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>0</b>&lt;<b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>times</b>&lt;<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>2<sup>30</sup></b>).</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Output</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>For
each case, print the case number followed by the total number of bulbs that are
on after all the switches are pressed for the given number of times. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>Note
that the order in which the switches are pressed is extraneous for the final
outcome and therefore its intentionally not stated. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                                </span>Output for
Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width=655
 style='width:491.4pt;background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;
 mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:361.1pt'>
  <td width=331 valign=top style='width:3.45in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:361.1pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>6
  0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>6
  3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>(4,
  3, 2) - 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>(5,
  5, 4) - 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>(2,
  5, 3, 2)  1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>1000
  1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>(1,
  100, 5)  100</span><o:p></o:p></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=324 valign=top style='width:243.0pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:361.1pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  1: 21<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  2: 13<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  3: 500500 </span></b></p>
  </td>

	mso-endnote-continuation-separator:url("f_files/header.html") ecs;}

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoTableGrid border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .25pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.25pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:60.0pt;font-family:
  Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>F<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=446 valign=top style='width:4.65in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
  style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Impact;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Bulb inside
  a Grid (II)<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=100 valign=top style='width:75.3pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E0E0E0;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
   id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
