  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>You
are given a grid of size <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N x N</b>. Each
cell in the grid incorporates a bulb which can be initially <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>on</i> or <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>off</i> depending on its position. A bulb located at <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>i<sup>th</sup></b> row and <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>j<sup>th</sup></b> column will be initially
<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>off</i> if <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>i &lt; j </b>otherwise it will be <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>on</i>.
The following figure shows a grid of dimension 6 x 6 in its initial configuration.</p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;mso-yfti-tbllook:1184;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=247 valign=top style='width:185.4pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  </td>
  <td width=178 valign=top style='width:133.8pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>1 0 0 0 0 0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>1 1 0 0 0 0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>1 1 1 0 0 0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>1 1 1 1 0 0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>1 1 1 1 1 0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:14.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:
  "Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>1 1 1 1 1 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  </td>
  <td width=213 valign=top style='width:159.6pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>Here
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>1</b> indicates <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>on</i> state and <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>0</b> indicates
<i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>off</i> state.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>A
switch can cover a rectangular region in the grid.<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>A switch, when pressed, toggles all the bulbs
in its corresponding region (that is, all the bulbs that are <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>on</i> goes <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>off</i> and vice versa).</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>A
switch is represented by four integers (<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>row</b>,
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>column</b>, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>width</b>, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>height</b>) where (<b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>row</b>, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>column</b>) denotes the top-left corner of the rectangular region and <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>width</b> &amp; <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>height</b> are self-explanatory.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>Here
is a diagram that should extricate things.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='mso-no-proof:yes'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="Picture_x0020_3"
 o:spid="_x0000_i1026" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:91.5pt;height:89.25pt;
 visibility:visible'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/f_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=122 height=119
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/f_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="Picture_x0020_3"><![endif]></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>The
diagram shows a grid of size 6 x 6 with 3 switches in action.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>There
are 3 switches; (<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>4</b>, <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>3</b>, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>2,
2</b>), (<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>5</b>, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>5</b>, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>4, 4</b>) and (<b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>2</b>, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>5</b>,
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>3</b>, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>2</b>). Note that the regions wrap around and they can also overlap.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>Given
the dimension of the grid, the number of switches in action, can you find out
the number of bulbs that are <b>on</b> at the end?</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>The
first line of input is an integer <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>T</b>(<b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>T &#8804; 25</b>) that indicates the total
number of test cases.<br>
Each case starts with two integers <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b>(<b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>1 &#8804; N &#8804; 30,000</b>) and <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>M</b>(<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>1
&#8804;</b> <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>M &#8804; 30,000</b>). <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N</b> indicates the size of the grid and <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>M</b> specifies the total number of
switches. Each of the following <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>M</b>
lines gives the information of a switch. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>The
information for a switch is represented by four integer values <b>row</b>, <b>column</b>,
<b>width</b>, <b>height</b>.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>Here (<b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>1 &#8804; row</b>, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>column</b>, <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>width</b>, <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>height &#8804;</b> <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>N</b>).</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Verdana'><span style='mso-tab-count:1'>            </span></span><span
style='mso-tab-count:12'>                                                                                                                                                                            </span></p>

<h4 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Output
<o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>For
each case, print the case number followed by the total number of bulbs that are
on after all the switches are pressed. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>Note
that the order in which the switches are pressed is extraneous for the final
outcome and therefore its intentionally not stated. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>           
</span><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                   </span>Output for
Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>

<style>
 /* Style Definitions */

	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";

	{mso-style-name:"Table Grid";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;

	mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;

	mso-para-margin:0in;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;
	font-size:10.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-ansi-language:#0400;
	mso-fareast-language:#0400;
	mso-bidi-language:#0400;}
</style>
<![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="3074"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoTableGrid border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .25pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.25pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:60.0pt;font-family:
  Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>G<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=446 valign=top style='width:4.65in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
  style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Impact;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Fractions<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=100 valign=top style='width:75.35pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E0E0E0;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
   id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
   path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
   <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
   <v:formulas>
    <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
   </v:formulas>
   <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
   <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
  </v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" alt="  style='width:64.5pt;
   height:63.75pt'>
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/g_files/image001.png"  o:href="http://www.informatik.uni-ulm.de/acm/images/acmlogo.gif"/>
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=86 height=85
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/g_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>A
fraction expressed in decimal can be the ratio of an infinite number of pairs
of integers. Suppose a fraction is rounded to three digits after the decimal
point and its rounded value is 0.500. Then the original fraction can be <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1026" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:42.75pt;height:30.75pt'
 o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/g_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=57 height=41
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/g_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1026"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1299267467">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>or even <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1027" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:66pt;height:30.75pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/g_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=88 height=41
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/g_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1027"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1027"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1299267468">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>etc. You will be given
the value of the decimal fraction rounded to some digits (not more than 7
digits) and you will have to find out the total number of different fractions
that can actually be rounded to this value. For safety you can assume that
0.2355 when rounded to three digits after the decimal point is always rounded
as 0.236 and never as 0.235. You can also assume that the value of numerator or
denominator will never exceed 1000000000.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>The
input file can contain up to 100000 lines of inputs. Each line contains a
positive floating-point number <b>v (0&lt;v&lt;1)</b>. This number will have
minimum one digit and maximum seven digits after the decimal point . If this
number has n digits after the decimal point then you have to assume that the
value of the fraction is given rounded to n digits after the decimal point.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>Input
is terminated by a line containing #.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Output
<o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>For each line
of input produce one line of output. This line contains an integer T which
denotes how many different fractions are there <b>(With numerators and denominator
being positive and not exceeding 1000000000)</b> that will have value <b>v</b>
when rounded to n digits after the decimal point.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                              </span>Output for Sample
Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=313 valign=top style='width:234.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>0.0000001<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>0.5000000<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
  12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>#<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=336 valign=top style='width:3.5in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>50000000050<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>50000000050<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-family:Arial'>Problemsetter: Shahriar Manzoor<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span

<div align=right>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellpadding=0 style='mso-cellspacing:1.5pt;

  <p class=MsoNormal><i><span style='font-size:10.0pt;color:windowtext;
  mso-bidi-language:#0845'>&quot;We must respect the other fellow's religion,
  but only in the sense and to the extent that we respect his theory that his
  wife is beautiful and his children smart.&quot;</span></i><span
  style='font-size:10.0pt;color:windowtext;mso-bidi-language:#0845'> </span><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext;mso-bidi-language:#0845'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal align=right style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:
auto;text-align:right;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
color:windowtext;mso-bidi-language:#0845'>H. L. Mencken</span><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext;mso-bidi-language:#0845'> <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext;mso-bidi-language:#0845'>Given
a square, symmetric matrix of edge capacities, return a squre, symmetric matrix
of maximum flows. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext;mso-bidi-language:#0845'>In
other words, you have <b>n</b> nodes. Between each pair of nodes, there is a
pipe of a certain thickness (measured in liters per second, possibly zero). For
each pair of nodes, (A, B), return the the maximum speed at which fluid can be
pushed from node A to node B, in liters per second. Note that the flow for each
pair of nodes is maximized separately -- there is no need to push all <b>n<sup>2</sup></b>
flows simultaneously. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<h5 style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>The
first line of input gives the number of cases, <b>N</b>. <b>N</b> test cases
follow. Each one starts with a line containing <b>n</b> (0 &#8804; <b>n </b>&#8804;
200). The next <b>n</b> lines will each contain <b>n</b> integers (between 0
and 10000 (inclusive)). </h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Output
<o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<h4 style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='mso-bidi-language:#0845'>For each test case, output one line containing
&quot;Case #<b>x</b>:&quot; followed by <b>n</b> lines with <b>n</b> integers
each. The diagonal should of this matrix should contain only zeroes. <o:p></o:p></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='mso-bidi-language:#0845'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                               </span>Output for
Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:165.55pt'>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:165.55pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";

  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";

  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  color:windowtext;mso-bidi-language:#0845'>0 2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  color:windowtext;mso-bidi-language:#0845'>2 0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";
  color:windowtext;mso-bidi-language:#0845'>6<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New";

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoTableGrid border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .25pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.25pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:60.0pt;font-family:
  Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>I<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=446 valign=top style='width:4.65in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
  style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Impact;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Crossing
  Streets EXTREME<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=100 valign=top style='width:75.35pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E0E0E0;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
   id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"

   <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>

   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/i_files/image001.png"  o:href="http://www.informatik.uni-ulm.de/acm/images/acmlogo.gif"/>
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=86 height=85
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/i_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>Many
of you probably know Peter Longfoot, who was a student in <st1:place w:st="on"><st1:PlaceType
 w:st="on">University</st1:PlaceType> of <st1:PlaceName w:st="on">Suburbia</st1:PlaceName></st1:place>
in 2005. He does not like crowded streets so in World Finals 2005 in
Shanghai,&nbsp;contestants wrote a program for him that helped him find the
path from his home to his university that required least crossing of streets.
But in Suburbia streets were drawn as horizontal or vertical lines. Now Peter
has become a student of <st1:place w:st="on"><st1:PlaceType w:st="on">University</st1:PlaceType>
 of <st1:PlaceName w:st="on">Chingchuk</st1:PlaceName></st1:place>. The streets
of Chingchuk be can drawn as straight line but they are not necessarily
horizontal or vertical as shown in picture below. Also not all streets are
equally crowded. If there is a place near a street that can cause a lot of
crowd (such as super markets or railway stations) then the road segments
adjacent to it will become more crowded and so peter may want to avoid them
also if possible.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>    </span></p>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoTableGrid border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>
  <td width=327 valign=top style='width:245.5pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
   id="_x0000_i1026" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:234pt;height:166.5pt'>
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/i_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=312 height=222
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/i_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"><![endif]></p>
  </td>
  <td width=327 valign=top style='width:245.55pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
   id="_x0000_i1027" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:234.75pt;height:166.5pt'>
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/i_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=313 height=222
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/i_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1027"><![endif]></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=327 valign=top style='width:245.5pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>Figure
  1: The green arrow shows one optimal path to go from A to B. The red arrow
  and magenta arrow show two possible invalid paths. The red path is invalid
  because walking through the crossing of two or more streets is not allowed
  and the magenta path is invalid because walking along the street is invalid.<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=327 valign=top style='width:245.55pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>Figure
  2: The square marked places are crowded places. The crowded place at (1,1)
  has crowding index 5 and the crowded place at (1,7) has crowding index 10. So
  now the new minimum cost path from A to B is shown in dark green. Red color
  denotes the streets whose costs have been increased due to crowded places.<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>Figure
1 has four streets. If Peters house is at A and his University is at B then he
requires crossing minimum two streets. By default the cost of crossing a street
is 1 so his total cost of reaching his university is 2. Peter never walks
through a street crossing and also he never walks along the street. In Figure 2
there are two crowded places, one at C(1, 1) and the other at D(1,7). The
crowding index of C is 5 and the crowding index of D is 10. So now the road
segments adjacent to C has crossing cost (5+1)=6 and the road segments adjacent
to D has crossing cost (1+10)=11. A road segment is adjacent to a crowded place
if that road segment can be reached from the crowded place without crossing any
other street. Given the road map of Chingchuk, the coordinate of Peters home
and university and the coordinate and crowding index of the crowded places your
job is to find the minimum cost that Peter needs to reach his university.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Verdana'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>The
input file contains at most 100 sets of inputs. Most cases are not extreme (N
is much less than 40). The description of each set is given below:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>First
line of each set contains three integers N (2 &#8804; N &#8804; 35), C (0 &#8804;
C &#8804; 1000) and Q (0 &#8804; Q &#8804; 10). The integer N indicates how
many streets are there, C indicates the number of crowded places and Q
indicates the total number of queries. Each of the next N lines contains three
integers <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1028" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:39.75pt;height:18pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/i_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=53 height=24
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/i_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1028"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1028"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1299267553">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>(1 &#8804; i &#8804; N
and 0 &#8804;<sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1029" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:114pt;height:18pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/i_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=152 height=24
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/i_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1029"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1029"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1299267554">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->&#8804; 1000000 and both a and b will never be zero) which
indicates that the equation of the i-th street is <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1030" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:83.25pt;height:18pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/i_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=111 height=24
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/i_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1030"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1030"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1299267555">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->. Each of the next C lines contains three integers<sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1031" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:48.75pt;height:18pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/i_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=65 height=24
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/i_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1031"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1031"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1299267556">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->. This means that there is a crowded place at location <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1032" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:39pt;height:18pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/i_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=52 height=24
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/i_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1032"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1032"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1299267557">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>and it increases the
crossing costs of adjacent road segments by<sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1033" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:15pt;height:18pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/i_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=20 height=24
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/i_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1033"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1033"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1299267558">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->(1 &#8804;<sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1034"
 type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:15pt;height:18pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/i_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=20 height=24
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/i_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1034"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1034"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1299267559">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->&#8804; 20). Each of the next Q lines contains four integers<sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1035" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:66pt;height:18pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/i_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=88 height=24
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/i_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1035"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1035"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1299267560">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->, which implies that for that specific query the coordinate
of Peters home is <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1036" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:39.75pt;height:18pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/i_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=53 height=24
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/i_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1036"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1036"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1299267561">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>and the coordinate of
Peters university is <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1037"
 type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:39.75pt;height:18pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/i_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=53 height=24
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/i_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1037"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1037"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1299267562">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->. You can assume that Peters home, Peters University and
the crowded places are never situated on a street and also no two streets are
parallel two each other. You can also assume that absolute values of all
coordinates are not greater than 1000.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>Input
is terminated by a set where the value of N=C=Q=0. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Output</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<h4 style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>For
each set of input produce Q+1 lines of output.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> 
</span>The first line contains the serial of output and each of the next Q
lines contains a single integer. This integer indicates the cost of going from
(<sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1038" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:30.75pt;
 height:18pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/i_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=41 height=24
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/i_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1038"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1038"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1299267563">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->) to (<sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1039"
 type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:30.75pt;height:18pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/i_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=41 height=24
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/i_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1039"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1039"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1299267564">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->). Look at the output for sample input for formatting
details.</h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                                 </span>Output for
Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoTableGrid border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .25pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.25pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:60.0pt;font-family:
  Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>A<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=446 valign=top style='width:4.65in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
  style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Impact;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Convex
  Orthogonal Polygon<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=99 valign=top style='width:74.5pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E0E0E0;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
   id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
   path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
   <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
   <v:formulas>
    <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
   </v:formulas>
   <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
   <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
  </v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" alt="  style='width:64.5pt;
   height:63.75pt'>
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/a_files/image001.png"  o:href="http://www.informatik.uni-ulm.de/acm/images/acmlogo.gif"/>
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=86 height=85
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/a_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>In Cartesian coordinate system a
lattice point is a point whose abscissa and ordinate is integer. For example
(3, 4) is a lattice point but (4.5, -10) is not a lattice point. If all the
vertices of a polygon are lattice points then this polygon is called a lattice
polygon. For this problem a lattice polygon is orthogonal when all its sides
are parallel to x-axis or y-axis. An orthogonal lattice polygon is convex when
there is no such horizontal or vertical line segment that connects two points
within the polygon and has some parts of it outside the polygon. The bounding
box of an orthogonal convex polygon is the smallest rectangle (With
axis-parallel sides) that contains the entire polygon. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoTableGrid border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width=647
 style='width:485.2pt;margin-left:-22.75pt;border-collapse:collapse;border:
 none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-yfti-tbllook:191;mso-padding-alt:
 0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:.5pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:
 .5pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>
  <td width=345 valign=top style='width:258.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
   id="_x0000_i1026" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:218.25pt;height:203.25pt'>
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/a_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=291 height=271
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/a_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"><![endif]></p>
  </td>
  <td width=302 valign=top style='width:226.3pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
   id="_x0000_i1027" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:215.25pt;height:201.75pt'>
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/a_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=287 height=269
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/a_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1027"><![endif]></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=345 valign=top style='width:258.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Figure 1: A orthogonal convex polygon
  and its bounding box (Shown with red).</p>
  </td>
  <td width=302 valign=top style='width:226.3pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Figure 2: A orthogonal concave
  polygon and its bounding box (Shown with red)</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<table class=MsoTableGrid border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 align=left
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-table-overlap:never;mso-yfti-tbllook:191;mso-table-lspace:9.0pt;
 margin-left:6.75pt;mso-table-rspace:9.0pt;margin-right:6.75pt;mso-table-anchor-vertical:
 paragraph;mso-table-anchor-horizontal:margin;mso-table-left:left;mso-table-top:
 7.1pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:.5pt solid windowtext;
 mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes'>
  <td width=294 valign=top style='width:220.5pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;mso-element:frame;
  mso-element-frame-hspace:9.0pt;mso-element-wrap:around;mso-element-anchor-vertical:
  paragraph;mso-element-anchor-horizontal:margin;mso-element-top:7.1pt;
  mso-height-rule:exactly'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1028"
   type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:191.25pt;height:178.5pt'>
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/a_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=255 height=238
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/a_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1028"><![endif]></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=294 valign=top style='width:220.5pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-element:frame;mso-element-frame-hspace:
  9.0pt;mso-element-wrap:around;mso-element-anchor-vertical:paragraph;
  mso-element-anchor-horizontal:margin;mso-element-top:7.1pt;mso-height-rule:
  exactly'>Figure 3: At step zero we have a polygon which is painted dark blue.
  The growth in step 1 and 2 are shown by filling them with lighter blue
  colors.</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Now you have to deal with the
growth of a Orthogonal Convex lattice polygon. Suppose the area of an
orthogonal convex lattice polygon (OCLP) at step zero is A<sub>0</sub> and the
area of its bounding box is B<sub>0</sub>. But you have forgotten other details
about this polygon (Like coordinate of its vertices). In the next step this
polygon grows by one unit in horizontal and vertical direction as shown in the
figure 3 and its area becomes A<sub>1</sub>. This process continues and after n
steps the area of the polygon becomes A<sub>n</sub>.<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>Now given the value of A<sub>0</sub>, A<sub>n</sub>
and B<sub>0</sub> you will have to find out the value of n if possible.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></span></h5>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Input file can contain up to
50000 lines of inputs. Each line contains three positive integers which denotes
the values of A<sub>0 </sub>(0&lt;A<sub>0</sub>&#8804;10000), A<sub>n </sub>(A<sub>0</sub>&#8804;A<sub>n</sub>&#8804;10<sup>18</sup>)
and B<sub>0</sub> (0&lt; B<sub>0</sub>&lt;20000) respectively.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Input is terminated by a line
containing three zeroes. This case need not be processed.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>For each line of
input produce one or more lines of output. These lines contain the possible
values of n (one in each line). If there is more than one possible value of n
print those in ascending order. If the given input values are impossible print
a -1 instead.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>Print a blank
line after the output for each set of input.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                               </span>Output for
Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span

  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><span

   id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
   path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
   <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
   <v:formulas>
    <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
   </v:formulas>
   <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
   <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
  </v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" alt="  style='width:64.5pt;
   height:63.75pt'>
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/b_files/image001.png"  o:href="http://www.informatik.uni-ulm.de/acm/images/acmlogo.gif"/>
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=86 height=85
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/b_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'>Let <b>K<sub>n</sub></b>
denote the complete undirected graph with n vertices where n is an even number.
In other words, <b>K<sub>n</sub></b> is a graph with n vertices where every two
vertices are connected. Your task is to find the maximum number of spanning
trees of <b>K<sub>n</sub></b> that can be formed in such a way that no two of
these spanning trees have a common edge.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'>Each
test case will have an even integer <b>n (2 &#8804; n &#8804; 400)</b>, the
number of vertices. The last test case will be followed by a single 0 denoting
end of input.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'>For
each test case, print a line in the format, Case X: Y, where X is the case
number &amp; Y is the maximum possible number of spanning trees.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>             
</span><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>               </span>Output for Sample
Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width=614
 style='width:6.4in;background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;
 mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><a name="DDE_LINK1"><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>4</span></a><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=307 valign=top style='width:3.2in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;line-height:11.0pt;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><a name="DDE_LINK"><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  1: 2 </span></a><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</div>

Mohammad Mahmudur Rahman<o:p></o:p></span></p>

	text-indent:-.25in;}
@list l1
	{mso-list-id:1209301815;
	mso-list-type:hybrid;
	mso-list-template-ids:-2050202298 67698689 67698691 67698693 67698689 67698691 67698693 67698689 67698691 67698693;}
@list l1:level1
	{mso-level-number-format:bullet;
	mso-level-text:\F0B7;
	mso-level-tab-stop:none;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	text-indent:-.25in;
	font-family:Symbol;}
@list l1:level2
	{mso-level-tab-stop:1.0in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	text-indent:-.25in;}
@list l1:level3
	{mso-level-tab-stop:1.5in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	text-indent:-.25in;}
@list l1:level4
	{mso-level-tab-stop:2.0in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	text-indent:-.25in;}

	{mso-level-tab-stop:2.5in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	text-indent:-.25in;}

	{mso-level-tab-stop:3.0in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;

</style>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoTableGrid border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .25pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.25pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'><span
  style='font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman";
  mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
  color:black;mso-ansi-language:EN-US;mso-fareast-language:EN-US;mso-bidi-language:
  AR-SA'><br clear=all style='page-break-before:always'>
  </span>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:60.0pt;font-family:
  Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>C<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

  style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Impact;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Optimal
  Segments<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;

  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
   id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"

   height:63.75pt'>
