  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Consider a grid of size </span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>1 x
N</span></b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>.
Each cell of the grid has the following properties<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=ListParagraph style='margin-left:.75in;mso-add-space:auto;text-align:
justify;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo2'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:
Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><span
style='mso-list:Ignore'>·<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;
font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Cell </span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:
115%;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>C</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> of
the grid has a value of </span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>V<sub>C</sub></span></b><sub><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> </span></sub><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>(</span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:
115%;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>1 </span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;
line-height:115%'>&#8804;</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman"'> C </span></b><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%'>&#8804;</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>
N</span></b><span style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>)<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
margin-left:.75in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo2'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:
Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:Symbol;color:windowtext;mso-bidi-language:#0845;
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>·<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
color:windowtext;mso-bidi-language:#0845;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>The value
of each cell is a positive integer less than </span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext;mso-bidi-language:
#0845'>26</span></b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext;
mso-bidi-language:#0845;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
margin-left:.75in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo2'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:
Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:Symbol;color:windowtext;mso-bidi-language:#0845;
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>·<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
color:windowtext;mso-bidi-language:#0845;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Some of the
cells are <i>special</i> and they are represented with the character </span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
color:windowtext;mso-bidi-language:#0845'>X</span></b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt;color:windowtext;mso-bidi-language:#0845;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
margin-left:.75in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo2'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:
Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:Symbol;color:windowtext;mso-bidi-language:#0845;
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>·<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
color:windowtext;mso-bidi-language:#0845;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Cell </span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
color:windowtext;mso-bidi-language:#0845'>C</span></b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt;color:windowtext;mso-bidi-language:#0845;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> has
a weight of <sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1026" type="#_x0000_t75"
 style='width:18pt;height:15pt' o:ole=" >
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/c_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=24 height=20
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/c_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1026"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1300299415">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]-->(two to the power of cell value)<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
margin-left:.75in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo2'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:
Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:Symbol;color:windowtext;mso-bidi-language:#0845;
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>·<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
color:windowtext;mso-bidi-language:#0845;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>The special
cells have weights of </span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext;mso-bidi-language:#0845'>1</span></b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext;mso-bidi-language:#0845;
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.75in;text-align:justify;text-indent:
-.25in'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>You
will be given the values of these </span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>N</span></b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> cells and your job will be to divide these
into </span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt'>K</span></b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'> segments so that<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=ListParagraph style='margin-left:.75in;mso-add-space:auto;text-align:
justify;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo4'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:
Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><span
style='mso-list:Ignore'>·<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='font-size:12.0pt;line-height:115%;
font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Each segment contains
at least one cell<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
margin-left:.75in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo4'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:
Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:Symbol;color:windowtext;mso-bidi-language:#0845;
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>·<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
color:windowtext;mso-bidi-language:#0845;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>There is at
least one <i>special</i> cell in each segment<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>The weight of a segment is equal to the
product of the weights of the cells it contains. You have to form segments in
such a way so that ratio<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>(Highest weight of all the segments) /
(Lowest weight of all the segments) is minimized.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>In case there are multiple answers with the
same lowest ratio, you have to make sure the number of cells in the first
segment is maximized. If there is still a tie, then make sure the number of
cells in the second segment is maximized and so on.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>Example:<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Courier New"'>N = 5 and K = 2<br>
Cell values = {1 2 X 3 X }<br>
Cell weights = {2 4 1 8 1}<br>
Optimal segmentation = (2 4 1)(8 1)<br>
Weights of segments = (8)(8)<br>
Ratio = 1<br>
Final Result = (1 2 X)(3 X)<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>The first line of input is an integer </span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'>T</span></b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>(</span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'>T </span></b>&#8804;
<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'>200</span></b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>) that indicates
the number of test cases. Each case starts with two integers </span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'>N</span></b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>(</span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'>1
&lt; N &lt; 31</span></b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>) and </span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'>K</span></b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>(</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'>1 &lt; K &lt; 16</span></b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>). The meaning of </span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'>N</span></b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> and </span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'>K</span></b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> are mentioned
above. The next line contains </span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'>N</span></b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> integers where the </span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'>I<sup>th</sup></span></b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> integer gives the
value of </span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
11.0pt'>V<sub>I</sub></span></b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>. The integers that are special will be represented by
</span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
11.0pt'>X</span></b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:
bold'>.</span><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>For each case, output the case number first.
If there is no way to divide the </span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'>N</span></b><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:
11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> cells into </span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'>K</span></b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> segments, meeting
the constraints above, then print </span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'>not possible!</span></b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> If there is a way
but the ratio is greater than </span><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'>10<sup>15</sup></span></b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'> then print </span><b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'>overflo</span></b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>w. If the ratio is
not greater than 10<sup>15</sup> then output the ratio first followed by the
segmentations. Each segment is enclosed by brackets. Look at the output for
detailed format.</span><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                            </span>Output for Sample
Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width=643
 style='width:6.7in;background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;

 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=301 valign=top style='width:225.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>4<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

  "Courier New"'>5 2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

  "Courier New"'>1 2 X 3 X<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>6 3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>X X 2 3 4 5<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

  "Courier New"'>10 3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

  "Courier New"'>X X X 25 25 25 25 25 25 25<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:

  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p></o:p></span></span></b></pre></td>
  <td width=342 valign=top style='width:256.5pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;

  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoTableGrid border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .25pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.25pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='margin-left:.25in;text-align:center;
  tab-stops:143.25pt'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span
  style='font-size:60.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>D<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=446 valign=top style='width:4.65in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
  style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Impact;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Triangle
  and Polynomial<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=100 valign=top style='width:75.35pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E0E0E0;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
   id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
   path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
   <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
   <v:formulas>
    <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
   </v:formulas>
   <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
   <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
  </v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" alt="  style='width:64.5pt;
   height:63.75pt'>
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/d_files/image001.png"  o:href="http://www.informatik.uni-ulm.de/acm/images/acmlogo.gif"/>
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=86 height=85
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/d_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>&nbsp;</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>An angle of given triangle is
twice of another angle of the same triangle. The largest angle of this triangle
is 120 degree. The bisector of the second largest angle intersects its opposite
side at point D. The distance of point D from the vertex containing the largest
angle is d (d is a positive integer). If the length of the largest side of this
triangle is 2x then mathematicians have proved that x is the root of some
polynomial of degree n (n&gt;3) whose coefficients are all integers. Given the
value of d and degree n you will have to find such a polynomial.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1026" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:480pt;height:175.5pt'>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/d_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=640 height=234
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/115/d_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"><![endif]></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input file contains less than
220 lines of inputs.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>The description of
each set is given below:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Input for each set is packed in
one line. This line contains two integers d (0&lt;d&lt;31) and n
(3&lt;n&lt;11). The meaning of d and n is given in the problem statement.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Input is terminated by a line
containing two zeroes.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>For each set
of input produce one line of output. This line contains (n+1) integers which
denotes the coefficients of the polynomial (In descending order of power). The
constant term of the polynomial cannot be zero. Such polynomials (with zero
constant term) will be considered as wrong answer. Also the absolute value all
the coefficients should be less than 10<sup>9</sup>.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                               </span>Output for
Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>10 4<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>0 0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=336 valign=top style='width:251.65pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-family:
  "Courier New"'>16 -160 -4800 -12000 30000<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

	mso-bidi-language:#0400;}
</style>
<![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="3074"/>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoTableGrid border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .25pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.25pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:60.0pt;font-family:
  Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>E<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=446 valign=top style='width:4.65in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
  style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Impact;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Masud
  Rana<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=100 valign=top style='width:75.35pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E0E0E0;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
   id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
   path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
   <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
   <v:formulas>
    <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
   </v:formulas>
   <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
   <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
  </v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" alt="  style='width:64.5pt;
   height:63.75pt'>
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  o:href="http://www.informatik.uni-ulm.de/acm/images/acmlogo.gif"/>
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=86 height=85
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/e_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Masud Rana, A Daring Spy Of <st1:place
w:st="on"><st1:country-region w:st="on">Bangladesh</st1:country-region></st1:place>
Counter Intelligence. He is in a new mission. There is a total n cities in <st1:place
w:st="on"><st1:country-region w:st="on">Bangladesh</st1:country-region></st1:place>.
Each city is connected to all other by bidirectional roads. So there are total
n * (n-1) / 2 bidirectional roads. Many of the roads are under control of evil
powers. City a is safely reachable from city b, if there is a path from a to b
containing only roads which are not under control of evil powers. There are m
roads which are safe from evil powers. The mission of Masud Rana is to destroy
the evil powers of some roads, and make sure that every city is safely
reachable from all other.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Masud Rana chose a new strategy
for this special mission. Every morning he selects a random city other than the
city he stays in at that moment, and visit that city by direct connecting road,
in the time of his visit by the road he destroys all evil power of that road if
exists any, and makes that road safe. After reaching <st1:City w:st="on"><st1:place
 w:st="on">new city</st1:place></st1:City>, he stays there till next morning.
In the next morning he checks whether all cities are safely reachable from all
others. If he is already done his mission ends, otherwise he repeats same
strategy.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>Let us number the cities by 1, 2, ... , n. Masud Rana is in
city 1 when he starts his mission. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>What is the expected number of days to finish the mission
for Masud Rana.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Input will starts with an integer
T(T &#8804; 100) which denotes the number of test case. Each case starts with
two integer N(N &#8804; 1 &#8804; 30) and M(0 &#8804; M &#8804; N*(N-1)/2).
Each of the next lines contains two integers a and b (1 &#8804; a, b &#8804; N)
which means road connecting city a and b is safe.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Output</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>You have to output the expected
number of days required for Masud Rana. Print the case number followed by the
output.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>Look at the sample in/out for
exact format. Upto 1E-6 error in your output will be acceptable. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width=655
 style='width:491.4pt;background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;
 mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:78.7pt'>
  <td width=331 valign=top style='width:3.45in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:78.7pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>3 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2 3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>4 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>2 3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=324 valign=top style='width:243.0pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:78.7pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  1: 1.0<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  2: 3.5<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoTableGrid border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;

 .25pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.25pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:60.0pt;font-family:
  Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>F<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=446 valign=top style='width:4.65in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
  style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Impact;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Avoiding
  Overlaps<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=100 valign=top style='width:75.35pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E0E0E0;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
   id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
   path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
   <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
   <v:formulas>
    <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>

    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>

   <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
  </v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" alt="  style='width:64.5pt;
   height:63.75pt'>
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/f_files/image001.png"  o:href="http://www.informatik.uni-ulm.de/acm/images/acmlogo.gif"/>
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=86 height=85
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/f_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Given N regular rectangles in a
sequence.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>Following this sequence you
have to draw every rectangles if it does not overlap with any rectangle which
has been drawn already. Calculate the total area of drawn rectangles.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>Note:<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>A rectangle is
regular if and only if its sides are all parallel to the axis.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The first line of the input
contains the number of test cases T (1 &#8804; T &#8804; 100).<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>Each case starts with a single line
containing N(0 &#8804; N &#8804; 10000), the number of rectangles in the
sequence. Next N lines will represent the sequence of rectangles. Each of the
next N lines will represent one rectangle having four integers x1, y1, x2, y2
(-100 &lt; x1, y1, x2, y2 &lt; 100, x1&lt;x2, y1&lt;y2), here (x1, y1) is the
lower left corner of the rectangle and (x2, y2) is the upper right corner of
the rectangle.<br>
<span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Verdana'><span style='mso-tab-count:
1'>          </span></span><span style='mso-tab-count:12'>                                                                                                                                                </span></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal>For each test case, print the case number and a single
integer, the total area covered by rectangles you drew. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                               </span>Output for
Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>-1 -1 1 1<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>0 0 10 10<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>1 0 2 2<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=324 valign=top style='width:243.0pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 1: 6<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
  normal'><span style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt;font-family:"Courier New";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span></span></b><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:11.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>

The size of input file is around 12 MB.<o:p></o:p></b></p>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>Almost all the
devices we use are designed for normal people and in most cases those who are not
normal adapt to these devices and we praise them a lot for their brilliance.
But for disabled people this might not be that pleasant  Imagine that we are
living in the land of cockroaches and we have to walk on the walls by wearing
super glue shoes because their roads and bridges are designed in that way.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<table class=MsoTableGrid border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:191;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;height:306.4pt'>
  <td width=327 valign=top style='width:245.5pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:306.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
   id="_x0000_i1026" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:170.25pt;height:299.25pt'>
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/g_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=227 height=399
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/g_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1026"><![endif]></p>
  </td>
  <td width=327 valign=top style='width:245.55pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:306.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
   id="_x0000_i1027" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:170.25pt;height:300.75pt'>
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/g_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=227 height=401
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/g_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1027"><![endif]></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=327 valign=top style='width:245.5pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>Figure 1:
  Draft design of a Normal Mobile Phone</p>
  </td>
  <td width=327 valign=top style='width:245.55pt;border-top:none;border-left:
  none;border-bottom:solid windowtext 1.0pt;border-right:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>Figure 2:
  Draft design of a mobile phone designed for blind people</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>So IBM (International
Business Mobile) has designed a new set for blind people that have only one
large button for typing characters and three other buttons for sending or
receiving phones and changing input modes. As there is only one button for
typing SMS, therefore one might need to press a button up to 26 times to type a
character. So the designers have omitted some characters: for example k is
replaced with c, to reduce the total number of alphabets to 19 (including
white space which for simplicity is denoted by the character underscore (_).
The following table shows which characters are replaced by what:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<table class=MsoTableGrid border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width=673
 style='width:504.9pt;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:191;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .5pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.5pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;height:31.45pt'>
  <td width=673 valign=top style='width:504.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:31.45pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>a
  b c d e f g h I <s>j k</s> l m n o p <s>q</s> r s t u <s>v w x<span
  style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>y z</s>  <o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b><span
  style='font-size:14.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'><span
  style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                  </span>g c<span
  style='mso-spacerun:yes'>           </span>c<span
  style='mso-spacerun:yes'>         </span>b u cs i g<span
  style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>_</span></b></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:1;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=673 valign=top style='width:504.9pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-top:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;
  padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>Figure: the characters
  j, k, q, v, w, x, y , z are written using other characters. So the reduced
  alphabet size becomes 18. So SMS message contain only these 18 different
  characters and also white space which is denoted with _ underscore. So all
  the SMS messages contain total 19 different characters</p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>The order in
which the characters are written on the large button denotes how many pushes
are required to type a character. Lets term this ordering as KEY ORDER. For
example if the characters are written in order &quot;_ab<b>c</b>dilefmnop<b>r</b>ghstu&quot;,
then to type c four presses are required, to type r 14 presses are required
and so on. And to type abacus total (2+3+2+4+19+17) = 47 presses are
required. Given the KEY ORDER and the SMS to type it is very easy to find out
the total number of presses to type that message. But in this problem you will
be given the SMS to be typed and total number of presses needed to type that
SMS. From this information you will have to find the KEY ORDER.<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>      </span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input</span></span><span
class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
mso-fareast-font-family:"Arial Unicode MS"'><o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>The input file contains total 1200
sets of inputs.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>The description of each
set is given below:</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>First line of the input for each
set contains a string, which is the SMS to be typed. This string contains only
19 different characters and has a maximum length 1000. The next line contains an
integer C which denotes the total number of presses to type that string. The
characters in the string are mostly randomly generated. But this string can
only contain characters present in the string &quot;_abcdefghilmnoprstu&quot;. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'>Input is terminated by a line
containing a single *.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'>For each set
of input produce one line of output. This line contains a string which denotes
the KEY ORDER that will ensure that the typing cost of the given SMS message is
equal to C. If there is more that one possible ordering, any one will do. There
will be no such input for which a ordering is not found and this string should
contain exactly 19 characters (only allowed characters are the characters in
the string &quot;_abcdefghilmnoprstu&quot;) and these characters should be different
(No character should be present twice).<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> 
</span>Note that it may be heard to find a strategy that funds solution for all
possible inputs, so if your output formatting is right (String length 19 and
all characters different and from the string &quot;_abcdefghilmnoprstu&quot;)
but your cost is wrong for at most 10 cases (of the 1200 cases), then your
solution will be accepted. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:143.25pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                                     </span>Output for
Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=355 valign=top style='width:3.7in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>tsnobfsr_emlllla_dtuangtcrhgpguthngrff<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>366<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>aausuufoisuflhdeihdauhnhiatlcusion<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>353<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>o_nmhfulhfmihl_febdiaommff_<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='mso-layout-grid-align:none;text-autospace:none'><b><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'>304<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

  </td>
  <td width=300 valign=top style='width:224.65pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;

  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span

  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span

  <p class=MsoNormal style='tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span

<title>Problem H - Its all about the Bandwidth</title>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<div align=right>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellpadding=0 style='mso-cellspacing:1.5pt;
 mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td style='padding:.75pt .75pt .75pt .75pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal><i><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>... it is important to
  realize that any lock can be picked with a big enough hammer. </span></i><span
  style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p align=right style='text-align:right'><tt><span style='font-size:10.0pt'>Sun
System &amp; Network Admin Manual</span></tt><span style='font-family:Arial'> <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=paragraph style='text-align:justify'>My appartment has <b>n</b>
computers. My friend's appartment also has <b>n</b> computers. In each
appartment, some pairs of computers are connected to each other with AcidNet
cables (ignoring the routers). Each connection has a certain bandwidth (in
bytes per second). My friend always brags about the speed of his computer
network. He always shows me his <b>n</b>-by-<b>n</b> table that lists the
bandwidths between each pair of computers. My network is slower, and I want to
rebuild it. So I want to know how I should connect my computers in order to
have the same <b>n</b>-by-<b>n</b> bandwidth table. </p>

<p class=paragraph style='text-align:justify'>Since I don't want to buy too
many AcidNet cables, you'll need to find a solution with the minimum number of
connections. You may use AcidNet cables of any integer bandwidth - they all
have the same price at my local Imaginary Hardware Store. </p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
Arial'>Problem, in short<o:p></o:p></span></b></h5>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:Arial'><br>
</span>Given a graph, you can compute the all-pairs maximum flow table, right?
Now do the opposite: given an <b>n</b>-by-<b>n</b> symmetric table, find a
graph with fewest edges that has the given table of all-pairs maximum flows. <b><span
style='font-size:18.0pt'><o:p></o:p></span></b></h5>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:Arial'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></h5>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=paragraph style='text-align:justify'>The first line of input gives the
number of cases, <b>N</b>. <b>N</b> test cases follow. Each one is a line
containing <b>n</b> (0 &lt; <b>n</b> &#8804; 200), followed by <b>n</b> lines
with <b>n</b> integers each, giving the table <tt><b><span style='font-size:
10.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>T</span></b></tt>. </p>

<ul type=disc>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     text-align:justify;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo7;tab-stops:list .5in'><tt><b><span
     style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>T</span></b></tt><tt><span
     style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>[u][u]</span></tt>
     will always be 0. </li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     text-align:justify;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo7;tab-stops:list .5in'><tt><b><span
     style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>T</span></b></tt><tt><span
     style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>[u][v]</span></tt>
     will always be positive and equal to <tt><b><span style='font-size:10.0pt;
     font-family:"Times New Roman"'>T</span></b></tt><tt><span
     style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Times New Roman"'>[v][u]</span></tt>.
     </li>
 <li class=MsoNormal style='mso-margin-top-alt:auto;mso-margin-bottom-alt:auto;
     text-align:justify;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo7;tab-stops:list .5in'><tt><b><span
     style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>T</span></b></tt><tt><span
     style='mso-ansi-font-size:12.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt'>[i][j]</span></tt><span
     style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:"Courier New"'> &#8804; 10000
     <o:p></o:p></span></li>
</ul>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><tt><b><span style='font-size:
11.0pt'>T</span></b></tt><tt><span style='font-size:11.0pt'>[u][v]</span></tt>
is the largest possible speed (in bytes per second) for sending information
from computer u to computer v, assuming there is no other traffic on the
network. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=paragraph style='text-align:justify'>For each test case, output one
line containing &quot;Case #<b>x</b>:&quot; followed by <b>m</b> - the number
of cables I have to buy. The next <b>m</b> lines will each contain 3 integers <b>u</b>,
<b>v</b> and <b>w</b> meaning that I need to connect computer <b>u</b> to
computer <b>v</b> using an AcidNet cable of bandwidth <b>w</b>. Computers are
numbered starting at 0. </p>

<p class=paragraph style='text-align:justify'>If there is no solution, print
&quot;Impossible&quot;. </p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bidi-language:#0845'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bidi-language:#0845'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                               </span>Output for
Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:30.1pt'>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:30.1pt'><pre>4</pre><pre>2</pre><pre>0 10</pre><pre>10 0</pre><pre>3</pre><pre>0 1 1</pre><pre>1 0 2</pre><pre>1 2 0</pre><pre>1</pre><pre>0</pre><pre>4</pre><pre>0 2 2 1</pre><pre>2 0 2 2</pre><pre>2 2 0 2</pre><pre>1 2 2 0</pre></td>
  <td width=348 valign=top style='width:261.0pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:30.1pt'><pre>Case #1: 1</pre><pre>0 1 10</pre><pre>Case #2: 2</pre><pre>0 1 1</pre><pre>1 2 2</pre><pre>Case #3: 0</pre><pre>Case #4: Impossible</pre></td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext;mso-bidi-language:#0845'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</span></div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:windowtext;mso-bidi-language:
#0845'>Problemsetter: Igor Naverniouk<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:Arial;color:windowtext;mso-bidi-language:
#0845'>Special Thanks: Per Austrin<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;tab-stops:45.8pt 91.6pt 137.4pt 183.2pt 229.0pt 274.8pt 320.6pt 366.4pt 412.2pt 458.0pt 503.8pt 549.6pt 595.4pt 641.2pt 687.0pt 732.8pt'><b><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext;mso-bidi-language:#0845'><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

</div>

	text-indent:0in;}
@list l0:level8
	{mso-level-number-format:none;
	mso-level-suffix:none;
	mso-level-text:" ;
	mso-level-tab-stop:0in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	margin-left:0in;
	text-indent:0in;}
@list l0:level9
	{mso-level-number-format:none;
	mso-level-suffix:none;
	mso-level-text:" ;
	mso-level-tab-stop:0in;
	mso-level-number-position:left;
	margin-left:0in;
	text-indent:0in;}
ol
	{margin-bottom:0in;}
ul
	{margin-bottom:0in;}
-->
</style>
<!--[if gte mso 10]>

<body lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<div align=center>

<table class=MsoTableGrid border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;
 mso-yfti-tbllook:480;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;mso-border-insideh:
 .25pt solid windowtext;mso-border-insidev:.25pt solid windowtext'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes'>
  <td width=97 valign=top style='width:73.1pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E6E6E6;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-size:60.0pt;font-family:
  Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>I<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=446 valign=top style='width:4.65in;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .25pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><span
  style='font-size:28.0pt;font-family:Impact;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>General
  Sultan<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Input:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><b
  style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'>Output:</span></b><span style='font-family:Arial;
  mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'> Standard Output<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=100 valign=top style='width:75.35pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .25pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .25pt;background:#E0E0E0;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;tab-stops:143.25pt'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
   id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
   path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
   <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
   <v:formulas>
    <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
   </v:formulas>
   <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
   <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
  </v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" alt="  style='width:64.5pt;
   height:63.75pt'>
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/i_files/image001.png"  o:href="http://www.informatik.uni-ulm.de/acm/images/acmlogo.gif"/>
  </v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=86 height=85
  src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/i_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></p>
  </td>
 </tr>
</table>

</div>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'>This is
war time again! Our beloved Sultan has assumed the post of a general and going
to the war with his huge army. Being an intelligent fellow as he is, he has
discovered a handful of new weapons to help him win the war. In order to
facilitate instructing his units, he assigns each type of weapon a single
binary code. For example, he has three types of weapons - </p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;
mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;mso-hyphenate:none;
tab-stops:.5in'>FordCannon (code: 1)</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;
mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;mso-hyphenate:none;
tab-stops:.5in'>EdmondMortar (code: 10)</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;
mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo2;mso-hyphenate:none;
tab-stops:.5in'>HopcroftRifle (code: 00)</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'>So,
now when he makes one long beep and one short beep (that is, 10) from his grand
whistle, an EdmondMortar unit is fired while when he makes two short beeps
means, 00), a HopcroftRifle comes into action. Please note that, he has an
unlimited supply of every types.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'>Problem
arised when in an war, the units were coded like  FordCannon (01),
EdmondMortar (001), HopcroftRifle (01001). Once, he went for a HopcroftRifle
(01001) but his men fired a FordCannon (01) and then an EdmondMortar (001)
instead. The furious Sultan realized that the coding itself was ambigous i.e.
more than one sequence of the weapons can translate into the same signal.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'>Now,
your task is to determine if a given coding scheme is ambiguous or not before
the war starts.</p>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><b><span style='font-size:18.0pt;font-family:
Arial'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></h5>

<h5 style='text-align:justify'><span class=StyleArial16pt><span
style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></span></h5>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'>There
will be around 100 test cases.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>Every
test case starts with a single integer <b>N </b>(1&#8804; N &#8804; 100), the
number of weapon types. Each of the following N lines contains a string
(denoting the name of the weapon, less than 21 characters) and a binary number
(the code, less than 21 characters).</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal>The last test case will be followed by a single 0.</p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<h4><span class=StyleArial16pt><span style='font-size:16.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
10.0pt'>Output <o:p></o:p></span></span></h4>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>For every test case, print </span><span
style='font-family:"Courier New";mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Case #x: </span><span
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>, where x is the case number. Then print
Ambiguous. if a code leads to multiple sequences or print Not ambiguous.
otherwise.</span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='mso-bidi-language:#0845'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<h1 align=left style='text-align:left'><b><span style='font-size:16.0pt;
mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;
font-style:normal'>Sample Input<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>                               </span>Output for
Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></h1>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=1 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='background:#CCCCCC;border-collapse:collapse;border:none;mso-border-alt:
 solid windowtext .5pt;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-irow:0;mso-yfti-firstrow:yes;mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;
  height:30.1pt'>
  <td width=319 valign=top style='width:239.4pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:30.1pt'><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>3<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>FordCannon 1<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>EdmondMortar 10<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>HopcroftRifle 00<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>3<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>FordCannon 01<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>EdmondMortar 001<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>HopcroftRifle 01001<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>0<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></pre></td>
  <td width=348 valign=top style='width:261.0pt;border:solid windowtext 1.0pt;
  border-left:none;mso-border-left-alt:solid windowtext .5pt;mso-border-alt:
  solid windowtext .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:30.1pt'><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>Case #1: Not ambiguous.<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'>Case #2: Ambiguous.<o:p></o:p></span></pre><pre><span
  style='font-size:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></pre></td>
 </tr>
</table>

<div class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;color:windowtext;mso-bidi-language:#0845'>

<hr size=2 width="100%" align=center>

</span></div>

	mso-bidi-font-family:Vrinda;}
span.Absatz-Standardschriftart
	{mso-style-name:Absatz-Standardschriftart;
	mso-style-parent:" ;}
span.WW-Absatz-Standardschriftart
	{mso-style-name:WW-Absatz-Standardschriftart;
	mso-style-parent:" ;}
span.WW-Absatz-Standardschriftart1
	{mso-style-name:WW-Absatz-Standardschriftart1;
	mso-style-parent:" ;}

	{mso-style-name:WW-Absatz-Standardschriftart11;
	mso-style-parent:" ;}
span.WW-Absatz-Standardschriftart111
	{mso-style-name:WW-Absatz-Standardschriftart111;
	mso-style-parent:" ;}
p.Heading, li.Heading, div.Heading
	{mso-style-name:Heading;
	mso-style-next:"Body Text";
	margin-top:12.0pt;
	margin-right:0in;
	margin-bottom:6.0pt;
	margin-left:0in;

	page-break-after:avoid;
	mso-hyphenate:none;
	font-size:14.0pt;
	font-family:"Liberation Sans";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"DejaVu LGC Sans";
	mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans";
	mso-bidi-font-family:"DejaVu LGC Sans";
	mso-fareast-language:AR-SA;
	mso-bidi-language:AR-SA;}

	{mso-style-name:Index;
	margin:0in;

	mso-fareast-language:AR-SA;
	mso-bidi-language:AR-SA;}

	{mso-style-name:"Table Contents";

	mso-bidi-language:AR-SA;}

div.Section1
	{page:Section1;
	mso-footnote-position:beneath-text;}
 /* List Definitions */
 @list l0

	text-indent:-.6in;}
@list l1:level5
	{mso-level-number-format:none;
	mso-level-text:" ;
	mso-level-tab-stop:.7in;

@list l1:level6
	{mso-level-number-format:none;

<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-parent:" ;

	mso-para-margin:0in;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;

	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-ansi-language:#0400;
	mso-fareast-language:#0400;
	mso-bidi-language:#0400;}
</style>

 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="2050">
  <o:colormenu v:ext="edit" fillcolor="none [4]" strokecolor="none [1]"
   shadowcolor="none [2]"/>
 </o:shapedefaults></xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
