<body bgcolor=white lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'>Problem A</span></b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'><br>
<b>Lights inside a 3D Grid<o:p></o:p></b></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'>Input: </span></b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'>Output: </span></b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>You are given a 3D
grid, which have dimensions <b>N</b>, <b>M</b> and <b>P</b>. Each of the <b>M x
N x P</b> cells has a light. Initially all lights are off. You will have <b>K</b>
turns. In each of the <b>K</b> turns,<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=ListParagraph style='text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1;
tab-stops:list .5in left 1.0in'><![if !supportLists]><span style='font-family:
Calibri;mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;mso-bidi-font-family:Calibri'><span
style='mso-list:Ignore'>-<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>You
will select a cell A randomly from the grid<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=ListParagraph style='text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1;
tab-stops:list .5in left 1.0in'><![if !supportLists]><span style='font-family:
Calibri;mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;mso-bidi-font-family:Calibri'><span
style='mso-list:Ignore'>-<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>You
will select a cell B randomly from the grid<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=ListParagraph style='text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1;
tab-stops:list .5in left 1.0in'><![if !supportLists]><span style='font-family:
Calibri;mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;mso-bidi-font-family:Calibri'><span
style='mso-list:Ignore'>-<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Toggle
the states of all the bulbs bounded by cell A and cell B, ie make all the ON
lights OFF and make all the OFF lights ON which are bounded by A and B. To be
more clear, consider cell A is (x1, y1, z1) and cell B is (x2, y2, z2). Then
you have to toggle all the bulbs in grid cell (x, y, z) where
min(x1,x2)&lt;=x&lt;=max(x1,x2) , min(y1,y2)&lt;=y&lt;=max(y1,y2) and min(z1,
z2)&lt;=z&lt;=max(z1, z2).<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=ListParagraph style='margin-left:0in;tab-stops:.5in'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>How many bulbs are
expected to be ON after K turns?<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Note: <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=ListParagraph style='text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1;
tab-stops:list .5in left 1.0in'><![if !supportLists]><span style='font-family:
Calibri;mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;mso-bidi-font-family:Calibri;
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>-<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>A and B can be the same
cell.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:Utopia;mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
Utopia'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>First line of the input is an integer <b>T(T&lt;101)</b>
which denotes the number of test cases. Each of the next <b>T </b>lines
represents one test case by 4 integers <b>N, M, P (0 &lt; M, N, P &lt; 101) </b>and
<b>K (0&lt;=K&lt;=10000)</b><span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>separated
by spaces.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Output one line for each test cases
giving the expected number of ON lights. Up to 1E-6 error in your output will
be acceptable.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>Print the case number
followed by the output.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>Look at the
sample output for exact format.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Sample Input<span style='mso-tab-count:
5'>                                                                               </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:-2.25pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;height:13.8pt'>
  <td width=294 valign=top style='width:220.75pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .5pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
  height:13.8pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'>2</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal>2 3 4 1</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><a name="DDE_LINK3">2 3<span
  style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>4 2</a></p>
  </td>
  <td width=290 valign=top style='width:217.65pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:13.8pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'>Case 1: 6.3750000000</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal>Case 2: 9.0976562500</p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>
  </td>
  <![if !supportMisalignedRows]>
  <td style='height:13.8pt;border:none' width=0 height=18></td>
  <![endif]>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><!--[if mso & !supportInlineShapes & supportFields]><span
style='mso-element:field-begin'></span><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>SHAPE <span style='mso-element:field-separator'></span><![endif]--><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:rect
 id="_x0000_s1026" style='width:415.25pt;height:1.5pt;

 <v:fill color2="#535766"/>
 <v:stroke joinstyle="round"/>
 <w:wrap type="none"/>
 <w:anchorlock/>
</v:rect><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=554 height=2
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/raya.gif"  v:shapes="_x0000_s1026"><![endif]><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><![endif]--><!--[if mso & !supportInlineShapes & supportFields]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:415.25pt;height:1.5pt'/><span
style='mso-element:field-end'></span><![endif]--></p>

  <w:IgnoreMixedContent>false</w:IgnoreMixedContent>

	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;

	mso-style-parent:" ;

	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;

	mso-fareast-language:#0400;

</style>
<![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="2050">
  <o:colormenu v:ext="edit" fillcolor="none [4]" strokecolor="none [1]"
   shadowcolor="none [2]"/>
 </o:shapedefaults></xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body bgcolor=white lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'>Problem B</span></b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'><br>
<b>Atoms<o:p></o:p></b></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'>Input: </span></b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'>Output: </span></b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Atoms </span></i><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>is a two player game consisting of an <b
style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N*N</b> grid. The top-left cell has a
coordinate of (<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>0, 0</b>) and the
bottom-right has a coordinate of (<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N-1,N-1</b>).
Each player has an infinite number of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>atoms</i>
with them. Every <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>atom</i> of player one
has the same color. The <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>atoms</i> of
player two also have same color but they are different from those of player
one. The two players take turns to place <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>atoms</i>
on the grid. On each turn, a player selects a <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>stable</i> cell to place one <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>atom</i>
from his collection. The rule for <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>stability</i>
is simple; the cell must either be empty or it must already contain an <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>atom</i> of that players color. There is
however an upper limit to the number of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>atoms</i>
a cell may contain and they are described below:<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.75in;text-indent:-.5in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1;
tab-stops:list .75in left 1.5in'><![if !supportLists]><span style='font-family:
"Liberation Sans";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Liberation Sans"'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>i)<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>The
four corner cells can contain at most 1 <i>atom</i>.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.75in;text-indent:-.5in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1;
tab-stops:list .75in left 1.5in'><![if !supportLists]><span style='font-family:
"Liberation Sans";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Liberation Sans"'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>ii)<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>The
other outer cells can contain at most 2 <i>atoms</i>.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.75in;text-indent:-.5in;mso-list:l0 level1 lfo1;
tab-stops:list .75in left 1.5in'><![if !supportLists]><span style='font-family:
"Liberation Sans";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Liberation Sans"'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>iii)<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>The
remaining cells can contain at most 3 <i>atoms</i>. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.75in'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:150pt;
 height:149.25pt' filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/p1_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=200 height=199
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/p1_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>As an example, the
figure above shows a grid of 5 x 5. The filled cells can contain at most 1 <i>atom</i>
each. The stripped ones can contain at most 2 <i>atoms</i> each and the blank
ones can contain at most 3 <i>atoms</i> each.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>   </span>When selecting a <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>stable</i> cell, the two players follow rather simple rules:<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.75in;text-indent:-.5in;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo2;
tab-stops:list .75in left 1.5in'><![if !supportLists]><span style='font-family:
"Liberation Sans";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Liberation Sans"'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>i)<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>First,
player one places an <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>atom</i> on a
randomly selected cell.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.75in;text-indent:-.5in;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo2;
tab-stops:list .75in left 1.5in'><![if !supportLists]><span style='font-family:
"Liberation Sans";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Liberation Sans"'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>ii)<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Player
two looks for a cell whose minimum distance from any cell occupied by <i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>atoms</i> of player one is maximized. Here
distances between cells are measured as Manhattan distance. The Manhattan
distance between two cells is the sum of the absolute row difference and column
difference. For example, the Manhattan distance between (1, 5) and (4, 2) is
equal to (4-1) + (5-2) = 3 + 3 = 6.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.75in;text-indent:-.5in;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo2;
tab-stops:list .75in left 1.5in'><![if !supportLists]><span style='font-family:
"Liberation Sans";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Liberation Sans"'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>iii)<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>In
case of multiple cells fulfilling the criteria of rule (<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>ii</b>), the cell with lowest row number is selected. If there is still
a tie, then the cell with lowest column number is selected. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.75in;text-indent:-.5in;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo2;
tab-stops:list .75in left 1.5in'><![if !supportLists]><span style='font-family:
"Liberation Sans";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-bidi-font-family:
"Liberation Sans"'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>iv)<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>Player one then follows a similar strategy to
that described in (<b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>ii</b>) to place
another <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>atom </i>and the game continues
likewise.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.75in'><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>If a player is
unable to make any valid move, then he is considered the loser and the game
stops there. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Your task in this problem is simple. Given a
state of the grid, you are to determine if this state is achievable if the
players follow the rules mentioned earlier.<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'> 
</span><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>The first line of input will start
with a positive integer <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>T&lt;50</b>,
where <b>T</b> denotes the number of test cases. Each case will begin with a
number <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N(3&lt;=N&lt;=7</b>) which
denotes the size of the grid for that case. <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'>N</b> lines will follow with <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'>N </b>integers
on each line. The absolute value of these integers will be less than <b>10<sup>7</sup></b>.
A positive integer means player one has placed <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:
normal'>atoms</i> in the corresponding cell and negative integer means player
two placed <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>atoms</i> in the cell. The
number of <i style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>atoms</i> in a cell is denoted
by the absolute value of the cell. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>For each case, output the case number
first. If the given configuration is valid output valid, otherwise output
invalid. Look at the sample in/out for exact format.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Sample Input<span style='mso-tab-count:
5'>                                                                               </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:-2.0pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;height:21.0pt'>
  <td width=294 valign=top style='width:220.5pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .5pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
  height:21.0pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:
  "Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
  "Liberation Sans"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
  "Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
  "Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>1 0 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
  "Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>0 0 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
  "Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>0 0 -1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
  "Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
  "Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>2 0 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
  "Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>0 0 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><a name="DDE_LINK3"><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
  mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>0
  0 0</span></a><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
  "Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=290 valign=top style='width:217.15pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:21.0pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:
  "Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
  "Liberation Sans"'>Case 1: valid<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
  "Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Case 2: invalid<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <![if !supportMisalignedRows]>
  <td style='height:21.0pt;border:none' width=0 height=28></td>
  <![endif]>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><!--[if mso & !supportInlineShapes & supportFields]><span

	{mso-style-name:Index;

	font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-fareast-language:AR-SA;
	mso-bidi-language:AR-SA;}
p.TableContents, li.TableContents, div.TableContents
	{mso-style-name:"Table Contents";
	margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan no-line-numbers;
	mso-hyphenate:none;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-fareast-language:AR-SA;
	mso-bidi-language:AR-SA;}
p.TableHeading, li.TableHeading, div.TableHeading
	{mso-style-name:"Table Heading";
	mso-style-parent:"Table Contents";
	margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	text-align:center;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan no-line-numbers;
	mso-hyphenate:none;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-fareast-language:AR-SA;
	mso-bidi-language:AR-SA;
	font-weight:bold;}
 /* Page Definitions */
 @page
	{mso-footnote-position:beneath-text;}
@page Section1
	{size:8.5in 11.0in;
	margin:.3in 1.0in .3in 1.0in;
	mso-header-margin:.5in;
	mso-footer-margin:.5in;
	mso-paper-source:0;}
div.Section1
	{page:Section1;
	mso-footnote-position:beneath-text;}
 /* List Definitions */

	text-indent:0in;}

<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;

	mso-style-parent:" ;

	mso-para-margin:0in;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;

	mso-fareast-language:#0400;

<![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="2050">
  <o:colormenu v:ext="edit" fillcolor="none [4]" strokecolor="none [1]"
   shadowcolor="none [2]"/>
 </o:shapedefaults></xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>

  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body bgcolor=white lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'>Problem C</span></b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'><br>
<b>Cutting Cakes<o:p></o:p></b></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'>Input: </span></b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'>Output: </span></b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Alice and Bob are
twins. In their birthday, they have a really large cake of dimensions <b>10<sup>4</sup>x10<sup>4</sup></b>.
The cake has a number of flowers on it. As usual, Alice and Bob starts playing
with it. First, Alice cuts the cake in two pieces, and then Bob takes the part
with the maximum flowers on it. Since, Alice likes the flowers too, she will
try to get maximum number of flowers. The flowers, which are incident by the
cut are ruined, and thus non of them get those. The badness of a cut is the
difference of the number of flowers between the two sets.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>The task presented to you is not to maximize
the number of flowers, Alice gets. Instead, you are given the co-ordinates of
the flowers, and a cut, made by Alice. You need to find out the number of
flowers, that are partitioned into two parts, and the number of flowers, being
ruined by the cut. Alice always cuts in a straight line.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>First line contains <b><i>T</i></b>,
the number of test cases. Each test case starts with an integer <b><i>N</i></b>,
the number of flowers. Following <b><i>N</i></b> lines each contains two
integers, <b><i>x<sub>i</sub></i></b> and <b><i>y<sub>i</sub></i></b>, the
co-ordinate of the <i>i</i>-th flower. <b>No three flowers will be collinear.</b>
After that, a line with values, <b><i>M</i></b>, <b><i>X<sub>1</sub>,</i></b> <b><i>Y<sub>1</sub></i></b>,
<b><i>X<sub>2</sub>, Y<sub>2</sub>, dX<sub>1</sub></i></b>, <b><i>dY<sub>1</sub></i></b>,
<b><i>dX<sub>2</sub>, dY<sub>2</sub></i></b> follows. Here, <b>M </b>is the
number of queries. Each of these queries will be a line between two given
points. The end points are generated by the function given below. Each call to
the function generate will produce the end points of the query line. <b><i>X<sub>1</sub>,
Y<sub>1</sub>, X<sub>2</sub>, Y<sub>2</sub>, dX<sub>1</sub>, dY<sub>1</sub>, dX<sub>2</sub>,
dY<sub>2</sub></i></b><sub> </sub>are used to generate the lines. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>X1, Y1, X2, Y2, dX1,
dY1, dX2, dY2<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>function generate<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><span
style='mso-tab-count:1'>            </span>X<sub>1</sub> = (X<sub>1</sub> +
dX1) mod 10<sup>4<o:p></o:p></sup></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><span
style='mso-tab-count:1'>            </span>Y<sub>1</sub> = (Y<sub>1</sub> +
dY1) mod 10<sup>4<o:p></o:p></sup></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><span
style='mso-tab-count:1'>            </span>X<sub>2</sub> = (X<sub>2</sub> +
dX2) mod 10<sup>4<o:p></o:p></sup></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><span
style='mso-tab-count:1'>            </span>Y<sub>2</sub> = (Y<sub>2</sub> +
dY2) mod 10<sup>4<o:p></o:p></sup></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><span
style='mso-tab-count:1'>            </span>if X<sub>1</sub> == X<sub>2</sub>
and Y<sub>1</sub> == Y<sub>2</sub> then<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><span
style='mso-tab-count:2'>                        </span>Y<sub>2</sub> = (Y<sub>1</sub>
+ 1) mod 10<sup>4<o:p></o:p></sup></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><span
style='mso-tab-count:1'>            </span><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><b><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>P.S.: It is highly
unlikely that, an O(NM) solution would pass the time limits. You have to think
of some more clever solution<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Each case starts
with the line Case #n: where <b><i>n</i></b> is the number of the test case.
For each line, output three integers, <b><i>p</i></b>, <b><i>q</i></b> and <b><i>r</i></b>;
where <b><i>r</i></b> is the number of flowers on the line and <b><i>p</i></b>
and <b><i>q</i></b> are the number of flowers on the sides of the line.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt;
tab-stops:0in'><b><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt;
tab-stops:0in'><b><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Constraints<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt;
tab-stops:0in'><b><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo2;
tab-stops:list .5in left 1.0in'><![if !supportLists]><span style='font-size:
9.0pt;font-family:Wingdings;mso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:
Wingdings'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>l<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype id="_x0000_t75"
 coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t" path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe"
 filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:31.5pt;
 height:13.5pt' o:ole="  filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/p2_files/image001.emz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=42 height=18
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/p2_files/image001.emz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1025"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1303077650">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo2;
tab-stops:list .5in left 1.0in'><![if !supportLists]><span style='font-size:
9.0pt;font-family:Wingdings;mso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:
Wingdings'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>l<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1026"
 type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:51.75pt;height:13.5pt' o:ole="  filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/p2_files/image001.emz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=69 height=18

  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1303077651">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo2;
tab-stops:list .5in left 1.0in'><![if !supportLists]><span style='font-size:
9.0pt;font-family:Wingdings;mso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:
Wingdings'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>l<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1027"

 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/p2_files/image001.emz"  o:title=" />

 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1027"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1303077652">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo2;
tab-stops:list .5in left 1.0in'><![if !supportLists]><span style='font-size:
9.0pt;font-family:Wingdings;mso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:
Wingdings'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>l<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>For
all location of flower (x<sub>i</sub>,y<sub>i</sub>), </span><sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1028" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:86.25pt;height:15.75pt'
 o:ole="  filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/p2_files/image001.emz"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=115 height=21
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/p2_files/image001.emz"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1028"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:OLEObject Type="Embed" ProgID="Equation.3" ShapeID="_x0000_i1028"
  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1303077653">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>. No three points
will be collinear.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo2;
tab-stops:list .5in left 1.0in'><![if !supportLists]><span style='font-size:
9.0pt;font-family:Wingdings;mso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:
Wingdings'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>l<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1029"

</xml><![endif]--><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;
mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo2;tab-stops:list .5in left 1.0in'><![if !supportLists]><span

</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>All
input values will fit into a 32bit signed integer<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span

for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

	margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan no-line-numbers;
	mso-hyphenate:none;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-fareast-language:AR-SA;
	mso-bidi-language:AR-SA;}
p.TableContents, li.TableContents, div.TableContents
	{mso-style-name:"Table Contents";
	margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan no-line-numbers;
	mso-hyphenate:none;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-fareast-language:AR-SA;
	mso-bidi-language:AR-SA;}
p.TableHeading, li.TableHeading, div.TableHeading
	{mso-style-name:"Table Heading";
	mso-style-parent:"Table Contents";
	margin:0in;
	margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	text-align:center;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan no-line-numbers;
	mso-hyphenate:none;
	font-size:12.0pt;
	font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-fareast-language:AR-SA;
	mso-bidi-language:AR-SA;

 @page
	{mso-footnote-position:beneath-text;}

	{size:8.5in 11.0in;

	mso-paper-source:0;}

</style>
<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;
	mso-style-noshow:yes;
	mso-style-parent:" ;
	mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
	mso-para-margin:0in;
	mso-para-margin-bottom:.0001pt;
	mso-pagination:widow-orphan;

	mso-fareast-language:#0400;
	mso-bidi-language:#0400;}
</style>
<![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="2050">
  <o:colormenu v:ext="edit" fillcolor="none [4]" strokecolor="none [1]"
   shadowcolor="none [2]"/>
 </o:shapedefaults></xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body bgcolor=white lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'>Problem D</span></b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'><br>
<b>No Problem!<o:p></o:p></b></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'>Input: </span></b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'>Output: </span></b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Programming contests are being arranged so
frequently these days. While this might be a good news for the contestants, the
scenario is completely opposite for the problemsetters. So far, the
problemsetters somehow managed to produce some sorts of a set &amp; say No
problem!. But it is doubtful how long will it be possible if the trend of
arranging contests in a short notice continues.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>You are given the number of problems created
in every month of a year and number of problems required in each month. If N
problems are required in a month &amp; there are not enough problems at that
time, all contests of that month is canceled. Write a program to determine if
there are enough problems for the contests. Please keep in mind that, if a
problem is created in month X, it can only be used in month X + 1 &amp; the
later months.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>The first line of every test case has
an integer <b>S (0&lt;=S&lt;=100)</b>. Number of problems that is ready at the
beginning of the year. The 2<sup>nd</sup> line has 12 space separated integers,
denoting the number of problems created in each of the 12 months of that year.
The months are in the same order as they appear in a year. The 3<sup>rd</sup>
line has another 12 space separated integers, the number of problems required
to use in contests in those 12 months (With the same order as above). These
integers will be between 0 &amp; 20 (inclusive). The end of input will be
denoted by a negative integer.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>For each test case, print a line of
the form, <b>Case X:</b> , where <b>X</b> is the case number. Then print 12
lines. If there are enough problems to meet the requirements in month <b>i</b> <b>(1&lt;=i&lt;=12)</b>,
print <b>No problem! :D</b> in the <b>i</b>'th line, otherwise print <b>No
problem. :(<o:p></o:p></b></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Sample Input<span style='mso-tab-count:
5'>                                                                               </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:-1.75pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;height:21.0pt'>
  <td width=294 valign=top style='width:220.25pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .5pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
  height:21.0pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><a name="DDE_LINK3"><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
  mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>5<o:p></o:p></span></a></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='mso-bookmark:DDE_LINK3'><span
  style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
  mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>3 0 3 5 8 2 1 0 3 5 6 9 <o:p></o:p></span></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='mso-bookmark:DDE_LINK3'><span
  style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
  mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>0 0 10 2 6 4 1 0 1 1 2 2<o:p></o:p></span></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='mso-bookmark:DDE_LINK3'><span
  style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
  mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>-1</span></span><span
  style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
  mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=289 valign=top style='width:216.65pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;

  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><a name="DDE_LINK"><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";

  1:</span></a><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
  "Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt;

  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt;

  "Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>No problem! :D<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt;

  problem. :(</span></a><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
  "Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt;

  "Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>No problem! :D<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:

  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt;

  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>

Setter: Mohammad Mahmudur Rahman<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Special
Thanks: Md. Arifuzzaman Arif<o:p></o:p></span></p>

  <w:DrawingGridVerticalSpacing>0 pt</w:DrawingGridVerticalSpacing>

  <w:DisplayVerticalDrawingGridEvery>0</w:DisplayVerticalDrawingGridEvery>
  <w:UseMarginsForDrawingGridOrigin/>
  <w:ValidateAgainstSchemas/>
  <w:SaveIfXMLInvalid>false</w:SaveIfXMLInvalid>
  <w:IgnoreMixedContent>false</w:IgnoreMixedContent>
  <w:AlwaysShowPlaceholderText>false</w:AlwaysShowPlaceholderText>
  <w:DrawingGridHorizontalOrigin>0 pt</w:DrawingGridHorizontalOrigin>
  <w:DrawingGridVerticalOrigin>0 pt</w:DrawingGridVerticalOrigin>
  <w:Compatibility>
   <w:SpaceForUL/>
   <w:BalanceSingleByteDoubleByteWidth/>
   <w:DoNotLeaveBackslashAlone/>
   <w:ULTrailSpace/>
   <w:DoNotExpandShiftReturn/>
   <w:AdjustLineHeightInTable/>
   <w:SelectEntireFieldWithStartOrEnd/>
   <w:UseWord2002TableStyleRules/>
  </w:Compatibility>
  <w:BrowserLevel>MicrosoftInternetExplorer4</w:BrowserLevel>
 </w:WordDocument>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>

 </w:LatentStyles>

<!--[if gte mso 10]>
<style>
 /* Style Definitions */
 table.MsoNormalTable
	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";
	mso-tstyle-rowband-size:0;
	mso-tstyle-colband-size:0;

 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="2050">

   shadowcolor="none [2]"/>

 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->

<body bgcolor=white lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'>Problem E</span></b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'><br>
<b>Teams<o:p></o:p></b></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'>Input: </span></b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'>Output: </span></b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>In a galaxy far far away
there is an ancient game played among the planets. The specialty of the game is
that there is no limitation on the number of players in each team, as long as
there is a captain in the team. (The game is totally strategic, so sometimes
less player increases the chance to win). So the coaches who have a total of <b>N
</b>players to play, selects <b>K (1 &#8804; K &#8804; N)</b> players and make
one of them as the captain for each phase of the game. Your task is simple,
just find in how many ways a coach can select a team from his <b>N</b> players.
Remember that, teams with same players but having different captain are
considered as different team.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>The
first line of input contains the number of test cases <b>T &#8804; 500</b>.
Then each of the next T lines contains the value of <b>N (1 &#8804; N &#8804;
10^9)</b>, the number of players the coach has.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>For
each line of input output the case number, then the number of ways teams can be
selected. You should output the result modulo 1000000007. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>For
exact formatting, see the sample input and output. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Sample Input<span style='mso-tab-count:
5'>                                                                               </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:-2.25pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;height:21.0pt'>
  <td width=294 valign=top style='width:220.75pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .5pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
  height:21.0pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;layout-grid-mode:char'><span
  style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
  mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
  mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
  mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;layout-grid-mode:char'><a
  name="DDE_LINK3"><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
  "Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>3</span></a><span
  style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
  mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=290 valign=top style='width:217.65pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:21.0pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;layout-grid-mode:char'><span
  style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
  mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Case #1: 1<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
  mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Case
  #2: 4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;layout-grid-mode:char'><span
  style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
  mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Case #3: 12<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <![if !supportMisalignedRows]>
  <td style='height:21.0pt;border:none' width=0 height=28></td>
  <![endif]>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><!--[if mso & !supportInlineShapes & supportFields]><span
style='mso-element:field-begin'></span><span

 <v:stroke joinstyle="round"/>

</v:rect><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=554 height=2

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Problem
Setter: Towhidul Islam Talukdar<o:p></o:p></span></p>

Thanks: Md. Arifuzzaman Arif<o:p></o:p></span></p>

  <o:Words>237</o:Words>
  <o:Characters>1357</o:Characters>
  <o:Company>Hard Code Labs</o:Company>
  <o:Lines>11</o:Lines>
  <o:Paragraphs>3</o:Paragraphs>
  <o:CharactersWithSpaces>1591</o:CharactersWithSpaces>
  <o:Version>11.5606</o:Version>
 </o:DocumentProperties>
</xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>

	{mso-style-name:"Table Normal";

 <o:shapedefaults v:ext="edit" spidmax="2050">
  <o:colormenu v:ext="edit" fillcolor="none [4]" strokecolor="none [1]"
   shadowcolor="none [2]"/>
 </o:shapedefaults></xml><![endif]--><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>
 <o:shapelayout v:ext="edit">
  <o:idmap v:ext="edit" data="1"/>
 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->
</head>

<body bgcolor=white lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'>Problem F</span></b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'><br>
<b>Reverse Prime<o:p></o:p></b></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'>Input: </span></b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'>Output: </span></b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>There are a few 7
digit positive numbers whose reverse number is a prime number and less than <b>10^6</b>.<span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>For example: 1000070, 1000090 and 1000240 are
first few reverse prime numbers because all of the numbers are 7 digit numbers
whose reverse number is a prime number and less than 10^6. You have to find out
all the 7 digit reverse prime numbers and also its number of prime factors<span
style='color:black'>. </span>Prime factors of a positive integer are the prime
numbers that divide into that integer exactly, without leaving a remainder. For
example, prime factors of 24 are 2, 2, 2 and 3.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>In this problem,
youll encounter 2 types of input  <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Query: <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>This type of input
will be formatted like this  <b>q <i>i</i></b>. For this input, you have to
calculate the cumulative summation of the number of prime factors of reverse
prime numbers from 0-th to <b><i>i</i></b>-th index. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Deletion:<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>This type of input
will be formatted like this  <b>d <i>reverse_prime</i></b>. For this input,
you have to delete <i>reverse_prime </i>from the set and update your summation.
No output is required in such cases.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans";color:black'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>It is guaranteed
that <i>i</i> will be a valid index and <i>reverse_prime</i> will be a valid 7
digit reverse prime number. It is also guaranteed that no two <i>reverse_prime</i>
will be same.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans";color:black'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>There will be at
most <b>71000 </b>query lines and <b>3500</b> deletion lines in the data set.
The program will terminated by EOF.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Sample Input<span style='mso-tab-count:
5'>                                                                               </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:-2.0pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='height:21.0pt'>
  <td width=304 valign=top style='width:227.65pt;border-top:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-left:solid black 1.0pt;border-bottom:none black 1.0pt;border-right:
  none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:solid black .5pt;
  mso-border-bottom-alt:none black 0in;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:21.0pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:
  "Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:
  "Liberation Sans"'>q 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:

  "Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>q 2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
  "Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>d 1000070<o:p></o:p></span></p>
