  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
  "Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>q 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
  "Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>d 1000240<o:p></o:p></span></p>

  layout-grid-mode:char'><a name="DDE_LINK3"><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";

  </td>
  <td width=290 valign=top style='width:217.15pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;

  <p class=MsoNormal style='layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:
  "Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:

  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:

  <p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><!--[if mso & !supportInlineShapes & supportFields]><span
style='mso-element:field-begin'></span><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>SHAPE <span style='mso-element:field-separator'></span><![endif]--><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:rect
 id="_x0000_s1026" style='width:415.25pt;height:1.5pt;
 mso-position-horizontal-relative:char;mso-position-vertical-relative:line;
 v-text-anchor:middle' fillcolor="#aca899" stroked="f">
 <v:fill color2="#535766"/>
 <v:stroke joinstyle="round"/>
 <w:wrap type="none"/>
 <w:anchorlock/>
</v:rect><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=554 height=2
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/raya.gif"  v:shapes="_x0000_s1026"><![endif]><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><![endif]--><!--[if mso & !supportInlineShapes & supportFields]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1025" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:415.25pt;height:1.5pt'/><span
style='mso-element:field-end'></span><![endif]--><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<body bgcolor=white lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'>Problem G</span></b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'><br>
<b>Colored Tiles<o:p></o:p></b></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'>Input: </span></b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'>Output: </span></b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Tanzibal has got 7
types of tiles with her and there are infinite supplies of each. The following
diagram depicts the shape and color of each tile.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='height:13.8pt'>
  <td width=167 valign=top style='width:125.1pt;border:none;border-bottom:none black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-bottom-alt:none black 0in;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:13.8pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><b><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
  "Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-ansi-language:
  #0400'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600"

   stroked="f">

   <v:formulas>
    <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
    <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
    <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>

    <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>

   <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>

  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><b><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
  "Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-ansi-language:

  <td width=160 valign=top style='width:119.7pt;border:none;border-bottom:none black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-bottom-alt:none black 0in;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:13.8pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><b><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
  "Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-ansi-language:
  #0400'><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1028" type="#_x0000_t75"
   style='width:74.25pt;height:74.25pt' filled="t">
   <v:fill color2="black"/>
   <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/p6_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />

  style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
  mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <![if !supportMisalignedRows]>
  <td style='height:13.8pt;border:none' width=0 height=18></td>
  <![endif]>
 </tr>

  <td width=167 valign=top style='width:125.1pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;

  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center;layout-grid-mode:
  char'><b><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
  "Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Tile #5<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
  mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Color: Brown<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

  char'><b><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
  "Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Tile #6<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b><span
  style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
  mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Color: Pink<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
  </td>
  <td width=160 valign=top style='width:119.7pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;

  char'><b><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:

<p class=MsoNormal><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>All
the tiles are different in shape and color. For those who are color blind
and/or using a black-white printed version of the above figure, the color of
each tile is given below its corresponding figure.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Tiles numbered 1-4
are L shaped. Tile 5 has a dimension of 2 x 1. Tile 6 has a dimension of 1 x 2.
Tile 7 has a dimension of 1 x 1.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Tanzibal
has a board of size <b>N</b> x <b>M</b>. She would like to cover the board
completely with the tiles at her disposal. The rules of tilings goes like this:<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=ListParagraph style='text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:
l0 level1 lfo1;tab-stops:list .5in left 1.0in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>·<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>The
tiles cant be rotated.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=ListParagraph style='text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:
l0 level1 lfo1;tab-stops:list .5in left 1.0in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>·<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Some
of the cells of the board are broken and she cant place any tile on top of
those cells.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=ListParagraph style='text-align:justify;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:
l0 level1 lfo1;tab-stops:list .5in left 1.0in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;mso-bidi-font-family:
Symbol'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>·<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Some
of the cells of the board are special. Each special cell is marked with a
single color. The color of each special cell will be from the set {Red, Grey,
Blue, Green, Brown, Pink &amp; Black} and will be denoted by {R, G, B, N, W, P,
L} respectively, for the sake of brevity. Tanzibal has to make sure that those
cells are covered by a tile with the same color as that of the cell.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Can you help Tanzibal by finding out the number of
different ways she can tile the whole board? Two configurations are different
if there is at least one cell that is tiled with a different color.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>The first line of input is an integer <b>T</b>(<b>T&lt;50</b>)
that indicates the number of test cases. Each case starts with two integers <b>N</b>(0&lt;<b>N&lt;9</b>)
and <b>M</b>(0&lt;<b>M&lt;20</b>) that represents the dimension of the board.
Each of the next <b>N</b> lines will contain <b>M</b> characters each. Broken
cells will be represented using <b>#</b>, empty cells will be represented
using <b>.</b> and the special cells will be given by one of {R, G, B, N, W,
P, L}.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>For each case, output the case number
followed by the total number of configurations. Since the total number of ways
can be very big, output the result modulo <b>50431</b>.<b><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span><o:p></o:p></b></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Sample Input<span style='mso-tab-count:
5'>                                                                               </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<table class=MsoNormalTable border=0 cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0
 style='margin-left:-2.0pt;border-collapse:collapse;mso-padding-alt:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt'>
 <tr style='mso-yfti-lastrow:yes;height:21.0pt'>
  <td width=294 valign=top style='width:220.5pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  border-right:none;mso-border-top-alt:solid black .5pt;mso-border-left-alt:
  solid black .5pt;mso-border-bottom-alt:solid black .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;
  height:21.0pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;layout-grid-mode:char'><span
  style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
  mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
  mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>3 3<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
  mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>...<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
  mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>...<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
  mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>...<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
  mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>1 4<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
  mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>..#.<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
  mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>2 2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
  mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>..<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
  mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>N.<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <td width=290 valign=top style='width:217.15pt;border:solid black 1.0pt;
  mso-border-alt:solid black .5pt;padding:0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt;height:21.0pt'>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;layout-grid-mode:char'><span
  style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
  mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  1: 369<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
  mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans";
  mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>Case 2: 2<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;layout-grid-mode:char'><span
  style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
  mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-bidi-font-family:"Courier New"'>Case
  3: 0<o:p></o:p></span></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><b><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
  mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>
  <p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt;
  layout-grid-mode:char'><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
  "Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>
  </td>
  <![if !supportMisalignedRows]>
  <td style='height:21.0pt;border:none' width=0 height=28></td>
  <![endif]>
 </tr>
</table>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><!--[if mso & !supportInlineShapes & supportFields]><span
style='mso-element:field-begin'></span><span
style='mso-spacerun:yes'> </span>SHAPE <span style='mso-element:field-separator'></span><![endif]--><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:rect
 id="_x0000_s1026" style='width:415.25pt;height:1.5pt;
 mso-position-horizontal-relative:char;mso-position-vertical-relative:line;
 v-text-anchor:middle' fillcolor="#aca899" stroked="f">
 <v:fill color2="#535766"/>
 <v:stroke joinstyle="round"/>
 <w:wrap type="none"/>
 <w:anchorlock/>
</v:rect><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=554 height=2
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/p6_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_s1026"><![endif]><!--[if mso & !supportInlineShapes & supportFields]><v:shape
 id="_x0000_i1032" type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:415.25pt;height:1.5pt'/><span
style='mso-element:field-end'></span><![endif]--><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Problem
Setter: Sohel Hafiz<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify'><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Special
Thanks: Md. Arifuzzaman Arif<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-ansi-language:#0400'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

</div>

 </o:shapelayout></xml><![endif]-->

<body bgcolor=white lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'>Problem H</span></b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'><br>
<b>Sultan and Khairun Shundori<o:p></o:p></b></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'>Input: </span></b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'>Output: </span></b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Flowerland is in
festive mood. Their princess Khairun Shundori will choose her life-partner
today. Princes and handsome young men from distant and neighboring countries have
gathered in the capital. Princess will interview them one after one. Among
these young men, theres Sultan from Codeland.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>The interviews
start. One after one, failed young men get out of Kings castle in great
disappointment. Then comes our hero Sultan. He impresses the Princess with his
amazing grace and smartness. He passes all the tests the Princess poses before
him. Almost impressed, the Princess gives him one last task  he have to
collect roses from all the gardens in the city for her.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Seems like an easy task, doesnt it?
Especially when Sultan has already pin-pointed every garden in the city using
Google Maps. But there are some catches  as soon as Sultan gets out of the
castle, the losers will try to kill him out of jealousy. Sultan will be followed
and followed in great number. So he cant afford to take the risk of going
through a point he previously visited i.e. he cant intersect his previous
path. Then again, he wants to finish this task as soon as possible. So he will
always run from one garden to another in a straight line.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>There will be at most <b><i>50</i></b>
test cases. Each test case starts with an integer <b><i>n</i></b>, number of
points of interest (one of them is the castle and the rest are gardens) <b><i>[3&#8804;n&#8804;1000]</i></b>.
Each point of interest will be specified by the integer <b><i>(x,y)</i></b>
co-ordinate of that point <b><i>[-10000&#8804;x,y&#8804;10000]</i></b>. No two
points of interest will be located in the same co-ordinate. The castle will
always be the first point in input. Sultan has to start and end his journey in
the Castle. Input is terminated by a case where <b><i>n</i></b> equals 0.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>For each test case, you have to output
a sequence of indices of points of interest in one line that will ensure the
task. Any sequence that doesnt violate the conditions will be accepted. Points
will be indexed from 0 in the output. If there is no valid sequence for the
input, you have output <b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:normal'><i
style='mso-bidi-font-style:normal'>no solution</i></b>.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Sample Input<span style='mso-tab-count:
5'>                                                                               </span>Output
for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

	mso-pagination:widow-orphan no-line-numbers;
	mso-hyphenate:none;

	mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
	mso-fareast-language:AR-SA;
	mso-bidi-language:AR-SA;}

</head>

<body bgcolor=white lang=EN-US style='tab-interval:.5in'>

<div class=Section1>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'>Problem I</span></b><span style='font-size:20.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:Arial'><br>
<b>Acme Corporation<o:p></o:p></b></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'>Input: </span></b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Input<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><b style='mso-bidi-font-weight:
normal'><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial'>Output: </span></b><span style='font-size:11.0pt;font-family:Arial;
mso-bidi-font-family:Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>Standard Output <o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal align=center style='text-align:center'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600"
 o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t" path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f"
 stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>
 <v:path o:extrusionok="f" gradientshapeok="t" o:connecttype="rect"/>
 <o:lock v:ext="edit" aspectratio="t"/>
</v:shapetype><v:shape id="_x0000_s1027" type="#_x0000_t75" style='position:absolute;
 margin-left:0;margin-top:.7pt;width:231.5pt;height:318.6pt;z-index:2;
 mso-wrap-distance-left:0;mso-wrap-distance-right:0;mso-position-horizontal:left'
 filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/p8_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
 <w:wrap type="square" side="largest"/>
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=309 height=425
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/p8_files/image001.png"  align=left v:shapes="_x0000_s1027"><![endif]><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Wile E. Coyote is back. He is back in
the business. The business of capturing the road runner. Being the most loyal
customer to the Acme Corporation, they are hoping to do some great business
with him. Although, Acme makes literally every kinds of devices, all of them
has a similarity, that has been kept secret for ages. All of their products use
a secret element element X (this is kept so secret that, only you and the
Acme people know about this). The decision makers of the Acme Corp. has already
estimated the maximum amount of element X that can be used into manufacture
every month.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-bidi-font-family:
Arial;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold'>For month <b><i>i</i></b>, the per unit
manufacturing cost of<span style='mso-spacerun:yes'>  </span>element X is <b><i>m<sub>i</sub></i></b><i>,</i>
and at most <b><i>n<sub>i</sub></i> </b>units can be produced. Moreover, the
selling price for element X for that month is <b><i>p<sub>i</sub></i></b>.
One more thing is that, element X older than <b><i>E<sub>i</sub></i> </b>months
can not be used. But good thing is that, they can store any amount of element X
in their inventory (it's the Acme Corp, they can make anything :) ). Now, Acme
Corporation wants to know how much element X should be produced and sold, to
make the highest amount of profit.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo2;
tab-stops:list .5in left 1.0in'><![if !supportLists]><span style='font-size:
9.0pt;font-family:Wingdings;mso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:
Wingdings'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>l<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>First
line contains <b><i>T</i></b>, the number of test cases.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l1 level1 lfo2;
tab-stops:list .5in left 1.0in'><![if !supportLists]><span style='font-size:
9.0pt;font-family:Wingdings;mso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:
Wingdings'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>l<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>For
each test case<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.75in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l1 level2 lfo2;
tab-stops:list .75in left 1.5in'><![if !supportLists]><span style='font-size:
9.0pt;font-family:Wingdings;mso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:
Wingdings'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>u<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>First
line contains two integers <b><i>M</i></b> and <b><i>I</i></b>, the number of
months to consider and the cost of storing per unit of element X per month in
the inventory.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:.75in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l1 level2 lfo2;
tab-stops:list .75in left 1.5in'><![if !supportLists]><span style='font-size:
9.0pt;font-family:Wingdings;mso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:
Wingdings'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>u<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Each
of the next <b><i>M</i> </b>lines describe the parameters for each month<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='margin-left:1.0in;text-align:justify;text-indent:
-.25in;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt;mso-list:l1 level3 lfo2;tab-stops:list 1.0in left 2.0in'><![if !supportLists]><span
style='font-size:9.0pt;font-family:Symbol;mso-fareast-font-family:Symbol;
mso-bidi-font-family:Symbol'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>·<span
style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";
mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>The
<b><i>i<sup>th</sup></i> </b>line contains 5 integers, <b><i>m<sub>i</sub>, n<sub>i</sub>,
p<sub>i</sub>, s<sub>i</sub>, E<sub>i</sub></i></b>, where <b><i>m<sub>i</sub></i>
</b>is the per unit manufacturing cost for month <b><i>i</i></b>, <b><i>n<sub>i</sub></i>
</b>is the maximum amount that can be manufactured in this month, <b><i>p<sub>i</sub></i>
</b>is the selling price for that month(per unit), <b><i>s<sub>i</sub></i> </b>is
the maximum amount that can be sold that month, and <b><i>E<sub>i</sub></i></b>
is the maximum time,element X manufactured on month <b><i>i</i></b>, can be
stored in the inventory. For example, if for month 1, E<sub>1</sub> = 3, the
elements produced in month 1 can be sold in months 1, 2, 3 and 4. But it can
not be sold in month 5.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Output<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><b><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>For each test case, output the case
number and the maximum amount of profit, Acme Corporation can make. Note that,
you have to think of only <b><i>M</i> </b>months. If any amount of element X is
stored in the inventory after this period, are completely ignored. For
formatting, see the sample input and output.<o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt;
tab-stops:0in'><b><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'>Constraints<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt;
tab-stops:0in'><b><span style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:
"Times New Roman";mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></b></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l2 level1 lfo3;
tab-stops:list .5in left 1.0in'><![if !supportLists]><span style='font-size:
9.0pt;font-family:Wingdings;mso-fareast-font-family:Wingdings;mso-bidi-font-family:
Wingdings'><span style='mso-list:Ignore'>l<span style='font:7.0pt "Times New Roman"'>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
</span></span></span><![endif]><sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1025"
 type="#_x0000_t75" style='width:43.5pt;height:13.5pt' o:ole="  filled="t">
 <v:fill color2="black"/>
 <v:imagedata src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/p8_files/image001.png"  o:title=" />
</v:shape><![endif]--><![if !vml]><img width=58 height=18
src="http://uva.onlinejudge.org/external/116/p8_files/image001.png"  v:shapes="_x0000_i1025"><![endif]></sub><!--[if gte mso 9]><xml>

  DrawAspect="Content" ObjectID="_1303073503">
 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l2 level1 lfo3;
tab-stops:list .5in left 1.0in'><![if !supportLists]><span style='font-size:

</span></span></span><![endif]><sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1026"

 </o:OLEObject>
</xml><![endif]--></p>

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-left:.5in;text-indent:-.25in;mso-list:l2 level1 lfo3;
tab-stops:list .5in left 1.0in'><![if !supportLists]><span style='font-size:

</span></span></span><![endif]><sub><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shape id="_x0000_i1027"

<p class=MsoBodyText style='margin-left:.5in;text-align:justify;text-indent:

<p class=MsoNormal style='text-align:justify;mso-line-height-alt:11.0pt'><span
style='font-family:"Liberation Sans";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";
mso-hansi-font-family:"Liberation Sans"'><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></span></p>

for Sample Input<o:p></o:p></span></b></p>
